courses.description:
L'affiliation connaît aujourd'hui un succès grandissant : L'Affiliation marketing permet de toucher des revenus récurrents.
Le principe est simple : un site commercial (l'annonceur) propose à un site partenaire (l'affilié) de promouvoir, par le biais de son site, de sa base de données ou d'une application mobile, ses produits ou ses services.
Ce cours guide les participants à chaque étape du processus d'affiliation. Il permet notamment de maîtriser les différents modes de rémunération des affiliés (commission sur les ventes, à la visite...), de comprendre les conditions du partenariat entre l'annonceur et l'affilié via la plate-forme d'affiliation et de bien utiliser cette dernière.
Objectifs pédagogiques de la formation Marketing d'affiliation
Comprendre l'affiliation sur internet et ses enjeux
Notre selection pour les meilleurs plateformes d'affiliations
Créer un site web Wordpress pour l'affiliation
Intégrer l'affiliation dans votre site web Wordpress
Construire son programme d'affiliation
Animer son programme d'affiliation
Mise en place du système d'affiliation Thrivecart
Notez bien :
La formation se déroulera sous forme de cours théorique & pratique, d'exemples concrets et d'ateliers pour permettre aux participants de mettre en pratique les concepts appris. Des exercices, des mises en situation et des études de cas seront utilisés pour renforcer les connaissances.


Ressources d’apprentissage complémentaires :
Atelier en ligne
Documentation
Consultez des exemples de tableaux de bord, de rapports et de fichiers de bureau.
Enfin, je m'engage à vous fournir la formation la plus complète possible sur Udemy pour vous permettre de réussir dans votre apprentissage.
Je m'engage à répondre rapidement à vos questions pour vous aider à comprendre les concepts de la formation.
Je vais ajouter des cas pratiques sur demande pour vous donner des exemples concrets de ce que vous apprenez.
Je vais vous accompagner avec des cas pratiques et d'autres ressources utiles pour vous aider à mettre en pratique ce que vous apprenez.
Ces ajouts de vidéos seront, bien entendu, gratuits si vous avez acquis la formation.
Comment me contacter ? Je reste disponible dans la rubrique Question/Réponses d'Udemy pour répondre à vos questions.
À la fin de ce cours, si vous le suivez en entier et réussissez l'ensemble des quizz : Obtenez votre certification électronique à insérer dans votre CV et profil LinkedIn.
Il ne me reste que plus qu'à vous souhaiter une bonne formation !
Dr. Firas
target_audience: Les personnes désirant créer un complément de revenu
Les personnes désirant démarrer un premier business en ligne
Les personnes désirant gagner de l'argent sur internet

courses.title: Sponsorluk Eğitimi
courses.bio: Hayalinizi gerçekleştirmek için bütçeye mi ihtiyacınız var? O bütçeyi nasıl bulacağınızı anlatayım!
objectives: Sponsorluk Çeşitleri

requirements: Tek ön şartımız, kendi sınırlarınız. Bir adım ileri atın ve sponsorlukta kendinizi geliştirin.
courses.description:
Etkinliğinizle veya projenizle ilgili bütçenizi oluşturmanızın yöntemlerini ele alacağız!

Hepimizin hayalinde gerçekleştirmek istediği projesi ya da organizasyonu vardır illa ki. Lâkin bu projelerin çoğu maddi imkân gerektirmektedir. Sermayesi olmayıp hayalindeki işleri gerçekleştirmek isteyen ya da prestij amacıyla sponsorluk anlaşması yapmak isteyen yapıların, topluluklar için vazgeçilmez bir içerikle karşınızdayız.

Kursun amacı; katılımcıların organize edeceği etkinliklere ya da projelere sponsorluk bulurken yardımcı olacak stratejiler öğretmek, etkili sponsorluk ve tanıtım dosyası, sponsorluk sözleşmesi hazırlamaktır.

Kursların süresini kısa tutup, içeriğini yoğun bir şekilde sunmaya çalıştık. Bu sayede zamanınızı daha verimli bir şekilde yönetebileceksiniz.


Kursun içerikleri:

- Etkinlik planlama
- Sponsorların ilgisini çeken detaylar nelerdir?
- Hedef kitlenin doğru belirlenmesi
- Firmalarla sponsorluk süreçleri
- Firmalarla sponsorluk örnekleri
- Sponsorluk çeşitleri
- Sponsor bulma stratejileri
- Hibe programları
- Proje yazma ve sunma süreçleri
- Hibe alma süreçleri
- Hibe veren kurumlar ve hibe alanları
- Tanıtım Dosyası hazırlama
- Sponsorluk Dosyası hazırlama
- Sponsorluk Sözleşmesi hazırlama
- Sponsorluk çalışma takımları kurma
- Sponsorluk görüşmelerinde dikkat edilmesi gerekenler
- Bütçe gerçekleştirme, harcama
- Teknik Şartname Dosyası hazırlama
- Nihai Rapor hazırlama
- Geri bildirimlerin değerlendirilmesi
- PUKÖ döngüsü

Sponsorluk eğitimimiz kendi başına yeterli olmakla birlikte, Organizasyon Eğitimimiz ile birlikte alındığında görüşmelerdeki başarınız çok ciddi oranda artacaktır. Çünkü bir organizasyonun temelleri eksik atılırsa sponsor alma ihtimaliniz de o kadar düşük olur. Amacına yönelik faaliyetler içeren, amacına yönelik hedef kitlesi olan ve hedef kitlesine uygun şekilde belirlenmiş bir firma ile sponsorluk görüşmelerinin yapılması çok daha etkili olacaktır.

requirements: 特になし
courses.description:
■はじめに


はじめまして！れいらです。
私は2020年にブログを始め、現在では複数のサイトを運営する現役ブロガーです。


これまでに、トレンドブログで最高月収31万円を達成し、特化ブログでは年収650万円を得た実績があります。


現在もブログで毎月10万円以上の安定した収益を継続しています。


元々、特別なスキルもない平凡な主婦だった私ですが、PC1台でどこでも働ける「ブログ」に出会ったことで、人生が大きく好転しました。


そんなブログの魅力をもっと多くの方に伝えたい、そして「初心者の方が迷わず成果を出せるように全力でサポートをしたい」という想いから、情報発信やUdemyでの講座作りを行っています。



■このコースの概要説明


トレンドブログは、ブログ初心者でも最短で結果を出しやすいジャンルです。

しかし、「ネタ選び」と「キーワード選定」を間違えてしまうと、記事を書き続けても思うような成果が得られず、挫折してしまうことも…。


ブログで収益を上げるためには、「ネタ選び」と「キーワード選定」が成功のカギを握ります。


そこでこのコースでは、トレンドブログの「ネタ選び」と「キーワード選定」に特化した内容を徹底的に解説しています。


・SEO上位表示を狙えるネタの見つけ方
・ライバルに負けないキーワード選定のコツ
・ブログの成長ステージに応じたネタとキーワード選び
・トレンドブログの鉄板ネタ選びの思考法


SEOで上位表示を狙えるネタを探し出し、適切なキーワードを選定する方法をわかりやすくお伝えします。


さらに、私がこれまで培ってきたトレンドブログの知識をすべて詰め込みました。

初心者だった頃に「こんな講座があればもっと早く結果を出せたのに！」と感じたエッセンスを全て凝縮しています。


このコースを通して、トレンドブログのネタ選定とキーワード選定のコツを掴み、1日でも早く結果を出してほしい！ そんな想いを込めて作りました。




■コースを受講することで…


・記事ネタ選定に悩む時間を減らすことができる
・ネタ探しとキーワード選定がスムーズにできるようになる
・SEOに強いネタの種類と選び方が分かるようになる
・トレンドブログで扱うべき「今話題のネタ」や「これから話題になるネタ」の探し方を学べる
・読者に検索されるキーワードを的確に選定する方法を習得
・どんなネタで記事を書けば成果が出やすいかが明確になる
・月1万円の壁を突破し、さらなる収益を狙えるようになる


このコースを受講すれば、ブログ初心者の方でも「どんなネタを書けばいいのか？」「キーワード選びってどう進めればいいのか？」という悩みをスッキリ解消できます！


「ネタ選びやキーワード選定で迷ってしまい、記事がなかなか書けない…」という経験はありませんか？


私自身も初心者の頃に同じ悩みを抱え、手が止まってしまうことが何度もありました。


そんな経験を踏まえて、ブログ記事を書き始めるまでのステップを、分かりやすく具体的に解説するのがこのコースになります。


このコースを受講することで、トレンドブログのネタやキーワード選定のポイントが理解でき、記事を書き始めるための準備がスムーズに進められるようになります。


また、短期間で収益化を目指すためのネタとキーワード選定のコツも身につき効率的なブログ運営に役立てることができます。




■こんな方が受講に向いています


・どんなネタを選んだらいいのか分からない方
・ネタやキーワード選定に時間がかかりすぎてしまう方
・書きたいテーマは決まっているけど、検索されるキーワードがわからない方
・トレンドブログで効率的に収益を上げたい方
・トレンドブログで収益化したいけど、どうしていいかわからない方
・アクセスが来やすいネタが分からず、不安に感じている方




■このコースは全部で11セクションです


セクション1：はじめに
セクション2：トレンドブログの基礎知識
セクション3：トレンドブログのネタ選定の基礎
セクション4：ネタのジャンル・種類・ネタ元について
セクション5：検索する人の感情を理解する
セクション6：キーワード選定の全体像や考え方
セクション7：ネタのジャンル別の狙うべきキーワードを解説
セクション8：ブログの成長ステージに応じたネタとキーワード選び
セクション9：迷ったらコレ！トレンドブログの鉄板ネタ選びの思考法
セクション10：お礼とまとめ
セクション11：ボーナスレクチャー


全部で9時間29分のコースです。
その他、必要に応じてワークシートが用意されています。ワークシートに沿って実践していただくことで、オンラインビジネスの構築を進めることができます。




■最後に
本コースに興味をもっていただいた方は、動画終了後に「コース登録」へ進んでください。もっと検討したいという方はプレビューで講座の一部が見れますので、ぜひ講座を覗いてみてください。
それでは、コースのなかでお会いできることを楽しみにしています！

courses.description:
Don’t miss out—enroll now in the Ultimate Affiliate Marketing Mastery Course before it’s no longer FREE! This isn’t just a course—it’s your ticket to financial freedom, available in 20 languages with text/PDF versions to suit every learner. Designed for all levels, especially beginners, this course delivers the skills, knowledge, and hands-on practice you need to dominate affiliate marketing with discipline, hard work, and a warrior mindset. Time’s ticking—secure your spot today!
The primary goal? Equip you to succeed in affiliate marketing and prove it with a final assignment: generate at least 5 sales for this very course. Nail it, and you’ll recover your investment plus profit. Push further—hit 100 sales—and earn a prestigious Certificate of Competence in Affiliate Marketing! Even after completion, keep earning with a generous 50% commission per sale. All you need is a computer or smartphone, internet access, and a burning hunger to break free from the ordinary.
From “What Is Affiliate Marketing” to mastering organic traffic, paid ads, email copywriting, and performance metrics, this course covers it all. "Finally there is a course out there that purely focuses on Affiliate Marketing from the Advertisers perspective"
So many courses on Affiliate Marketing talk about how you as an individual can earn big bucks affiliate marketing - essentially the publishers perspective. Whereas, so few actually talk about it from an advertisers point of view - where a brand reaches out to third-party websites to promote your products or services. There are thousands of affiliate managers out there working for companies who want to either set up an affiliate marketing channel, or improve their existing one - and that's why I made this course!

If you want to get ahead in affiliate marketing and truly understand it from an advertisers perspective, then this is the course for you!

Curso completo, prático e direto ao ponto, ideal para iniciantes e para quem busca resultados reais no marketing digital. Um verdadeiro passo a passo para quem deseja começar com o pé direito e ter bons resultados.

Além do curso ser completo, com mais de 100 aulas atualizadas e com um Bônus Exclusivo que vai te ajudar ir mais longe ainda.

Nesse curso mostro que é possível e ensino o caminho para viver de afiliado, seja você um iniciante ou alguém que ja tentou vender e ainda não conseguiu ter consistência nos resultados. Ou seja, o curso é para você e para todos!

Aulas em vídeo aulas, feita de forma que mesmo quem está começando consiga entender de forma clara e objetiva o que precisa fazer para ter resultados como afiliado vendendo sem aparecer. Curso gravado em vídeo aulas, com prints de telas e mapas mentais, e descrições . Tudo para que deixe a didática melhor ainda e mais fácil de você assimilar o conteúdo.

Essa é a melhor oportunidade para quem quer ser um afiliado que vende todos os dias na internet usando o Facebook Ads.
target_audience: Iniciantes no marketing digital que querem começar da forma certa, com um passo a passo completo e direto ao ponto.
Pessoas que buscam uma renda extra ou nova fonte de renda com potencial de ganhos escaláveis.
Afiliados que já tentaram vender online, mas não conseguiram resultados consistentes, e agora querem entender o que realmente funciona.
Empreendedores e produtores digitais que desejam aprender a usar o Facebook Ads de forma estratégica para vender mais.
Qualquer pessoa que deseja trabalhar de casa, com liberdade de tempo e geográfica, aprendendo uma habilidade prática e altamente rentável.

courses.description:
このコースでは、あなたにアフィリエイトあるいはネットビジネスに必要な基本的ななスキルのなかでもまずは基本をしっかり学習していただきます。ただし、アフィリエイト等は、実践が必要なものなので、頭で理解しただけにならぬように実践的な新しいカリキュラムを提供していきます。
但し、アフィリエイトもネットビジネスも、大事なのはサポートを受けつつ実践していくことですので、このコースは完全なサポートを提供することが目的であり、レクチャーのノウハウ自体はキッカケにすぎません。そのことをしっかり認識いただき、了承いただける方のみ受講していただきたいと考えています。

あなたが、他で成功出来なかった人でも、全くのビギナーさんであっても関係ありません。
成功する気があって、実践ができる人で、半年集中できる人ならば、９８３ｍポリシー（※１）（※２）で応援いたします。
このコースでは、AdSenseとPPCに関しては扱いませんのでその情報をお探しの方は他のコースをお探しください。
また実践や考察なしに、見栄え等ただクレームを言いたいような方は最初からご遠慮ねがいます。

※１）９８３ｍとは、この教材のベースになっている９８３ｍメンバーズ倶楽部を指しています。
※２）このコースには専用のサポートコミュニティ（SNS）のAF9801を用意しますが、あくまでもサポート用であり
参加も任意で強制は一切いたしませんのでご安心くださいませ。
target_audience: レクチャー動画を見て、考え、質問し、解らないことを放置しない方
スライドや、見栄えなどよりも内容を正しく評価していただける方
身につくまで頑張れる方

requirements: Internet connection with pc/laptop
courses.description:
Unlock the secrets to building a profitable blog in 2024 using the power of AI!
This beginner-friendly course guides you step by step through the process of launching and monetising a blog even if you’ve never blogged before.
Whether you're starting from scratch or looking to grow an existing blog, you'll learn how to leverage AI to create content, attract traffic, and generate consistent income.


What Will You Learn:
Introduction
Get an overview of the course and what to expect on your blogging journey.
Income Proof
Real life examples and results to show you what’s possible with AI-powered blogging.
How Does It Work
Understand the full blogging ecosystem, from content creation to monetisation.
How to Find a Perfect Niche
Learn how to choose a profitable niche that aligns with your interests and market demand.
How to Set Up a WordPress Website
A beginner-friendly walkthrough to launch your blog using WordPress.
Keyword Research
Discover how to find keywords your audience is actually searching for to drive traffic.
How to Come Up With Content Ideas
Proven methods to generate endless content ideas that resonate with readers.
How to Create High-Quality Content with Affpilot
Use AI tools like Affpilot to write faster and better content at scale.
How to Generate More Traffic with SEO and Social Media
Learn how to optimize content for search engines and promote it effectively online.
Explore Different Ways to Make Money with Your Blog
From affiliate marketing to ad revenue — learn various monetization strategies.
Who This Course Is For:
Beginners with no prior blogging experience
Bloggers aiming to grow traffic and income
Passionate individuals who want to earn from writing about topics they love
Side hustlers or aspiring digital entrepreneurs
Anyone wanting to work from anywhere and write 10x faster using AI tools
Why Take This Course?
Low cost side hustle – minimal upfront costs
Follow your passion – blog about topics you love
Flexible lifestyle – work on your own schedule
Productivity boost – create better content, faster, with AI
target_audience: Beginners who are looking to create the blog and make passive income

courses.bio: Obtenez un système clés en main pour vendre le best-seller de la plateforme 1TPE et gagner un revenu en affiliation
objectives: Obtenez un business clés en main
Recevez un tunnel prêt a l'emploi + une séquence d'emails programmées
Gagner un revenus avec l'affiliation
Faite la promotion du Best-Seller de la plateforme 1TPE

Le tunnel clés en main pour vendre le best-seller 1TPE

Comment déléguer la tâche pour créer un blog de niche rentable

requirements: Avoir un ordinateur
être motivé
courses.description:
Aimeriez-vous avoir un complément de revenus qui tombe tous les mois dans votre compte en banque. Si oui alors cette formation est pour vous.
Je vais vous donnez un business d’affiliation clés en main, pour vendre le best-seller de la plateforme 1tpe affiliation.
Je vais vous fournir :
- un tunnel de vente de la plateforme marketing système-IO
- Une campagne de 7 emails, pour convertir vos visiteurs en clients
- Et comment envoyer du trafic qualifier dans le tunnel de vente


J’ai fait pratiquement 90% du travail, ce que vous avez à faire, c’est d’ouvrir un compte sur la plateforme 1tpe affiliation.


1tpe c'est quoi ?


C’est une plateforme ou vous trouvez des produits digitaux à proposer en affiliation, chaque vente vous rapporte des commissions


1tpe comment ça marche ?


Vous, commencez d’abord par vous inscrire sur 1tpe , vous obtenez le produit best-seller (le plus vendu), vous obtenez votre lien et commencer à faire vos premières vente, avec le système d’affiliation clés en main que je vous donne.


Mais sur 1tpe comment vendre ?


C’est simple j’ai mâché le travail à votre place, Vous, vous inscrivez sur système-IO (gratuit), télécharger le tunnel (gratuit), programmer la campagne d’emails (gratuite), ajouter vos lien d’affiliation et commencer à prospecter pour faire vos premières ventes.
Que vais-je apprendre dans cette formation ?
Ce que vous allez apprendre c’est :


- Comment utiliser 1tpe
- Le concept astucieux pour gagner de l'argent en affiliation avec 1TPE
- Le tunnel clés en main pour vendre le best-seller 1TPE
- Programmer la séquence d'emails
- Comment avoir une désirabilité optimale
- Comment installer un nom de domaine
- Comment utiliser les groupes Facebook, pour capturer des emails
- Créer votre compte persona Facebook professionnel
- Comment déléguer la tâche pour créer un blog de niche rentable


A la fin de cette formation, vous avez mis en place le tunnel, la campagne d’emails, et commencer à envoyer du trafic qualifier dans le tunnel, et commencer à faire vos premières ventes.
Vous n’avez pas besoin d’être un expert, cette formation s’adresse à des personnes qui débutes sur internet et qui veulent commencer un premier business, vous ne prenez pas de risque, car vous avez.


- Un produit best-seller qui se vend bien
- Un tunnel professionnel
- Une campagne d’emails pour convertir vos prospects en clients


Etes-vous prêt à vous rendre sur 1tpe pour gagner de l’argent ?
Cliquez sur le bouton en haut à droite « acheter des maintenant » et on se retrouve tout de suite de l’autre coté.
target_audience: Tout publique qui veux gagner un complément de revenus
Pour ceux qui veulent faire leur premier pas en affiliation
Pour ceux qui veulent un revenus passif

Außerdem bekommst du Einblicke, wie erfolgreiche Creator:innen ihre Prozesse strukturieren, welche Content-Stile besonders gut funktionieren und wie du deine Strategie stetig an Trends und Daten anpassen kannst.

courses.description:
Welcome to our journey into the world of affiliate marketing, tailored especially for advertisers. Unlike many courses that cater to partners and their quest for passive income, I’ve crafted this program with your professional growth in mind. We're going to take a first-person view of how businesses like yours can thrive in the bustling affiliate marketing landscape.
In this course, I will guide you through the essentials of the affiliate marketing ecosystem. Together, we will identify and understand the roles of networks, partners, and key stakeholders. You will discover a suite of tools that will equip you to manage campaigns, track progress, and refine strategies effectively.
I will explain the different compensation structures that are pivotal in fostering successful partnerships. You will learn about the varied traffic sources and how best to utilize them for your marketing objectives. Our exploration will span diverse verticals, providing you with real-world examples—from health supplements to online betting services.
Designed for those who are not native English speakers, I aim to present these concepts clearly and accessible. By the end of this course, you'll have a strong foundation to build upon, enabling you to delve deeper into the aspects that align with your business needs. Let’s embark on this learning adventure and take your first step toward mastering affiliate marketing as advertisers.
target_audience: 1. Beginners or those transitioning from another profession who aim to delve into this subject to secure their first job in marketing.

2. Company founders, Chief Marketing Officers, and digital marketing specialists who have incomplete or unsystematic knowledge about Affiliate Marketing, and see this path as an opportunity for their product or service.

requirements: Keine technischen Vorkenntnisse erforderlich, gut für Anfänger geeignet
courses.description:
In diesem kostenlosen Kurs lernst Du die Plattform Digistore24 kennen. Die Plattform ermöglicht es Dir, als Vendor, deine eigenen physischen und digitalen Produkte zu verkaufen, sowie auch als Affiliate Partner-Produkte zu finden und auf Provisionsbasis zu bewerben. Was natürlich für beide Seiten große Vorteile und Möglichkeiten bietet.
Du lernst wie die Plattform aufgebaut ist und wie sie funktioniert. Dazu gehört die Erklärung des Dashboards, wozu benötigst Du einen Vendoren-Account und was ist ein Affiliate-Account. Wir gehen gemeinsam auf den Digistore24 Marktplatz, hier findest Du über 5000 Partner-Produkte die Du bewerben kannst, Digistore24 übernimmt hier für dich den kompletten Zahlungsverkehr und der Vendor den Produkt-Support. Somit ist das der ideale Einstieg für ein eigenes Online-Business ohne eigenes Produkt.
Welche Arten von Partner-Produkten gibt es? Welche Nischen und Branchen sind am lukrativsten? Auf welche Kennzahlen muss ich bei der Produktwahl schauen und wie schließe ich schnell und unkompliziert eine Partnerschaft ab. All das lernst Du in diesem Kurs.
Du möchtest ein eigenes Produkte auf dem Digistore24 Marktplatz verkaufen? Im Kurs erfährst Du, wie Du ein eigenes Produkt anlegst, wie Du ein Bestellformular dafür erstellst und wie Du den Zahlungsplan einrichtest. Nun muss dein Produkt nur noch genehmigt werden und kann dann auf dem Marktplatz gestellt werden. Hier suchen unzählige Affiliates ständig nach neuen und lukrativen Partner-Produkten, die sie bewerben können. Du als Vendor bestimmst selbst, wie hoch die Provision für deine Produkte ist.
Digistore24 ist ein deutsches Unternehmen und mittlerweile Marktführer in Europa und auch in den USA vertreten. Der Support ist erstklassig, sowohl auf der Plattform selber, als auch das Support-Team. Zu jedem Thema und Problem gibt es auf der Plattform Tutorials und auch der Support antwortet schnell und ist professionell.
Ich würde mich als Dozent freuen, dich durch meinen Kurs Digistore24Basic-Kurs begleiten zu dürfen und Dir so vielleicht beim Aufbau deines Online-Business helfen zu können.
Dein Dozent: Fred Thiele

courses.description:
Builderall verspricht das Schweizer Messer des Online Marketings zu sein: quasi eine All-in-One-Marketing-Komplett-Lösung.
Und schaut man sich die gebotenen Tools an, so klingt das Angebot äußerst verlockend. Da wäre der Responsive Pagebuilder, fertige Sales-Funnel, ein komplettes E-Mail-Marketing-System, inkl. Autoresponder samt Workflows, eine Webinar-Plattform, ein eigenes E-Learning-System – und dies sind nur 4 von knapp 20 Tools für dein Marketing.
Darüberhinaus sind alle Tools sofort einsatzbereit: Keine Installation. Keine Plugins. Keine Updates.
Einfach anmelden und loslegen!
Zusätzlich bietet Builderall noch das überaus spannendes Partnerprogramm "Builderall Business" mit 30% Provisionen auf 2 Ebenen und den Direktkontakten zu deinen Kunden.
Also: Grund genug, sich Builderall einmal im Detail anzuschauen – und dir einen leichten Einstieg in die Welt des Online-Marketings zu geben.


Inhalte des Kurses:
In diesem Kurs stelle ich dir im ersten Modul die verschiedenen Apps von Builderall vor, z.B. den Paegebuilder mit dem du Landingpages, SalesFunnel & Co erstellst.

Wir schauen uns den Mitgliederbereich, die Webinarplattform, das e-Learning-System, den Autoresponder für dein E-Mail-Marketing, den App-Builder usw.

Im 2. Modul richten wir Builderall ein. Hier gibt es ein paar Standardeinstellungen, die du sofort vornehmen solltest. Nix dramatisches.

Im nächsten Modul widmen wir uns dem Herz von Builderall: Dem Pagebuilder. Mit diesem erstellst du deine Verkaufsseiten, deine Verkaufskanäle – und alles ohne Programmierkenntnisse, einfach per Drag & Drop.

Dabei kannst du mit über 1000 Vorlagen starten, oder mit einer leeren Seite. In diesem Kurs starten wir mit einer leeren Seite und ich zeige dir, wie du eine komplette Seite, mit Kontaktformular & Co aufbaust.

In vierten Modul richten wir dann dein E-Mail-Marketing ein. Zunächst werden wir Abonnenten-Listen erstellen, dann einen klassischen Newsletter rausschicken und anschließend deinen ersten Autoresponder aufbauen (also eine automatische E-Mail-Sequenz). Zu guter letzt lernst du, wie du dein E-Mail-Programm mit deinen Webseiten „tag-basiert“ verknüpfst und „Workflows“ erstellst, damit der richtige Kunde zur richtigen Zeit die richtig Botschaft erhält.

In Modul 5 gehen wir nun noch weiter ins Detail. Hier bauen wir zusammen einen kompletten Optin-Tunnel. Dann lernst du, wie du einen geschützten Mitgliederbereich anlegst, um deinen Kunden z.B. exklusive Downloads oder Videos zur Verfügung zu stellen. Außerdem richten wir dein E-Learning-System ein, über welches du deine Kurse frei oder kostenpflichtig anbieten kannst.

Und noch einmal: All dies kannst du ab sofort nutzen: ohne dich um die Technik kümmern zu müssen. Keine Plugins, keine lästigen Updates, keine neuen Betriebssysteme.
Du kümmerst dich nur noch um eines: um dein Business.

Apropos Business. Es gibt auch eine Builderall als Business-Version.
Wenn du Builderall gut findest und deinen Kunden empfiehlst, dann bekommst du pro Vermittlung 30% Provision – pro Kunde – pro Monat. Im ersten Monat sogar 100%! Eine kleine Rechnung an dieser Stelle: Hast du nur drei eigene Kunden, kannst du alle Tools quasi umsonst nutzen.
Ist das ein normales Affiliate-Programm?
Jein!
Wie gesagt, für jede Empfehlung bekommst du 30% Provision – pro Monat! Für jeden Kunden, den dein Partner wirbt, bekommst du ebenfalls 30% - pro Monat.
Das ist sehr gut. Aber trotzdem ein Affiliate-Prrogramm!
Der große Unterschied ist: Deine Kunden sind und bleiben DEINE Kunden! Du bekommst den direkten Kontakt zu DEINEN Kunden. Und wenn du dein Business einmal aufgeben willst, kauft Builderall dir deine Kontakte sogar ab!
Klingt gut?
Dann lass uns starten!
Wir sehen uns gleich im Kurs!
Marco

يمكن لأي شخص أن ينجح في التسويق بالعمولة جيث سوف نعلمك في هذه الدورة استراتيجيات لكسب المال من خلال التسويق بالعمولة اليوم وستساعدك على إنشاء تدفق دخل سلبي يستمر في التدفق إليك بإستمرار


سوف نراجع معكم في هذه الدورة كل أسالبي التسويق بالعمولة و كيف تستطيع جعل التسويق بالعمولة أحد أساليب كسب المال مع التطرق إلى أفضل إستراتيجية يمكن أن تعتمد عليها في حال كنت تريد التركيز للربح من التسويق بالعمولة و تريد أن تجعل هذا المشروع مشروع حقيقي يستمر في العمل معك لعدة سنوات قادمة.


أيضا أشرنا في هذه الدورة إلى كل الأساليب التي يمكنك أن تحصل فيها على منتجات قصد ترويجها في مجال التسويق بالعمولة كما عرضنا عليكم كل المنصات التي توفر منتجات لتسويقها في إطار ربح المال من التسويق بالعمولة هذا و قد راجعنا أكثر من طريقة من أجل العمل في مجال الأفلييت ماركتينغ حيث برهنا لكم في هذه الدورة لماذا يعد إنشاء موقع إلكتروني أفضل طريقة من أجل ربح المال من التسويق بالعمولة و لما يعد أكثرها إستقرارا و إستمرار من بين كل أساليب ربح المال من الافلييت ماركتينغ


بالرغم من أن الكثير من الشركات التي تعمل في مجال التسويق بالعمولة لا تقبل كل من يتقدم للعمل معها إلا أننا في هذه الدورة حرصنا على تقديم شركات تقبل المبتدئين للعمل معهم بنظام الافلييت ماركتينغ لا بل أكثر من ذلك بحيث حرص مقدم الدورة على تقديم مواقع القبول فيها يكون بشكل فوري بحيث تعتبر هذه المواقع مناسب جدا للمبتدئين


سوف نتعلم في هذه الدورة كل ما يلزمك من أجل إحتراف ربح المال من التسويق بالعمولة:
مزايا العمل في مجال التسويق بالعمولة و الربح من الافلييت ماركتينغ

كل ما تحتاجه من أجل بناء نظام جيد يستمر بجعل الأموال تتدفق إليك من الأفلييت ماركتينج
الأدوات اللازمة من أجل بناء بزنس التسويق بالعمولة بالشكل الصحيح
كيف تختار النيتش المناسب لك في مجال التسويق بالعمولة

مراجعة كل أنواع مواقع الحصول على عروض في التسويق بالعمولة
أسرار لن يخبرك بها أي مسوق لمضاعفة أرباحك في مجال التسويق بالعمولة
المميزات التي ستحصل عليها عند الإشتراك في دورة الربح من التسويق بالعمولة:
بمجرد الإشتراك في دورة التسويق بالعمولة سوف تحصل على الكثير من المعلومات متعلقة بجعل خلطة الأفلييت ماركتينغ تعمل معك بشكل جيد، خاصة و أني أخذت الكثير من الدورات في مجال التسويق بالعمولة عندما بدأت مسيرتي و لكني لم أجد الدورة الشاملة التي تغطي كل النقاط الضرورية التي أسعى لإكتشافها كمبتدأ في مجال التسويق بالعمولة.


لهذا أنا جدا متأكد بإنك ستكون راضي مئة بالمئة عن دورة التسويق بالعمولة لأنني عملت على جعلها متكاملة و تحتوي على كل ما يحتاجه المبتدئين من أجل النجاح في مهمة الحصول على تحويلات من مجال الافلييت ماركتينج.


أيضا ستكون قادر على الوصول إلى الدروس الموجودة في دورة التسويق بالعمولة في أي وقت تريده بالإضافة إلى قدرتك على تحميل أي ملف مرفق إن وجد الحاجة لذلك كما أن صاحب دورة التسويق بالعمولة لا يمانع من إجابتك على أي تساؤل يدور في ذهنك لا بل بالعكس تماما سيكون سعيد جدا بحل أي مشكل يواجهك في مجال التسويق بالعمولة


عن مدرب الدورة:
أنا لرقم فارس أعمل في مجال التسويق بالعمولة منذ أكثر من خمس سنوات حققت آلاف الدولارت بعد العمل في مجال التسويق بالعمولة و سوف أجعل منك مسوق ناجح بعد الإنتهاء من هذه الدورة خاصة و أني سوف أشارك معك كل الأسرار التي أعرفها و أطلعك على كل ما أقوم به أنا شخصيا لأجعل مجال الأفلييت ماركتينغ مربح جدا.


بحث كثيرا عن من يشاركني مثل هذه الجزئيات الصغيرة التي تجعلني أنجح حقا في الربح من التسويق بالعمولة و لكني لم أجد صراحة لهذا أضع هذه الدورة المتميزة بين أيديك لهذا أتمنى أن تستفيد منها بحق

courses.description:
Perhaps you have heard the term,"content is king"? Though content promotion used to only be a way to set yourself apart from the competition, it's become a requirement for any contemporary brand.
Content advertising is in the center of most successful electronic marketing and advertising campaigns. Behind every fantastic brand is a plethora of valuable and appropriate content that actually connects with the organization's audience.
However, you might still be wondering, why is content / Affiliate marketing important?


1. Boost brand recognition by creating trust through content advertising
Among the most significant advantages that actually shows the significance of articles promotion is the standing construction qualities of fantastic content. In today's active electronic market, it is essential that companies work to construct confidence with their prospects and clients. Building confidence can help your organization establish a favorable new reputation.
Creating custom articles is a excellent way to get to understand your prospects and clients while creating good will.
When customers read your articles, they begin to come up with a notion of your own brand. If the content they find is engaging, enlightening, and precious, then they're going to begin to think exactly the very same things about your company. The more value you can supply along with your articles, the easier it'll be to build confidence with your intended audience.
Additionally, whenever your prospects and clients begin to realize that you're consistently publishing articles across platforms, they are able to view you as a pioneer in the business. Publishing content via third party books or sharing your own content with influences may also help you build trust in your target industry.


2. Good content aids influence conversions
If you are wondering why is articles advertising significant, then search no farther than the conversion numbers. Here are Only a few of those stats That Actually speak to the significance of articles promotion when it comes to improving site conversions:
Content advertising offers conversion rates roughly 6 times greater than other electronic marketing and advertising procedures. (ABG Basics )
After studying recommendations on a site, 61 percent of online consumers from the U.S. then made a decision to make a buy. (Content Marketing Institute)
Based on 74 percent of organizations surveyed, content advertising has improved their advertising prospects, both in quality and quantity.
Video content will help provide a excellent ROI and significantly improve conversions, based on 72 percent of companies surveyed.


3. Optimized content aids enhance your search engine optimization efforts.
SEO has a significant role in enhancing visibility for your small business online. But if you would like to enhance SEO, you have to produce optimized content.
In accordance with Tech Client, content production is the most successful search engine optimization technique. In reality, company websites which post persistent blog articles have on typical of 434 percent more pages indexed by more search engines compared to the ones who don't publish in any way. The more content you've got on your website, the more pages that the search engine must index and reveal to customers in their search engine results.
Even more webpages does not necessarily lead to greater traffic, it will give your brand the chance to rank for more key words. For example, creating sites on various topics which are related to your intended audience provides you more opportunities to rank for the keywords that those target users are looking for on search engines.


4. Creating good content is a cheap method to bring in fresh leads.


For all those wondering why is articles advertising important, have a peek whatsoever the ways that content can aid your company earn fresh leads. Lead production is essential for smaller companies that rely on constant traffic to cultivate their brand and increase earnings.
Though content promoting prices about 62 percent less than conventional advertising strategies, it creates approximately 3 times as many leads, based on Demand-metric. The affordability of articles promotion makes it a essential strategy for smaller companies that are looking to maximize their funding.
It is important to be aware that content promotion is time intensive, and additionally, it may have some time to observe the outcomes of your attempts. This is particularly true in regards to SEO. But when it comes to producing quality material, a bit can go a very long way. In reality, in accordance with Social Media Examiner, over 81% of entrepreneurs discovered they experienced improved traffic by investing no more than 6 hours each week within their social websites articles.
target_audience: Anyone who is interested in starting their online business
Anyone who wants to make money from home

Discover how to generate revenue through the use of affiliate marketing. Affiliate marketing is the concept of earning a commission in exchange for sending quality leads, sales or actions to other websites and brands. In this course you will learn the basics of affiliate marketing, while also setting yourself off in the right direction to have a side-hobby, part-time or even a full-time online business of your own.
One of the most crucial benefits to starting an online business is that you get to connect and partner with some of the biggest brand names in the world today, like Amazon, Walmart, Target and many others. When getting started with affiliate marketing, it's important to understand the many different ways to target traffic and create content for your audience. This and more will be covered in this course in great detail. Expect to become a master at affiliate marketing once you make your way through this training material.
target_audience: Anyone who would like to use affiliate marketing as a form of monetization for their site, blog or online business.
If you've ever wanted to start an online business or generate revenue online, this course is definitely for you.

courses.description:
Affiliate marketing is a powerful way to make money online without the need for your own product or service. You can leverage the use of an existing product and refer people to it and simply collect your commissions. Sounds easy right?
Well, the truth of the matter is, the concept of affiliate marketing is simple but in reality; you need to know what you are doing in order to be successful with it.
During this course, I demonstrate exactly how you can start a profitable affiliate marketing business by building an authority brand online, generating a following on social media and/or YouTube and starting and growing a healthy email list of prospects who are most likely to be interested in the types of affiliate products that you plan on promoting.

In this course I cover:
- How to make your first $100 as an affiliate
- How to drive free and paid traffic that converts into sales
- How to build a following on YouTube and social media that makes you affiliate commissions
- How to choose the most profitable affiliate products
As a marketing consultant and instructor for LinkedIn, one of the biggest social media platforms of our time, you will be learning from a trusted source without fear of learning methods that will get you kicked off of your affiliate platform.
If you are ready to learn how you can make passive income as an affiliate then enroll today and I look forward to seeing you on the inside!

courses.description:
Start or grow your affiliate marketing business with the GoHighLevel (GHL) online software.
This course will take you from no GHL account to a GHL master in a very short time. All you have to do is start with the provided GHL Snapshot (you'll learn what that is in the course), making it quick and easy to hit the ground running.
You can move your ClickFunnels or MailChimp templates to HighLevel, and it can also replace more than a dozen other paid tools.
Use GHL so you can focus on your content, communications, and conversions instead of fighting with technology tools, whether you're a new affiliate marketer or an old pro.
Influencers are affiliate marketers, too! They focus on social media to generate conversations and traffic. GHL Funnels are the perfect replacement for Linktree / Link in Bio. Capture visitors' contact information through a GHL Form or Survey to grow your own email or text marketing list.
You can be an affiliate for almost any product or service, helping other people find great offers while living the affiliate marketing lifestyle.
Cliff has been an affiliate for dozens of advertisers for over a decade. He'll offer a few affiliate marketing tips and go in-depth with the HighLevel SaaS software (i.e. nothing to install on your computer). Your GHL account will be set up for long-term success.
You'll learn to do all of these with just the GHL software:
Manage your social media profiles by posting new content and replying to DMs
Direct traffic to your funnels (sometimes called landing or bridge pages)
Use forms to build your email list
Keep unlimited contacts organized and segmented
Setup automations to deliver exclusive signup bonuses, send check-in messages, and comply with unsubscribe requests
Send one-on-one or bulk communications via text, email, and voice
The potential benefits of a successful affiliate marketing business:
Develop a personal brand and online following to become an Influencer.
Cultivate great relationships with like-minded people who aren't willing to settle for an unappealing "normal" life.
Make hundreds of dollars each month within just a few months and thousands monthly within 1-2 years, depending on how eager you are.
Help good businesses succeed while getting free accounts, swag, and promos of your own.
Scale your affiliate marketing business while traveling the world without increasing your own business' expenses.
Work hard for a short time to enjoy the long-term benefits, such as a flexible schedule and freedom from financial stress.
The HighLevel software can replace some or all of the functionality delivered by these popular tools:
Calendly, Zoho, Acuity Scheduling (Squarespace), YouCanBookMe
ClickFunnels, MailChimp, ActiveCampaign, ConvertKit, GetResponse
Constant Contact (SharpSpring), Shopify, Duda
Wix, Weebly, Leadpages, Unbounce, Instapage
Kajabi, Thinkific, Podia, SystemeIO
JotForm, Typeform, Wufoo
Pipedrive, Follow Up Boss, Nextiva, Keap, Insightly CRM, Thryv, Nimble, Act-On, Marketo, ActiveDEMAND
Podium, GatherUp, Birdeye, Vendasta
CallRail, EZ Texting, SimpleTexting
Plus, GHL has unlimited usage. Never pay per funnel, website, or number of CRM contacts again! The only thing you're charged for in GHL is your Conversations usage (as it's unreasonable to expect unlimited phone calls, texts, and emails from any platform) – but they have excellent pricing, as pass along their preferred rate from being one of Twilio's largest customers.
The instructor, Cliff, is always willing to hear both positive and negative feedback so that we can all keep getting better.
target_audience: Affiliate marketer (beginner or experienced) interested in making their affiliate business easy to manage through online software.
GoHighLevel is a general purpose online software. This course will teach you how to set it up in a way to be successful with affiliate marketing.
This is not a done-for-you, fully automated, set-it-and-forget-it type of affiliate program.

courses.description:
Que tal iniciar seu negócio digital agora mesmo?
Quanto custa investir em uma franquia de uma grande empresa como Amazon, Shopee, UOL, Hurb ou Magazine Luiza?

O que você talvez não saiba é que você pode se tornar parceiro dessas e de muitas outras gigantes do mercado, sem precisar de um grande investimento inicial.


Conheça o Marketing de Afiliados e descubra como começar a lucrar no mundo digital imediatamente!
O Marketing de Afiliados é uma estratégia inteligente e acessível que permite a qualquer pessoa, como eu e você, atuar como representante comercial na internet. Isso significa promover produtos e serviços de empresas reconhecidas e, ao gerar vendas, receber comissões que podem chegar a impressionantes 80% do valor vendido.


Como funciona na prática?
Uma empresa lança um produto ou serviço na internet.
Afiliados como você ajudam a promover esse produto utilizando redes sociais e outras estratégias de divulgação.
Sempre que alguém compra utilizando seu link personalizado, você recebe uma comissão.
Exemplos reais:
Produto/serviço custa R$ 249,00
Comissão de 45% = R$ 112,00 por venda
1 venda por dia = R$ 3.360,00/mês
E o melhor: você pode trabalhar de onde quiser e construir um negócio com potencial ilimitado.
O que você vai aprender neste curso:
Como se cadastrar nas principais plataformas de afiliados.
Técnicas de divulgação que convertem, sem gastar fortunas.
Como criar links personalizados e estratégias para vender mais.
Ferramentas gratuitas para impulsionar suas vendas.
Exemplos práticos para alcançar resultados rápidos.
Chegou o momento de você iniciar seu negócio digital e transformar seu futuro.
Este curso é completo, atualizado e focado 100% no seu sucesso.


Comece hoje mesmo!

courses.description:
Bạn muốn kiếm tiền với Amazon Affiliate nhưng không muốn xây dựng trang web hay chạy quảng cáo? Nếu bạn đang tìm kiếm một cách đơn giản nhưng hiệu quả để phát triển mạng xã hội và kiếm hoa hồng từ các sản phẩm có giá trị cao mà không cần thiết phải mua thì khóa học này chính là dành cho bạn!
Trong khóa học này, bạn sẽ học cách sử dụng Threads, một nền tảng mạng xã hội nổi mới, để tạo lượng truy cập tự nhiên và biến chúng thành thông tin thực tế thông qua Amazon Affiliate Marketing. Điều đặc biệt là bạn không cần phải sử dụng máy tính – chỉ với một chiếc điện thoại di động, bạn vẫn có thể thực hiện mọi thứ. Đây là cách tạo nguồn thu nhập động cơ bền vững, giúp bạn kiếm tiền ngay cả khi đang nghỉ yên.
Bạn sẽ được học:
1. Cách tạo tài khoản Amazon Affiliate và bắt đầu học hoa hồng ngay lập tức.
2. Bí quyết xây dựng và phát triển tài khoản Chủ đề từ con số 0, ngay cả khi bạn là người mới bắt đầu.
3. Phương pháp tạo lưu lượng truy cập và tăng doanh thu bán hàng mà không cần chi tiền cho quảng cáo.
4. Bí mật kiếm hoa hồng lớn từ các sản phẩm có giá trị cao mà không tốn kém bất kỳ chi phí nào.
5. Cách theo dõi hoạt động và mức độ ưu tiên của thu nhập dài.
Tại sao khóa học này khác biệt?
Đây không chỉ là một từ khóa học "kiếm tiền trực tuyến" thông thường. Thay vì tập trung vào các phương pháp truyền tải như trang web hay quảng cáo trả phí, bạn sẽ học:
1. Cách xây dựng một kênh mạng xã hội Chủ đề hiệu quả, phát triển tự nhiên và dễ dàng kiếm tiền.
2. Chiến lược thực tế giúp tôi đạt hơn 10 triệu lượt xem chỉ trong 3 tháng trên Threads.
3. Các hướng dẫn thực thi, dễ áp dụng, phù hợp cho cả những người mới bắt đầu có kinh nghiệm.
Kết quả bạn nhận được:
Sau khi hoàn thành khóa học, bạn sẽ tự động tin và có đủ công cụ để bắt đầu kiếm tiền với Amazon Affiliate Marketing on Threads – không cần chi phí ban đầu, không cần máy tính, không phải thử sai , chỉ có kết quả thực tế.

Những người mới bắt đầu làm tiếp thị liên kết muốn kiếm tiền trực tuyến nhưng không muốn chi tiền cho các trang web hoặc quảng cáo
Bất kỳ ai quan tâm đến việc thành thạo tiếp thị liên kết Amazon mà không cần thiết lập phức tạp hoặc chi phí trả trước

Программа курса включает в себя введение в аффилиат маркетинг, модели монетизации и стратегии для сайта, в зависимости от его размера. Вы также узнаете о шаблонах для Wordpress и научитесь создавать товарные ревьюшники (под Amazon и другие сайты), обзоры приложений и программ, а также беттинг (ставки на спорт) и гемблинг ревьюшники (онлайн казино).
Affiliate маркетинг - это один из самых популярных и доходных способов заработка в интернете. Если вы хотите научиться зарабатывать на аффилиат маркетинге, то курс "Affiliate маркетинг" поможет вам получить все необходимые знания и навыки.
Программа курса включает в себя все этапы создания успешного сайта в интернете с помощью аффилиат маркетинга. Вы начнете с введения в аффилиат маркетинг и изучите различные модели монетизации. Выберете ту, которая подходит лучше всего для вашего сайта.
Вы узнаете о различных стратегиях для сайта разных размеров, например, для мини-сайта или большого сайта. Выберете нишу для вашего сайта и проанализируете конкурентов. Вы также научитесь выбирать домен для вашего сайта и создавать его на Wordpress.
В рамках курса "Affiliate маркетинг" вы изучите шаблоны для Wordpress, включая шаблон Generatepress. Вы также научитесь создавать товарные ревьюшники, обзоры приложений и программ, а также беттинг ревьюшники. Вы узнаете, как использовать Chat GPT, чтобы найти ключевые слова, где брать текст, как оптимизировать страницу и где брать ссылки на сайт.
Курс также включает работу с командой и поиск подрядчиков. Вы научитесь создавать автора для вашего сайта и выбирать типы контента. Работа с Canva поможет вам создавать красивый и привлекательный контент. Вы узнаете, как добавлять контент на ваш сайт, как создавать структуру страницы и ссылочную стратегию.
Кроме того, в рамках курса "Affiliate маркетинг" вы изучите финансы, связанные с аффилиат маркетингом. Вы узнаете, как управлять своими финансами и как получать выплаты от партнерских программ.
Курс "Affiliate маркетинг" подходит для всех, кто хочет начать свой бизнес в интернете или заработать дополнительный доход. Вы получите все необходимые знания и навыки, чтобы создавать эффективные сайты и зарабатывать на аффилиат маркетинге.

courses.description:
What is Email Marketing?
Email marketing, at it’s core, is pretty straight forward. It’s the use of email messages sent to a list of subscribers to advertise or promote brands, products, offers, events, or pretty much anything you want. Now that “core” definition of email marketing may be simple, but email marketing has come a long way in recent years and there’s actually quite a bit more to it than that, today. We’ll be discussing those advances later in this guide, but first, let’s go over WHY you need email marketing in your business.
Why Email Marketing?
The need for email marketing is one of those things you just can’t argue with because the numbers are just too clear and astounding to ignore.
According to a report by DMA, the average return on investment (ROI) for email marketing these days is $38 for every $1 spent.
And 80% of business professionals report growth in customer acquisition and retention resulting from email marketing. There’s nothing else like it.
Not even social media comes close.
Leads are twice as likely to opt-in to your email list than they are to engage with your business on Facebook. And if you thought social media and search engines were the key to growing your business, think again. Email conversion rates are higher than both search and social combined!
This should come as no surprise, really. Consumers have repeatedly insisted that they LIKE getting promotional messages via email. Over 70% of consumers say email is their preferred channel for business communication and 60% even say they want to receive your marketing emails weekly or MORE often.
So, in light of all the recent trends and data, there’s really no questioning the critical importance of email marketing in your business.
If you’re not using email marketing in your business...


it’s time to start, right now.


The only question is...


Where to start?...


This course will help you answer that question

Ways to automate authority and trust signals using synthetic and real testimonials
How to design seamless funnels with dynamic social proof
Techniques for embedding psychological triggers into email sequences
How to create evergreen funnels that require minimal upkeep

Foundations of Smart Affiliate Marketing: Exploring Smart Automation in Affiliate Marketing with AI
Psychology & Evergreen Automation: AI and Human Psychology: A Perfect Marketing Match
Designing Evergreen Funnels That Run Forever
Affiliate Earnings, Offers & Ethical Gro: Mapping Earnings: Commission vs. Long-Term Value
Evaluating Offers Based on Value and Trust
Refining Your AI-Driven Affiliate Marketing System

requirements: Basic understanding of affiliate or digital marketing
Familiarity with tools like ChatGPT or similar AI platforms
A laptop and internet connection
No coding or advanced tech skills required
courses.description:
Automate, Optimize, and Scale Your Affiliate Marketing with AI
Unlock the power of AI to build trust-based, high-converting affiliate funnels that run on autopilot. In Affiliate Marketing with AI: Automate and Earn Smarter, you’ll follow a practical, step-by-step system that shows how modern marketers use automation and smart psychology to:
Build instant authority with AI personas and dynamic trust signals
Create seamless funnels with social proof and credibility layers
Embed psychological triggers like scarcity and reciprocity
Launch evergreen offers that need little to no ongoing updates
Forecast earnings based on short-term and long-term value
Compare affiliate offers using automated scoring and insights
Stay ethical with compliance-ready disclosures and tools
What You Will Learn
Authority Automation: Use AI to generate personas, testimonials, and trust layers
Funnel Design: Architect seamless flows from click to conversion
AI Psychology Triggers: Apply principles like anchoring and urgency automatically
Evergreen Systems: Set up passive funnels with A/B testing and smart upkeep
Earnings Mapping: Understand commissions, repeat referrals, and customer LTV
Offer Evaluation: Choose and promote affiliate programs that actually convert
Ethical Promotion: Stay compliant while maximizing transparency and trust
Requirements
Basic knowledge of affiliate or digital marketing
Familiarity with AI tools (like ChatGPT or automation platforms)
A computer with internet access
No coding or advanced setup needed
Who Is This Course For?
Affiliate marketers who want smarter, scalable systems
Digital entrepreneurs and solopreneurs building passive income streams
Coaches, content creators, and course sellers promoting partner offers
Marketers looking for ethical, high-trust promotion strategies
Anyone tired of manual marketing and ready to automate with confidence
About the Instructor
Money Makers Academy
We build actionable, scalable courses for digital entrepreneurs, creators, and marketers who want results—not fluff.
Ashraf Said AlMadhoun
Ashraf is an experienced marketer and educator focused on AI tools and business automation. He teaches in a systems-first, practical style designed for immediate use.
FAQ
Q: Do I need prior experience with affiliate marketing?
A: No, this course covers core principles before diving into automation.
Q: Do I need to code or build complex systems?
A: Not at all. Everything is built with no-code tools and step-by-step guidance.
Q: Are templates and automation flows included?
A: Yes, you’ll get access to templates, prompt frameworks, and funnel maps.
Q: What if the course isn’t right for me?
A: Udemy’s 30-day money-back guarantee has you covered.
Q: Can I get help during the course?
A: Yes—use the Q&A section or join live sessions when available.
Enroll now and start building smart, ethical affiliate funnels with AI—automated, scalable, and built to last.
target_audience: Beginners and intermediate affiliate marketers
Entrepreneurs who want passive income through smart automation
Anyone curious about using AI to improve marketing results
Ethical marketers focused on trust and long-term value

courses.description:
سوف تكون قادر على بدأ العمل في مجال الأفلييت ماركتينغ بعد أخذ هذه الدورة و لن تكون بحاجة إلى أي معلومة أخرى بكل بساطة لأن الدورة شاملة، ستكون قادر على تقديم المنتجات بطريقة إحترافية و إستراجيات إغراء لا تقاوم تمكنك من إقناع كل من يشاهدك يتم عمليات الشراء التي تريدها


سوف نتعلم في هذه الدورة:
لماذا ينجح كبار المسوقين و تشفل أنت
كشف كل أسرار نجاح خلطة الربح من الأفلييت ماركتينغ
كيف أبني موقعي الخاص و أبدأ في التسويق للمنتجات
كيف أكسب ثقة العملاء و أجعلهم يشترون من خلالي
إحتراف تسلق نتائج البحث و الحصول على نتائج جد رائعة في الأفلييت بدون إستثمار أي مبالغ
كيف أصيغ إعلاناتي على السوشيال ميديا لتذر علي آلاف الدولارات من الأفلييت ماركتينغ
كيف أحصل على منتجات أسوقها في مجال الأفلييت ماركيتنغ
كيف أعمل على أشهر منصات الأفلييت ماركتينغ
إستراتيجيات خارقة للنجاح في مجال الأفلييت ماركتينغ
كيف أبني النظام و أجعل المال يستمر في التدفق إلي حتى إذا لم أعمل
التسويق المغلق و قدرته على جلب آلاف العملاء في مجال الأفلييت ماركتينغ
أساليب و فنون البيع الحديثة و كيف أستغلها في مجال الأفلييت ماركتينغ
فنون و أساليب الكتابة في مجال الأفلييت ماركتينغ
تم تصميم هذا التدريب خصيصا لكل من يريد بدأ الربح من الأفلييت ماركيتنغ و هو يحتوي على كل التفاصيل، بحيث سوف تبدأ في تعلم كل شيء من الصفر خطوة بخطوة و حتى الإحتراف خاصة و أن الدورة فيها أكثر من عشر ساعات تعلم لحظة الإطلاق، كما أضيفكم علما أنك عند الإشتراك في هذه الدورة سوف تستمر في الحصول على كل التحديثات التي سوف تكون في المستقبل خاصة و كون المدرب يعمل في مجال الأفلييت و مركز عليه بشكل جيد


مميزات كل مشترك لهذه الدورة:
عند الإشتراك في هذه الدورة سوف تحصل على كل المصادر التي تحتاجها من مواقع إلى ملفات و حتى شروحات للمنصات التي سوف نعمل عليها بحيث سوف تكون هذه الدورة متكاملة بشكل جيد جدا خاصة و أن الدورة تحتوي على
عشر أقسام نشرح فيها كل ما يحتاجه كل مبتدأ لا يعرف أي شيء عن المجال
كل قسم مشروح خطوة خطوة لدرجة أن شخص لم يسبق له أن أمسك حاسوب يمكنه أن يبدأ الرحلة معنا
تحتوي الدورة أكثر من عشر ساعات تعليمية لكل ما تجتاجه حتى تحقق أول دولار لك في مجال الأفلييت ماركتينغد
المدرب إعتمد على التكلم باللغة العربية الفصحى حتى تكون الدروس مفهومة لكل طلاب الوطن العربي
الحصول على شهادة من منصة يودمي عند الإنتهاء من الدورة
إذا كنت جاد في العمل في مجال الأفلييت ماركتينغ هذه الدورة سوف تكون مناسبة جدا بالنسبة لك لهذا أتمنى أن تستغل الفرصة و تبدأ في بناء نظامك الخاص للربح من الأفلييت ماركتينغ


عن مدرب الدورة:
أنا لرقم فارس أعمل في مجال الأفلييت ماركتينغ منذ أكثر من خمس سنوات حققت آلاف الدولارت بعد العمل في مجال التسويق بالعمولة و سوف أجعل منك مسوق ناجح بعد الإنتهاء من هذه الدورة خاصة و أني سوف أشارك معك كل الأسرار التي أعرفها و أطلعك على كل ما أقوم به أنا شخصيا لأجعل مجال الأفلييت ماركتينغ مربح بالنسبة لي.


أنشأنا هذه الدورة بكل بساطة حتى نعطيك طرف الخيط الذي يجعلك تجد الطريق الصحيح للنجاح في مجال الأفلييت ماركتينغ لأنه و بكل بساطة تطلب مني الكثير من الوقت حتى أجد الطريق الصحيح للبدأ في كسب المال من الأفلييت ماركتينغ على عكسك أنت عندما تجد من يريك كل الأسرار
target_audience: الدورة مناسبة للمبتدئين
الدورة تحتوي على الكثير من المعلومات و ستكون مفيدة حتى للمحترفين

courses.title: AFFILIATION CASH CHALLENGE :
courses.bio: Le guide complet en 5 étapes pour générer des revenus sur internet sans créer de produits en 2021
objectives: Les secrets des entrepreneurs qui gagnent d'énorme commissions d'affiliation chaque jour, même avec une petite audience…
Les fondamentaux d'une affiliation rentable
Générer du trafic sur un produit
Vendre un produit auprès d'une communauté

3 - Devenir un ambassadeur du produit /: 3 - Devenir un ambassadeur du produit / service
4 - Les 6 stratégies de vente/promotion: 4 - Les 6 stratégies de vente/promotion prêtes à l'emploi

requirements: Pour suivre ce cours il est necéssaire d'être concentré et attentif afin d'appliquer correctement les stratégies présentées pour maximiser ses chances d'avoir de vrais résultats.
courses.description:
Oui, gagner sa vie avec l'affiliation en 2022, c'est possible.


Créer des produits comme des formations vidéo par exemple, ce n’est pas toujours facile.


Pour les débutants qui viennent de se lancer, c’est juste trop gros.


Trouver un sujet, une audience, une idée, créer un plan, savoir quoi dire, tout enregistrer, héberger, mettre en vente…


Quand on débute il faut commencer petit et tester son marché.


La bonne nouvelle, c'est qu'on peut le faire avec des produits déjà prêts et faciles à vendre.




Il y a aussi ceux qui ont déjà quelques produits à vendre…


Mais qui se privent de chiffre d’affaires tout le reste du temps, quand ils ne lancent pas de nouveau produit.


C’est dommage, parce qu’ils pourraient peut-être doubler leurs revenus…


…s’ils avaient d’autres produits à proposer.




La création de produits, présente de nombreux avantages, mais il faut admettre une chose :


L’affiliation, c’est beaucoup plus facile.


Il suffit de trouver un programme qui paye bien, de s’inscrire, de récupérer le lien, et de le partager à une audience.


Tu pourrais avoir un produit prêt à vendre dans les 5 prochaines minutes…


Et toucher 30 à 50% de commission sur chaque vente.




Le problème…


C’est justement que c’est facile.


Et comme c’est facile, beaucoup de gens sont sur le coup.


Des milliers de créateurs de contenu vivotent en casant leurs liens d’affiliation par-ci par-là…


Et très peu sont ceux qui arrivent à en tirer de gros revenus…


…jusqu’à maintenant.




J’ai étudié et analysé des "business model" de créateurs de contenu, qui pour certains, génèrent plus de 10.000€ par mois juste avec des liens d’affiliation et une toute petite audience…




Si beaucoup de gens n'arrivent pas à vire de l'affiliation,


C’est que la plupart qui font de l’affiliation s’y prennent très mal.


Ils essayent de caser leurs liens à droite à gauche sans réelle stratégie…


Ils emmerdent tout le monde, perdent leur temps et leur énergie et récoltent des miettes.




Pendant ce temps…


Une minorité d’entre eux ont élaboré des stratégies payantes.


Et sont devenus, en quelques mois, des références de l’affiliation francophone.


J'ai dépensé du temps et de l'argent pour découvrir leurs secrets…


Et j’ai compris leur méthode.




Cette méthode…


Je vais te la révéler dans un instant.






Mais juste avant…


Parlons de ce qui ne marche pas.


- Ça ne marche pas de se lancer dans un sujet, puis de chercher des programmes d’affiliation pour “monétiser" son blog ou sa chaine YouTube.


- Ça ne marche pas de cumuler les programmes d’affiliation qui rapportent peu (Amazon, grande distribution…) alors qu’il en existe de beaucoup plus rentables.


- Ça ne marche pas de partager ses liens à tout va sans prendre le temps de construire une relation de confiance avec une audience.


- Ça ne marche pas de se positionner sur trop de programmes en même temps et de s’éparpiller.




Les opportunistes et ceux qui cherchent les gains à court terme disparaissent rapidement.


Si tu ne veux pas échouer dans l’affiliation, tu dois avoir une vraie stratégie.


Une stratégie efficace, rentable, et durable.




Avec celle que je vais te proposer dans quelques secondes…


Tu vas apprendre non seulement à générer de vrais revenus d’entreprise avec l’affiliation…


…mais tu vas aussi poser les bases d’un business durable basé sur une audience solide et une expertise, qui te permettra, plus tard si tu le souhaites, de vendre tes propres produits.


Autrement dit : tu vas t’enrichir, tout en construisant un business beaucoup plus gros.




Cette méthode ?


C’est 3 étapes simples :


Étape 1 : Identifier 2 ou 3 produits qui rapportent gros


Étape 2 : Se positionner dessus, et devenir le promoteur n°1 de ce produit


Étape 3 : Diversifier ses revenus pour plus de stabilité, sans y passer plus de temps




La clé pour réussir dans l’affiliation…


C’est la concentration.


Il faut identifier 2 ou 3 programmes maximum.


Des produits chers, populaires, à rendement récurrents, et à commission élevée.




Il faut ensuite devenir le spécialiste de ces produits.


Leur ambassadeur : la personne vers qui se tourner quand on a besoin d’infos.


Créer des contenus et des références que les gens vont utiliser pendant des années…


Et convaincre les gens, par la persuasion, de passer par notre lien affilié pour acheter les produits en question.




Enfin, il faut diversifier nos revenus avec des produits secondaires.


Avoir toujours leur lien affilié à portée de clic, et les caser dès que tu en as l’occasion.


Cette étape ne prend pas beaucoup de temps, mais permet d’augmenter ses revenus de 20 à 30%, et d’avoir une sécurité si les programmes principaux ferment.




Concrètement, comment tu peux mettre en place cette méthode ?


J’ai créé un grand plan d’action pour l'appliquer pas à pas..


Ce plan est basé sur ce qui fonctionne déjà, l'objectif n'est pas de réinventer la roue, j'ai pu pour cela m'appuyer sur ma propre expérience de 7 ans de création de contenu…


Cette méthode va t’apprendre à devenir une de ces rares figures francophones de l’affiliation…


Et de t’extraire de la masse des “affamés” qui se partagent les miettes.




Cette méthode…


Je la partage dans les 2 prochaines offres,






C’est la formation que j’aurais voulu avoir quand je me suis lancé en 2019.


Une méthode contraire à ce que tout le monde fait, et qui permet de rafler 80% des gains.


Une méthode qui m’aurait permis, dès le début, de me positionner en tant que spécialiste d’un sujet, et commencer à construire mon audience.


Et surtout, une méthode qui m’aurait permis de commencer à gagner ma vie beaucoup plus tôt.




Attention :


Ce n’est pas une formation pour générer un simple complément de revenus, ou arrondir ses fins de mois.


C’est une formation pour ceux qui prennent ça au sérieux et cherchent de vrais résultats.


Si tu suis cette formation sérieusement et que tu appliques ce que tu vas apprendre…


L’affiliation peut devenir le coeur de ton business, et te rapporter des gains pendant des années (même quand tu auras arrêté).




Pour tout te dire…


J’ai appliqué une partie de cette méthode sans m’en rendre compte, il y a quelques mois, sur un produit dont je te parle en détail dans la formation …


Et j’ai déjà été payé plus de 2000$ en commissions d’affiliation, simplement en partageant un lien affilié sous l'une de mes vidéo youtube.




Dès la fin du premier module…


Tu sauras quels sont les critères, et où trouver un programme d’affiliation qui rapporte gros. Je te donnerai même des idées de programmes sous-exploités, sur lesquels tu pourrais bâtir une fortune.


Dès la fin de la formation, tu auras entre les mains une méthode utilisée par les plus gros affiliés francophones pour générer, pour certains, plus de 10.000€ par mois de commissions d’affiliation.


L’objectif à long terme, c’est de monter une activité florissante autour de l’affiliation, et d’être capable, facilement, de créer tes propres produits en cas de besoin.


Cette méthode est détaillée les 5 modules de cette formation :


PARTIE 1 - Les 5 piliers fondamentaux de l'affiliation

Pourquoi la méthode utilisée par la plupart des gens qui font de l’affiliation ne permet pas de gagner de grosses sommes, et ce qu’il faut faire à la place…

La méthode la plus rentable pour vivre de l’affiliation en 2021, en 5 étapes simples…

Les 5 piliers nécessaires pour réussir en affiliation.

PARTIE 2 - Identifier et Sélectionner les "programmes gagnants"

Les 6 thématiques les plus rentables pour faire de l’affiliation et construire un business qui dure…

courses.description:
Pasif Gelir Yaratma: Online İş Modelleri ve Affiliate Pazarlama
Günümüzde, birçok kişi finansal özgürlüğe ulaşmanın yollarını aramaktadır. Pasif gelir, bu hedefe ulaşmanın etkili bir yoludur. Pasif gelir, çalışırken de gelir elde etmenizi sağlayan bir yöntemdir. İnternetin yaygınlaşmasıyla birlikte, online iş modelleri ve affiliate pazarlama gibi fırsatlar, pasif gelir elde etmek isteyenler için büyük bir potansiyel sunmaktadır.
Affiliate pazarlama, online iş modelleri arasında popüler bir seçenektir. Bu iş modeli, ürünlerinizi satmak veya tanıtmak için başka bir şirketin ürünlerini kullanmanıza olanak sağlar. Affiliate pazarlama, pasif gelir elde etmek isteyenler için ideal bir seçenektir çünkü ürün sahipleri, ürünlerinin tanıtımını yapmanız karşılığında size komisyon öderler. Bu şekilde, ürünü satın almak veya müşterileri çekmek için aktif bir şekilde çalışmanız gerekmez.
Clickbank Affiliate Marketing, affiliate pazarlama dünyasında büyük bir oyuncudur. Clickbank, çeşitli niş kategorilerde birçok ürün sunan bir dijital platformdur. Clickbank affiliate marketing ile başarılı olmak için, öncelikle seçtiğiniz nişe odaklanmanız önemlidir. Belirli bir niş kategoride çalışmak, hedef kitlenize odaklanmanızı ve daha etkili bir pazarlama stratejisi oluşturmanızı sağlar. Örneğin, fitness ekipmanları, diyet takviyeleri veya dijital pazarlama araçları gibi belirli bir niş seçebilirsiniz.
Affiliate pazarlama işine girmeden önce, Clickbank'in arayüz panelini anlamak önemlidir. Arayüz paneli, ürünleri incelemeniz, satışları izlemeniz ve ödemelerinizi takip etmeniz için gereklidir. Bu paneldeki verileri doğru bir şekilde analiz ederek, hangi ürünlerin daha fazla satış yaptığını ve size daha fazla komisyon getirebileceğini belirleyebilirsiniz. Ödeme ayarlarınızı da doğru bir şekilde yapılandırarak, kazançlarınızı hızlı ve güvenilir bir şekilde alabilirsiniz.
Vendor & affiliate marketing, Clickbank affiliate marketing dünyasında dikkat etmeniz gereken bir başka önemli konudur. Ürün ararken, kaliteli ve talep gören ürünleri seçmek önemlidir. İyi bir ürün seçimi yaparak, müşterilere değerli bir çözüm sunabilirsiniz. Aynı zamanda, satış ortaklığı yaptığınız şirketin itibarını ve müşteri memnuniyetini de dikkate almanız önemlidir. İyi bir işbirliği yaptığınızda, uzun vadeli ve sürdürülebilir bir gelir elde etme şansınız artar.
Affiliate pazarlamada, satışları artırmak için farklı pazarlama yöntemleri kullanabilirsiniz. Bunlardan biri, email marketing yöntemleridir. Müşterilerinize düzenli olarak değerli içerikler sunarak, güvenilirliğinizi artırabilir ve daha fazla satış yapabilirsiniz. E-posta listeleri oluşturarak, potansiyel müşterilerinizi hedefleyebilir ve onlara özel teklifler sunabilirsiniz. Bu, müşterilerinizi elde tutmanızı ve tekrar satış yapmanızı sağlayan etkili bir yöntemdir.
Affiliate pazarlamada önemli bir unsurlardan biri de landing page (ineleme sayfası) kullanmaktır. Bir landing page, potansiyel müşterileri yönlendirdiğiniz özel bir web sayfasıdır. Bu sayfada, ürün hakkında daha fazla bilgi verir, faydalarını vurgular ve müşterilerin satın alma kararını teşvik edici unsurlar sunarsınız. İyi bir landing page oluşturmak, satışlarınızı artırmanın etkili bir yoludur çünkü daha fazla dönüşüm elde etmenize yardımcı olur.
Clickbank affiliate marketing için kullanabileceğiniz birçok ücretli ve ücretsiz yazılım bulunmaktadır. Bu yazılımlar, pazarlama sürecinizi otomatikleştirmenize ve verimliliğinizi artırmanıza yardımcı olabilir. Ürünlerinizi takip etmek, linkleri yönetmek ve analitik verileri analiz etmek için bu yazılımlardan faydalanabilirsiniz. İyi bir araştırma yaparak, ihtiyaçlarınıza en uygun olanı seçebilir ve affiliate pazarlama işinizi daha verimli hale getirebilirsiniz.
Sonuç olarak, pasif gelir elde etmek için online iş modelleri arasında affiliate pazarlama büyük bir potansiyele sahiptir. Clickbank affiliate marketing, bu alanda başarılı olmanızı sağlayacak önemli bir platformdur. Seçtiğiniz nişe odaklanarak, arayüz panelini anlayarak, kaliteli ürünler seçerek ve etkili pazarlama yöntemlerini kullanarak, pasif gelirinizi artırabilirsiniz. Affiliate pazarlamada landing page ve email marketing gibi stratejileri kullanmak da dönüşümlerinizi artırmada yardımcı olacaktır. Ücretli ve ücretsiz yazılımları kullanarak da işinizi otomatikleştirebilir ve daha verimli hale getirebilirsiniz. Affiliate pazarlama, disiplinli çalışma ve sürekli öğrenme ile uzun vadeli bir başarı elde etmeniz mümkündür. Ayrıca, pasif gelirin önemli bir yönü de gelirinizi çeşitlendirmektir. Sadece tek bir affiliate pazarlama programına bağlı kalmak yerine, farklı ürünler ve hizmetler sunan farklı platformlara da katılabilirsiniz. Bu şekilde, gelirinizi çeşitlendirirken riskinizi de dağıtmış olursunuz.
Affiliate pazarlama işini pasif gelir elde etmek için bir fırsat olarak görmek, düzenli bir gelir akışı yaratmanın yanı sıra zamanınızı ve özgürlüğünüzü de artırmanıza yardımcı olabilir. Ancak, başarılı bir şekilde pasif gelir elde etmek için, işe başlamadan önce bazı temel adımları da atmanız gerekmektedir. Bunlar arasında hedefler belirlemek, pazarı araştırmak, strateji oluşturmak ve sürekli olarak sonuçları analiz etmek yer almaktadır.
Hedefler belirlemek, pasif gelir elde etme yolculuğunuzun birinci adımıdır. Belirli gelir hedefleri ve zaman çerçeveleri belirleyerek kendinizi motive edebilir ve ilerlemenizi izleyebilirsiniz. Bu hedefler, daha fazla gelir elde etmek için kendinizi geliştirmeniz ve işinizi büyütmeniz için birer rehber niteliği taşır.
Pazarı araştırmak, başarılı bir affiliate pazarlamacı olmanın temel taşlarından biridir. Seçtiğiniz nişi ve hedef kitlenizi anlamak, onlara değerli içerikler sunmak ve ihtiyaçlarını karşılamak için önemlidir. Pazar araştırması yaparken, trendleri takip etmek, rekabeti analiz etmek ve müşteri geri bildirimlerini gözlemlemek gibi yöntemlerden faydalanabilirsiniz.
Bir strateji oluşturmak, başarılı bir affiliate pazarlamacı olmanın diğer bir önemli adımıdır. Hangi pazarlama kanallarını kullanacağınızı, nasıl içerikler üreteceğinizi ve hedef kitlenize nasıl ulaşacağınızı belirlemek için bir plan yapmalısınız. Sosyal medya, blog yazıları, videolar veya e-posta pazarlaması gibi farklı stratejileri bir araya getirerek etkili bir pazarlama planı oluşturabilirsiniz.
Son olarak, sonuçları analiz etmek ve sürekli olarak öğrenmek, pasif gelirinizi artırmanın ve işinizi büyütmenin anahtarıdır. Hangi stratejilerin daha iyi performans gösterdiğini, hangi ürünlerin daha fazla satış yaptığını ve müşteri geri bildirimlerini düzenli olarak izlemelisiniz. Bu verileri kullanarak, pazarlama stratejinizi optimize edebilir, zayıf noktalarınızı güçlendirebilir ve daha iyi sonuçlar elde edebilirsiniz.
Pasif gelir elde etmek için affiliate pazarlama gibi online iş modelleri, finansal özgürlüğe giden yolda önemli bir araçtır. Ancak, bu iş modelinin başarılı olabilmesi için sabır, tutarlılık ve öğrenmeye açık olmak gerekmektedir. Başarılı bir şekilde pasif gelir elde etmek için hedefler belirlemeli, pazarı araştırmalı, strateji oluşturmalı ve sürekli olarak sonuçları analiz etmelisiniz. Böylece, zamanla gelirinizi artırabilir ve finansal özgürlüğe bir adım daha yaklaşabilirsiniz.
target_audience: Sıfırdan başlayarak iş kurmak isteyenler.

courses.description:
I have earned between $500,000 and $600,000 in Adsense revenue over the past 8 years. In this short course I explain both the simple steps to get started and the advanced principles that expert Adsense users leverage to optimize their earnings.
Millions of people earn money from their websites using Adsense. You can do it too!
Follow the steps in this course and you will quickly:
Get an Adsense account established
Put ads on your website
Begin seeing earnings in your Adsense account
That’s the great news.
But you will go way beyond simply getting setup with the basics. In this course you will:
Learn the behind the scenes process that give ads their revenue power
Be able to recognize websites that have done a lousy job with Adsense
Put the right kind of ads, in the right places on your site from the very beginning
Use the Adsense dashboard to tweak and refine your Adsense strategy
Choose topics for your website that will attract the highest paying ads
Avoid the trap of getting your Adsense account canceled
Get the right WordPress plugins installed to give you all the flexibility you need
See live examples of extreme Adsense success
How Are We Going To Do This?
Quite simply we are going to cover the action steps and the principles you need to know, in the right order. You will know what to do and when to do it, but also know why you are doing it.
I’ve been burned and I’ve been blessed. I’ll tell you the straight scoop on how and why then tell you what you need to do to get more of the blessing part and less of the burning.
So you will:
Learn about how Adsense works
Get an Adsense account setup
Put the first ad on your website
Wait for Adsense to approve your website and your account
See how the placement of your ads makes a huge difference in your revenue
Learn the details of ad types
Install the plugins you need to put ads on your site
Paste the Adsense code in the right spots so ads show up where you want them
Get used to checking out the numbers in your dashboard and see where your money is coming from
Learn how the content on your website makes a difference in how much money you make from ads
Learn what things to avoid so that your Adsense account stays healthy and happy
See the money start coming in and tweak everything to increase your earnings
Is This For You?
That depends. This is for beginners (even though experts would benefit from the tips and advice).
It is for two categories of people:
1) Those who have a website and are ready to start making some money from Adsense
2) Those who don’t have a website but want to understand the Adsense revenue strategy
If that’s not you, check out my other courses!
If it is you, I’ll see you in Module 1.
target_audience: Those with limited or no exposure to Google Adsense
Those who wish to understand the inner workings and advantages of Adsense

Incluso si no tienes experiencia previa en ventas, este curso te proporcionará las bases sólidas que necesitas para tener éxito. Este curso te guiará paso a paso para que puedas dominar las ventas de afiliados de manera fácil y divertida.


¡Descubre cómo vender de forma natural, ética y auténtica!

Desde hace mas de 8 años ganamos dinero online promocionando productos como afiliados. Actualmente el marketing de afiliados es una industria que genera mas de 7 billones de dolares al año en todo el mundo y continua creciendo año tras año.

Are you looking to build a profitable affiliate marketing business in the fast-growing online gambling industry? Whether you're a beginner or an experienced marketer, this course will equip you with the knowledge and strategies needed to succeed in this competitive and highly regulated sector.
Affiliate marketing is one of the most lucrative ways to earn passive income online, and the iGaming industry (comprising online casinos, sportsbooks, and poker platforms) offers some of the highest commission rates. However, succeeding as a gambling affiliate requires more than just signing up for an affiliate program. You need to understand the business models, compliance requirements, marketing strategies, and optimization techniques that will help you stand out.
In this course, you'll learn how to choose the best affiliate programs, create compelling content, drive targeted traffic, and optimize your conversions. We’ll explore different commission structures (CPA, Revenue Share, Hybrid), discuss responsible gambling and regulatory challenges, and dive into digital marketing techniques such as SEO, social media, and paid ads.

courses.description:
Getting started with email marketing was designed to teach someone step by step how to build a profitable email list. You'll learn how to build your list in any niche, create lead magnets, create high converting opt-in pages, and how to optimize your emails for maximum ROI.


This course is beginner-friendly and perfect for someone who has never built a list to get started the right way the first time.


While at the same time advanced enough that if you are already an email marketer but have not hit your full potential, this course is also for you.


Whether you want to build an email list for your products, agency, coaching program, or promote affiliate products, this course has something for everyone.


We start with the very basics of list building. But then we dive into more advanced topics like open rates, subject lines, and copywriting.
As any great email marketer will tell you, subject lines are an essential part of any good email because if your subject line doesn't hook your subscribers, they won't open your emails. If your emails are not getting opened, your email marketing days are DOA. In this course, we make sure that never happens.


And don't get me wrong, opens are the first significant step in being a successful email marketer, but then we want the almighty click because if nobody even sees your offers, you can't make any money. Our copywriting section will solve that problem by showing you how to write your emails so your subscribers won't be able to go without your products our services.

courses.description:
The Email Marketing Essentials video course was created to educate an individual who has the interest in learning how to send profitable emails.   The course videos are packed with email marketing essential information, from the basic definitions of email marketing terms to methods of profiting from your emails.
At the completion of just the first three lessons, you will have gained enough knowledge and understanding to recognize the basic email marketing terms; detailed information about opt-in pages and how to optimize them; and of course, what is a lead magnet, why is the lead magnet important, and some examples of lead magnets.
The remaining lessons deal with sending strategies for your emails.  The three Sending Strategies are:  The Basics, The Copy and the Subject Lines.
In the Basics lesson you will see an overall visual description of a basic email.  You will learn what the elements of the email are called, what their function is, what makes them unique and important, and what do they relate to (open rates, product you may be selling, when to send, clicks…).
In the Subject Line lesson, I will go over different types of subject lines and words you can use to get someone to open your email.
Finally, in the Copy lesson I will show you the difference between short copy and the long copy, what are the benefits of each, when to use each and why you could create a hybrid of the two.

courses.description:
هل تحلم ببدء مشروعك الخاص على الإنترنت وتحقيق دخل ثابت ومستدام؟ هذا الكورس هو دليلك الشامل لاحتراف الأونلاين بيزنس والأونلاين ماركتينج من البداية وحتى تحقيق النجاح.


ستتعلم خلال الكورس:
- كيفية اختيار فكرة مشروع أونلاين مربح بناءً على اهتماماتك وخبراتك.
- الأساسيات التقنية لبناء موقع إلكتروني أو منصة تسويقية.
- استراتيجيات التسويق الرقمي الفعّالة لجذب العملاء وتحقيق المبيعات.
- كيفية استخدام أدوات التسويق مثل الإعلانات الممولة، البريد الإلكتروني، وتحليل البيانات.
- أسرار إنشاء مصادر دخل متعددة عبر الإنترنت مثل الأفلييت ماركتينج، الدروبشيبينج، وغيرها.


الكورس مناسب للمبتدئين وأيضًا لمن لديهم خبرة ويرغبون في تطوير أعمالهم الحالية.


ابدأ الآن رحلتك نحو بناء مشروع أونلاين ناجح بخطوات عملية واستراتيجيات مُجربة، واجعل حلم الاستقلال المالي حقيقة


خلال هذا الكورس، ستتعلم أيضًا كيفية تطوير خطة عمل واضحة تتماشى مع أهدافك، وكيفية تحديد جمهورك المستهدف وتوجيه رسالتك التسويقية بشكل فعال. سنغطي أيضًا استراتيجيات تسويق المحتوى، تحسين محركات البحث ، والتسويق عبر وسائل التواصل الاجتماعي لبناء حضور قوي على الإنترنت.


كما ستتعرف على كيفية استخدام أدوات التحليل والمتابعة لقياس نتائج حملاتك وتحقيق أقصى استفادة من استثمارك في التسويق. ستحصل على نصائح عملية لإدارة الوقت والموارد بشكل أكثر فعالية، وستتعلم كيف تحافظ على استدامة مشروعك عبر التوسع والتطوير المستمر.


الكورس مصمم ليكون دليلك الشامل والممتع، مع شرح مبسط للمواضيع المعقدة وأمثلة عملية توضح لك كل خطوة. إذا كنت جادًا في بناء مشروع أونلاين ناجح وتحقيق دخل مستدام، فهذا الكورس هو المكان المثالي للبدء.


استعد لتحقيق النجاح والوصول إلى أهدافك المالية من خلال الأونلاين بيزنس والأونلاين ماركتينج
