courses.description:
Criar uma estrutura milionária na internet não é tão difícil quanto parece. É necessário apenas ter o método certo e produtos bons.
Com o método, eu posso ajudar. Neste treinamento, você vai ter o plano completo para construir um negócio que rode igual relógio suíço, vendendo para todas as faixas de renda, alcançando o máximo do seu público.
Não importa o seu nicho ou fama, com esse passo a passo, mesmo que esteja começando e ninguém te conheça, você vai montar uma estrutura campeã usada pelos maiores nomes do empreendedorismo digital.
Sobre o Professor Victor Palandi
Começou a ganhar dinheiro na internet aos 14 anos. Foi redator freelancer dos 15 aos 18 anos - até abrir a sua agência de Marketing de Conteúdo: Agência Palandi.
Neste mesmo período, começou a criar cursos e treinamentos, online e presencial, sobre Marketing Digital, Copywriting e Marketing de Conteúdo.
Em 2016, abriu a Fantastik, empresa focada em eBooks e cursos, onde alcançou mais de 10 mil alunos e fez eventos para milhares de pessoas de todo o Brasil.
Em 2018, lançou o seu livro Copywriting Descomplicado, a primeira obra impressa sobre copywriting no Brasil, rapidamente se tornando best-seller na Amazon.
Hoje, é empresário, escritor, atleta amador e idealizador do KopyFest, o principal evento de copywriting no país.
Recentemente, lançou a sua obra Partido Persuasão, em que analisa 14 discursos políticos e mostra em detalhes todas as técnicas utilizadas para persuadir e conquistar o coração dos eleitores - conteúdo inédito no Brasil.
Seu objetivo é contribuir para que mais e mais pessoas possam ter acesso aos segredos do copywriting e da persuasão, tanto para se protegerem dos vendedores quanto para utilizar as técnicas em seus próprios negócios e no cotidiano também.
Embarque nesse conteúdo inédito, faça anotações, aprenda muito e divirta-se!

objectives: アフィリエイトの歴史に関する知識
先発組のアフィリエイターを駆逐する方法
コーチングアフィリエイトに必要なスキル

コンバートの発想（市場の外からお客さんを持ってくる）
フロントエンド商品とバックエンド商品の作り方

はじめに: はじめにお読みください
レベル1：コーチングアフィリエイトの基礎: 気持ちの悪いアフィリエイトの歴史から
後発組なんて存在しない。みんな先発組
今後アフィリエイターに必要となる知識
耐久性のあるアフィリエイト
レベル2：コーチングアフィリエイトの実践: プログラムそのものを特典にして売上を伸ばす方法
レベル3：コーチングアフィリエイトの応用: ノードとリンク（フロントエンド商品とバックエンド商品）
プログラムの売り方（実践編）

requirements: インターネットビジネスの基礎知識
「商流」という言葉の意味がわからない人は受講しない方がいいと思います
courses.description:
このコースは、アメリカで主流になっているコーチングアフィリエイトという手法について解説します。レクチャーのほとんど全てが動画で説明されていますので、文字を読むのが苦手だったり、通学通勤中にサクッと知識を詰め込みたい方にオススメです。
土日を使い、（コーヒーと）紙とペンを用意し、集中的に学習をすればサササと修了することができます。しかし、一つ一つのレクチャーは、言うなればカルピスの原液のように濃い水滴の塊なので、何度も反芻しながら、水で薄める努力が必要になります。
未だに「特典をX個つけます」のような、すでにアメリカでは全く使われていない手法すらも、日本では散見することができます。これは非常に悲しいことです。だって、わざわざお客に嫌われることをやっているんですから。
良くも悪くもアメリカの経済システムは合理的です。その時で一番効率の良い手法が勝ち残ります。情報販売の世界ではプロダクトローンチフォーミュラがその市場を席巻し、多くの人がその手法を学びました。（現在の無料オファー・ブームですね）
プロダクトローンチフォーミュラと双璧をなすビジネスモデルがあります。そのモデルはアフィリエイト業界で使われている「コーチングアフィリエイト」という手法。
僕がかつて住んでいた札幌市にはコーチャンフォーという大型書店があります。Coach And Four で、4つの車輪を意味します。Coacnの元々の語源は、車輪です。馬車が乗客を目的地へ連れて行くという意味から転じて、人の才能を開花させ、彼らの目標達成を促す手法としてのコーチングが生まれました。
この講座で紹介するコーチングアフィリエイトという手法も、お客さんを目的地に連れ行く！というコンセプトに基づき構築されたマーケティング手法です。
日本でも天才肌のアフィリエイターはすでにこのコーチングアフィリエイトと似た手法を独自に導き出して実行しているようです。今回は、その手法を体系的に、もちろん理論的なバックグラウンドを説明しながら、その魅力に迫っていきたいと思います。
target_audience: アフィリエイトでうまくいっていない人

So, if you are looking for that final breakthrough, that last little push towards success, you are in the right place.
I always like to ask my students
What’s your normal morning routine like? Think about it
Now imagine waking up, bright and fresh, maybe in a strange land, checking your email, and seeing affiliate commissions landing in your inbox overnight
Or maybe you are out with family and friends, eating a fancy meal with your loved ones, not slaving away in a job, and your phone dings, another commission, earning money on autopilot.
I’m going to show you how to make this scenario and affiliate marketing a reality for yourself.
Because, when you learn what I'm going to teach you, it makes life fun... to see and hear those email dings coming in… YOUR very own system is set up and running, working its magic, even while YOU sleep.


************************************************


But what if you’re not qualified?
Here’s the truth about affiliate marketing
You don’t need to be an expert,
You don’t need to have done this before to promote products and make sales,
You don’t need to be a university, college, or even high school graduate
And, you don’t need to spend thousands of dollars to make this a reality.
This training is specifically created with the goal of you being successful with it (not purchasing and leaving it like so many others)
Also, it is created to ensure that you take the required steps to get your first niche affiliate marketing business up and running in a super quick time.
When you go through the training videos you will have to do tasks,
Once you have finished them, tick them off the list, send me a check-in, it's that straightforward.


A simple training structure (not over complicated like so many others) that has taken people just like You with absolute zero knowledge of the internet and affiliate marketing and given them the formula to create an income-producing affiliate business.


************************************************
WHY TAKE THIS AFFILIATE COURSE AND NOT ANOTHER ONE?
Well, this affiliate marketing training is based on a strategy that works, and that over time this strategy gets stronger and produces more income, called the compounding effect.
It uses SEO (Search Engine Optimization) and utilizes search engines, like Google, Yahoo, and Bing to make money for free. The compounding effect works when you create content for your niche affiliate sites...
************************************************


More Content Over Time EQUALS More Compounding EQUALS More Sales.
Plus I show you the easiest way to find super relevant content for any niche online, without even having to create it yourself.
Vs.
What many people teach and only really applies to experienced marketers.
They teach setting up landing pages and using overly priced Facebook and Instagram Ads. This can work but has a huge and expensive learning curve to see any profit.
For a start, Facebook Ad costs have gone through the roof, and affiliates are in a panic. And with the iOS update on Apple phones, it means that you are able to actually reach fewer people than before.


Fewer people to reach EQUALS More competition for the ads EQUALS MORE expensive ads.


Plus,
When people are browsing social media, they are relaxing, chilling out, talking with friends, stalking ex gfs and bfs, etc… their intent is NOT to purchase products.
So actually converting them into sales is really a long and expensive process (and better left until you have a solid affiliate business producing you income to enable you to test things).
Unlike a person searching on Google, Bing, or Yahoo for a solution to their problem,
When your website appears they are actually actively looking for the solution you are offering,
So that means they convert at a much higher rate.


Searching For A Real Solution To A Problem EQUALS A Higher Likelihood To Convert To A Sale For You.
If you have fallen for the social media gurus before, don’t worry, many of my students have been in the same predicament before they came to me.
So, for a change, you will learn the real fundamentals of the internet.
The skills and strategies haven’t changed since marketing began.
These are the things that actually WILL work for you, no matter the niche you want to be in, and in a much quicker time.
Do you want to get real results for a change?
Do you want to be able to quit your job and work on your online business?
You will be able to easily follow along with the over-the-shoulder step-by-step approach to help this become a reality for you…
Simply do what I do, and let me guide you to succeeding online.


************************************************
************************************************
How This Affiliate Marketing Training works
The training is split into 2 parts, totaling 9 modules.
In the first part of the training, you will discover the exact steps you need to find niche affiliate products, get the best domain names, create content using SEO  or search engine optimization, which gives you tons of free visitors, and how to make websites that personally bring me in $80 to $300 a day, and even more.
This section of the training is full of the fundamental techniques that are designed to build your confidence with affiliate marketing and help you make your first affiliate sale in as little time as possible.
In the second part of this course, you will learn how to turn your website onto autopilot and increase your sales 10X by utilizing email marketing, quiz marketing, website power-boosting backlinking, and clever content tricks that Google loves and gives you tons of free traffic, always.
Here is a quick summary of what you will take away from this course
Understanding how you can make money online in ANY niche,
How to pick the perfect products so you know they will convert into sales, not all products are created equally,
How to create content that lures in visitors and makes sales super quickly,
How to plan, design, and build niche affiliate sites easily,
How to build a long term sustainable online business and income,
How to apply what you learn to many other digital marketing niches. This is the stuff that will make you a very wealthy person.
HOW THIS AFFILIATE MARKETING COURSE IS STRUCTURED - 9 MAIN Modules
************************************************
************************************************


Part 1 Affiliate Marketing
This is all about affiliate marketing
What affiliate marketing actually is,
How it will work for you,
What you will be promoting,
How to find the right affiliate program on networks like Clickbank, Amazon, Market Health, etc.
How you will get paid for what you do,
But not only that, how to find the right industry, company, products or services, and partnerships to promote, in any niche, using the power of Google to help you find them.
I’ll show you how to find thousands of products and brands with a simple search, ready to be plucked up by you and used to create monthly affiliate revenue.
You'll also uncover
How to look at affiliate products and programs to know whether they are good or bad,
And in addition, you will KNOW if that product will sell well for you or not.
This is the real foundational base of what affiliate marketers do, so you can understand how and why you will make money with this online business.


:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::


Part 2 Niche Selection
When you know how to pick the right affiliate marketing niche to enter, your affiliate marketing work and journey to success become a whole lot easier and quicker.
But
If you pick the wrong merchant to promote you might not make even a dime and waste your valuable time.
The key here is knowing how to look at niche markets and then
Actually See Inside Them,
And Spot The Perfect Angle To Profit.
Because without knowing the Niche within the Niche, you will face too much competition and it will become so much harder to make any sales.
Here's an example: Yoga vs Yoga For Women With Arthritis, a wide market vs targeted market.
Which one do you go for easier affiliate sales?
Yep, Yoga For Women With Arthritis.
But, most beginners don't this, they jump on the affiliate product or service that is on-trend, or in too wide a niche, or because they heard another famous affiliate marketer made a million dollars with it.
This is where the problems happen.
And when success eludes beginners and they make no referrals, they feel like a failure, burned by affiliate marketing, but that's not the case...
And is the complete opposite of what you will feel when you complete this section.


:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::


Part 3 How To Pick The Perfect Domains
You may not know it, but there is an art and science to picking the perfect domain name for your website.
Have you tried? Not so easy right?
You see, not all domain names are created equal.
If you pick the right domain
It can help your affiliate website convert more visitors into referral sales,
And also help you rank really well in the search engines.
If you pick the wrong one
It can completely turn off visitors before they even get to your site.
PS It’s not a good idea to call your website something like
CiaransReviews dot com or MariasBlog dot com.
On top of knowing how to pick the best type of domain for your new online business, you will discover
The best way to trick Google and the search engines into thinking your brand new website has been around for years,
And that you are an experienced authority in your niche or service area, even though you aren’t.


:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::


Part 4 Clustering Of Your Content
Following on from the domain section, imagine you could unwrap the secrets to make your website or blog instantly resonate with Google.
A little-known formula that makes the search engines think that your website is the best in your chosen niche...
Well that was what clustering is about!
You will be finding what is called a 'super-targeted niche'.
Not a wide niche like Golf or Yoga, we will go deeper inside these niches to find the gold (like mentioned above).
You will then find all of the related supporting topics to help your targeted niche excel.
This is where the power-up starts to happen!
Next, you will craft extremely well-liked content (I'll show you how) around these things:
That gets so much respect from the search engines,
Shoots your new website up past your competition,
To the top of the search engines, and...
In front of the people ready to solve their problem and get your solution.
Even if you are not a writer, or have never done this before.
Without this,
Your affiliate link and website will lie unvisited on page 10 or 20 of the search results and not make ANY sales.
You are going to love the ease and simplicity of this overlooked content structuring strategy.






Part 5 - Your Website, Your Hub
This is the final module of Part #1.
This is where you take everything that you have done in the last few modules and bring it together on your newly created affiliate website.
You will follow along step by step as I bring you through the whole niche affiliate website setup, from:
Purchasing your first domain,
Getting your hosting set up,
Your website created,
Your content is uploaded, and then
The gold of SEO is Content Optimization.
When done correctly following this specific optimization formula, you will get an unfair advantage, and create:
Extremely strong audience targeted high converting content,
That talks directly to your customer or buyer,
And the search engines at the same time,
Creating an automatic machine that brings in more and more sales the longer it is active.
You will get addicted to creating these websites, and the more you create the better and easier they will become. I can get them set up now, in about 4 hours from start to finish.
And when you follow along, build yours out and learn the process, you will be able to do it too, but you need to learn it first.




Part 6 – Email Marketing
Once you have gotten here well done. You are onto the first Module of Part #2.
With everything that you have learned so far, you can have a fully functioning and long-term sustainable business created...
And have your email ding with new commissions daily…
But, imagine being able to take everything you have done and then inject it with turbo fuel.
Well, that is what email marketing does.
It turns your website into a money-printing machine due to the power of what is called permission marketing. You get permission to send people affiliate offers anytime you want!
You will unlock how to:
How to set up and manage your email software,
Craft engaging email marketing emails,
Build up your first indoctrination email sequence (you get the templates),
Create your subscriber grabbing squeeze pages (which gathers your client's email address),
And bridge pages (which helps you convert more visitors into sales), but not only that…
You'll discover the keys to the beautifully cunning ethical bribe.
The Ethical Bribe is used to convince people to give you their email address. You create it in such a way that the person who sees it would be silly to turn down your offer.
You do all of the above, so you can sell (and provide value) to your customers for the lifetime they are on your email list.
One Email Subscriber Can Mean Multiple Sales Over Their Lifetime.
Now consider the average value of 1 subscriber on an email list equals $1 Per Month.
Now imagine if you had 5,000 or 10,000 subscribers.






Part 7 – Quiz Marketing
In this module, we take email marketing to the next level.
And you'll discover the clever little Quiz marketing strategy that converts more people into sales, by actually helping them solve the problems they have through quizzes (even if they are just doing them for fun).
Quizzes are highly engaging, massively shareable, and more likely to go viral than any other form of content.
This means that more and more people see your affiliate offers, and also convert them into sales.
You'll learn
How To Find Readymade Quizzes Already Working In Your Niche,
How to grab them to use for yourself,
How to set them up to get more email subscribers,
And how to convert more quiz users into sales.
Your new affiliate marketing business will skyrocket by utilizing quizzes to increase your monthly income levels.






Part 8 – Back Linking
In this module, you will learn one of the key elements that will make your affiliate marketing website super strong, and impervious to new competition.
And these are called backlinks - little votes of confidence showing that you have a great website.
There are a few really important things that Google views as critical to a good website publisher.
They are deciding factors in how high Google ranks your website in the search engines.
The better and more relevant these links, the more Google sees your website like the one to rank higher in the search engine results.
Note The higher you rank the more visitors you get; the more sales you make.
And that is what this section is about.
Who wouldn’t want to jump past their competition into position number 1, and keep that position no matter how much they try to pass you.
When you know how easy backlinks are to get, you will become addicted to them, and also see your website get so much more traffic.
Real SEO gold.






Part 9 – NOOR Strategy
Finally, in this last module, you learn the NOOR strategy.
Basically, this means No Other Option Ranking.
It is a strategy that is based on a simple mathematical formula!
Don't Let That Scare You!
It is super easy to implement (like 5 years old easy) once you know the steps.
NOOR is about getting floods of visitors to your website FOR FREE within a super short space of time.

Gives the search engines no other option but to rank your affiliate website and products,

Are you looking to make some money and replace your job?
“Discover How An Ex English Teacher Makes $277 Each and Every Day with TWO Simple Youtube Videos…and FREE Traffic”

Let me give you the EXACT step-by-step system and proven templates so you can COPY and profit in as little as 24-hours.
You’ve FINALLY found the secret that most gurus won’t tell you about.
Everyone knows that the "money is in the list". It's one of those sayings that you hear over and over again because, well, it's true.
All you need to do is just send a quick email to your list, and a few minutes later the money starts flooding into your Paypal account.
And the great thing is you don't have to worry about Google updating the search engine, or being reliant on another businesses whims like Facebook or Adsense flushing your income down the toilet overnight.
When you've got your OWN profitable email list it's YOU that control your destiny!!!
I mean, it's pretty amazing when you have it figured out...
But there's a BIG problem.
How the Hell can you build this "magical" email list that everyone is always talking about?
And once you have that email list built, what's the best way to consistently make money from it in a way that people will buy from you over and over again.
95% of people are doing this the WRONG way:
They pay for their leads when they could be getting them for FREE
They have NO relationship whatsoever with their list, so they convert poorly
They don't have a system they can follow, so more often then not they forget about their list and it gets unresponsive
When they try to sell to their list it doesn't convert because they are missing the KEY strategies that make subscribers buy from you OVER and OVER again.
I’ve been able to build up a REAL business that provides me and my family with a comfortable lifestyle and the FREEDOM to choose how we want to spend our time.
I just wanted to find a simple method that worked!
I tried method after method.
But it was through those countless failures (I had 750 Adsense sites wiped out overnight with a Google slap AND I lost $10,000 in a morning when I had a CPA account banned) that I was able to come to the realization that I needed to build a REAL business and not just find some loophole that would eventually be plugged.
But then I found a much EASIER way.
A way that doesn’t involve building back links, writing articles, or spending money on traffic.
Heck, you don’t need to spend ANY money to get started.
I'll be the first to admit that I made a lot of mistakes at first and it took me much longer than it’s going to take you if you follow my formula.
But after lots of trial and error I developed a system that takes me LESS than 2 hours per day and brings in OVER $277 in profits PER DAY!!!
Yeah, that’s right…I get paid $138.50 per hour…and I LOVE my work.
This is my typical morning:
I get out of bed, leisurely stumble to the kitchen (half asleep), grab a cup of steaming hot coffee, and then sit down at my desk to check my email for all the incoming Paypal payments I've received while I was sleeping.
So how do I do it?
1. I choose an affiliate offer to promote.
2. I record a simple video and mail it to my email list.
3. I then create another simple video and mail it to my email list.
4. I sit back and watch the money come into my Paypal account and the FREE email subscribers join my list.
It’s the simplest way of making money that I know.

My name is Mike Thomas, but a lot of people know me as "Mike From Maine" from my interview show at MikeFromMaine.

I know that you’re looking for something to buy—something that you can pick up that can help make you a boatload of passive income. The other thing I know? You’ve seen some pretty expensive courses or MLM packages that simply don't work.
You Have A Choice To Make…
You Can TRY Something Else OR You Can Make A SINGLE Micro-Investment Right Now That Could Have You Living Like This…
Let me tell you about the work that went into putting together this PROVEN blueprint that I’m about to show you. I’ve spent over a THOUSAND hours interviewing over 500 successful online entrepreneurs about their products and courses over the last year-and-a-half.
You better believe I learned a thing or two.
I’ve put together a video training that will show you EVERY detail of how I’ve gone from a shiny-object-loophole-push-button chaser to having a business that earns me about $277 per DAY.
I know what it’s like to be BOMBARDED with theoretical idea after idea, so my MISSION was to create a course that would literally WIPE AWAY the confusion and literally FORCE you to be successful.

For you to see success, it isn’t going to take YEARS.

Video 3: Income Cash Calculation System – Let’s talk about income. Learn how to track your expenses and stay in the black. Most businesses fail because they can’t manage numbers. We’re going to do what NO OTHER course does—we’re going to talk about managing numbers so YOU can be successful.
Video 4: Audience Conversion Cash Cow – The bigger your audience, the more money you can make. The secret to building an internet marketing presence is engaging with and growing your audience. I’ll show you what people want to hear and you’ll become a magnet that attracts them.
Video 5: The Authority Rub-off System– You don’t need to know ANYTHING right now about ANY NICHE. I’ll show you how to become THE AUTHORITY on VIRTUALLY ANYTHING just by associating with people who are “in the know.” Discover how to become and expert overnight and get the leverage you need to build sales relationships and CLOSE.
Video 6: The VALUE Enhancer – I’ll show you what it means to PROVIDE REAL VALUE. Learn why you need to avoid useless content and how you can provide a true service that will have visitors coming back to you over and over again. When they keep coming back, you need profiting—either with your own products or through affiliate offers.
Video 7: Networking For PROFIT – Learn how to network with other people in your niche and turn your relationships into profit. We’re covering all of this before we even talk about product creation or affiliate marketing, because to REALLY understand marketing, you’ve got to know the big picture.
Video 8: Your Daily ATM – How to build your email list and market to it. Discover the value of hidden resources that can help you build a successful list that you can leverage to make THOUSANDS in passive income. Learn about the tools that internet marketers don’t want you to know.
Video 9: 24-Hour Product Creation – Sounds just like the title. Learn the basics of product creation and how to develop your own offers. This is where the REAL BIG money is in internet marketing. It’s not about BUYING something from someone else to sell—it’s about being the marketer who CREATES.
Video 10: The No-Product-Needed System- We’re saving the best for the END. You can’t master affiliate marketing until you understand the FIRST 9 STEPS of this program. Most courses start right out with this—where do they go wrong? Well, if you learned about affiliate marketing secrets first, you’d just leave the course confused.
Video 11: Scaling Secrets – How to be SMART about growing your business to make more money. Yes, you’re going to start making GOOD money immediately. But, to get to HUGE LEVELS OF PASSIVE INCOME that will allow you to never work again, you’ve got to re-invest that money into your business with intelligence.
Video 12: The $1 Start – Learn how you can get started making money tomorrow with just $1. Total investment including the cost of this course? $10.97. This is UNHEARD OF. No one gives away this kind of information and gets you started for that price.
PART TWO- THE $277/day QUICK START FORMULA
In this section I'll give you actionable steps that you can follow to repeat my success. There's no theory here: Just a REAL blueprint that will get you from zero to hero!
Inside I'll walk you through REAL LIFE examples of how I make consistent affiliate commissions with ease.
Awesome Testimonials:

Affiliate Income Secrets details Mike’s complete business model, & it’s a business model that literally anyone can pick up and run with regardless of experience and technical ability.

courses.description:
Affiliate Marketing: Komplettpaket für Affiliate Einsteiger - Affiliate Marketing mit Social Media, Youtube & Telegram mit Amazon Affiliate und Digistore für dein Online Einkommen
Wenn du schon immer einmal online Geld verdienen wolltest, bist du bestimmt schon auf den Begriff "Affiliate-Marketing" gestoßen. Vielleicht hast du auch schon einige Videos zu diesem Thema gesehen oder dir Bücher dazu gekauft, aber immer noch keine Erfolge erzielt!? Dann ist dieser Kurs genau das Richtige für dich. Hier erfährst du in einfachen und verständlichen Worten, wie Affiliate Marketing wirklich funktioniert und wie du das Konzept auf verschiedenen Plattformen wie Social Media (Instagram, TikTok, X (Twitter), Pinterest und Facebook), sowie mit Youtube, einem Telegram Newsletter und dem Quora Forum erfolgreich umsetzen kannst. Dabei setzen wir auf bewährte Strategien für Affiliate-Partnerprogramme von Amazon und Digistore.
Affiliate-Marketing ist ein großartiges Geschäftsmodell. Du erhältst eine Provision, wenn jemand die Produkte kauft, die du bewirbst. Du bist nicht der Verkäufer, sondern der Vermittler und musst demnach keine Zeit für die Erstellung von Produkten aufwenden. Und dennoch kannst du durch Affiliate-Verkäufe jede Menge Geld verdienen. Wer würde dieses Geschäftsmodell nicht lieben?


Das Affiliate-Marketing-Komplettpaket für Einsteiger ist ein umfassender Videokurs zum Thema Affiliate-Marketing. Der Kurs ist eine Schritt-für-Schritt-Anleitung zum Online-Einkommen durch Affiliate-Marketing mit Social Media, Youtube, Telegram, dem Amazon Affiliate-Programm und Digistore. Beginne noch heute deine Affiliate-Marketing-Reise mit diesem Kurs und lerne, wie du langfristig hohe Einnahmen erzielen kannst.
In unserem Kurs lernst du auch die kritischen Affiliate-Marketing-Fehler, die du vermeiden solltest! Wir zeigen dir, wie du profitable Nischen und Produkte auswählst, die das höchste Einkommen generieren können.
Der Schlüssel zum Erfolg beim Affiliate-Marketing liegt darin, ausreichend Traffic auf deine Links zu lenken. Du musst kein Geld investieren, um Traffic zu generieren, da du über Plattformen wie YouTube, Social Media und andere Quellen eine Vielzahl von Besuchern erreichen kannst. Dies erfordert jedoch harte Arbeit und Geduld, die du mitbringen musst, um langfristig erfolgreich zu sein.


Affiliate Basics: Es gibt sie nicht umsonst!
Im Affiliate-Marketing gibt es keine kostenlosen Mittagessen. Jeder Erfolg erfordert Einsatz und Engagement. Dieser Abschnitt widmet sich den grundlegenden Prinzipien des Affiliate-Marketings und betont die Bedeutung von Engagement, Ausdauer und Strategie. Wir zeigen dir, warum es wichtig ist, in deine Affiliate-Marketing-Bemühungen zu investieren und wie du langfristige Erfolge erzielen kannst, wenn du die Grundlagen richtig verstehst und anwendest.


Affiliate Marketing Thema & Produktwahl
Die Auswahl des richtigen Themas und Produkts ist entscheidend für den Erfolg im Affiliate-Marketing. In diesem Abschnitt lernst du, wie du profitable Nischen identifizierst, die zu deinen Interessen und Kenntnissen passen. Wir geben dir praktische Tipps und Strategien an die Hand, um lukrative Produkte auszuwählen, die eine hohe Nachfrage haben und dir stabile Einnahmen bieten können. Von der Marktforschung bis zur Produktbewertung erfährst du alles, was du wissen musst, um kluge Entscheidungen bei der Thema- und Produktwahl zu treffen.


Wichtige Begriffe für erfolgreiches Affiliate Marketing
Im Affiliate-Marketing gibt es eine Vielzahl von Fachbegriffen, die du kennen solltest, um erfolgreich zu sein. In diesem Abschnitt erklären wir dir die wichtigsten Begriffe und Konzepte, von Cookies und Conversion-Raten bis hin zu Provisionen und Click-Through-Rates. Wir machen dich mit der Sprache des Affiliate-Marketings vertraut, damit du besser verstehen kannst, wie dieses Geschäftsmodell funktioniert und wie du effektiv damit arbeiten kannst.


Zielgruppe & Bedarfsanalyse
Der Schlüssel zu erfolgreichem Affiliate-Marketing liegt darin, deine Zielgruppe genau zu kennen und ihre Bedürfnisse zu verstehen. In diesem Abschnitt lernst du, wie du eine detaillierte Zielgruppenanalyse durchführst und herausfindest, was deine potenziellen Kunden wirklich wollen und brauchen. Wir zeigen dir, wie du Zielgruppenprofile erstellst, Markttrends identifizierst und deine Marketingstrategie entsprechend anpasst, um deine Zielgruppe optimal anzusprechen.


Suchbegriffe, Kaufabsichten & Leads
Erfolgreiches Affiliate-Marketing erfordert eine gründliche Keyword-Recherche und ein Verständnis für die Kaufabsichten deiner Zielgruppe. In diesem Abschnitt lernst du, wie du relevante Suchbegriffe identifizierst, die das Interesse und die Kaufabsicht potenzieller Kunden anzeigen. Wir zeigen dir, wie du hochwertige Leads generierst und deine Affiliate-Links gezielt einsetzt, um Conversions zu maximieren und deine Einnahmen zu steigern.


Einstieg in die Affiliate Plattformen (Amazon Affiliate)
Der Einstieg in Affiliate-Marketing-Plattformen ist ein wichtiger Schritt für angehende Affiliate-Vermarkter. Im Fokus dieses Abschnitts steht der Amazon-Partnerprogramm (Amazon Associates), eine der größten und bekanntesten Affiliate-Plattformen. Wir führen dich durch den Anmeldeprozess, zeigen dir, wie du deine Affiliate-Links erstellst und wie du das Amazon-Partnerprogramm effektiv nutzt, um Einnahmen zu generieren. Von Produktrecherche bis hin zur Analyse von Berichten lernst du, wie du das Beste aus dem Amazon-Partnerprogramm herausholst.


Eine zweite Affiliate Plattform (Digistore)
Neben Amazon gibt es eine Vielzahl von anderen Affiliate-Plattformen, die lukrative Möglichkeiten bieten, Geld online zu verdienen. In diesem Abschnitt konzentrieren wir uns auf Digistore24, eine beliebte Plattform für digitale Produkte und Infoprodukte. Wir zeigen dir, wie du dich bei Digistore24 registrierst, wie du passende Produkte findest und wie du deine Affiliate-Links erstellst, um Provisionen zu verdienen. Entdecke neue Möglichkeiten und erweitere dein Affiliate-Marketing-Portfolio mit Digistore24.


Eine dritte Affiliate Plattform (FinanceAds)
Für diejenigen, die sich im Finanzbereich engagieren möchten, ist FinanceAds eine erstklassige Wahl für Affiliate-Marketing. In diesem Abschnitt stellen wir dir FinanceAds vor, eine Affiliate-Plattform, die sich auf Finanzprodukte und -dienstleistungen spezialisiert hat. Wir zeigen dir, wie du dich bei FinanceAds anmelden kannst, welche Arten von Angeboten verfügbar sind und wie du deine Affiliate-Kampagnen optimierst, um maximalen Erfolg zu erzielen. Erfahre, wie du mit FinanceAds finanziell belohnt wirst und dein Einkommen steigerst.


Affiliate Marketing mit Instagram
Instagram ist eine der beliebtesten Plattformen für Influencer und Affiliate-Vermarkter. In diesem Abschnitt lernst du, wie du Instagram effektiv für dein Affiliate-Marketing nutzt. Wir geben dir Tipps und Strategien an die Hand, wie du eine engagierte Followerschaft aufbaust, hochwertigen Content erstellst und deine Affiliate-Links auf Instagram einsetzt, um Einnahmen zu generieren. Entdecke die Möglichkeiten von Instagram und starte deine Affiliate-Marketing-Reise auf dieser beliebten Plattform.


Affiliate Marketing mit Pinterest
Pinterest ist eine visuelle Plattform, die sich ideal für Affiliate-Marketing eignet. In diesem Abschnitt zeigen wir dir, wie du Pinterest effektiv nutzt, um Traffic zu generieren und Affiliate-Einnahmen zu erzielen. Wir geben dir Tipps zur Erstellung ansprechender Pins, zur Optimierung deines Profils und zur Nutzung von Pinterest-Boards, um deine Affiliate-Links zu teilen. Erfahre, wie du Pinterest als leistungsstarkes Werkzeug für dein Affiliate-Marketing einsetzen kannst und wie du damit deine Reichweite und Einnahmen steigerst.


Affiliate Marketing mit Youtube
Youtube ist eine der größten Video-Plattformen der Welt und bietet immense Möglichkeiten für Affiliate-Vermarkter. In diesem Abschnitt lernst du, wie du Youtube effektiv für dein Affiliate-Marketing nutzt. Wir zeigen dir, wie du hochwertige Videos erstellst, deine Inhalte optimierst und deine Affiliate-Links geschickt einsetzt, um Einnahmen zu generieren. Entdecke die Geheimnisse erfolgreicher Affiliate-Marketing-Kanäle auf Youtube und starte deine eigene erfolgreiche Affiliate-Marketing-Karriere.


Affiliate Marketing mit Facebook
Facebook ist eine der ältesten und bekanntesten Social-Media-Plattformen und bietet vielfältige Möglichkeiten für Affiliate-Marketing. In diesem Abschnitt erfährst du, wie du Facebook effektiv für dein Affiliate-Marketing einsetzt. Wir zeigen dir, wie du eine engagierte Facebook-Community aufbaust, hochwertige Inhalte teilst und deine Affiliate-Links auf Facebook präsentierst, um Einnahmen zu generieren. Erfahre, wie du Facebook als leistungsstarkes Werkzeug für dein Affiliate-Marketing nutzt und wie du damit deine Reichweite und Einnahmen steigerst.


Affiliate Marketing mit TikTok
TikTok ist eine der am schnellsten wachsenden Social-Media-Plattformen und bietet enorme Chancen für Affiliate-Vermarkter. In diesem Abschnitt lernst du, wie du TikTok effektiv für dein Affiliate-Marketing einsetzt. Wir zeigen dir, wie du ansprechende TikTok-Videos erstellst, deine Reichweite aufbaust und deine Affiliate-Links geschickt einsetzt, um Einnahmen zu generieren. Entdecke die Möglichkeiten von TikTok und starte deine Affiliate-Marketing-Reise auf dieser aufstrebenden Plattform.


Affiliate Marketing mit Quora
Quora ist eine Frage-und-Antwort-Plattform, die sich ideal für Affiliate-Marketing eignet. In diesem Abschnitt zeigen wir dir, wie du Quora effektiv nutzt, um Traffic zu generieren und Affiliate-Einnahmen zu erzielen. Wir geben dir Tipps zur Beantwortung von Fragen, zur Optimierung deines Profils und zur Platzierung deiner Affiliate-Links, um Einnahmen zu generieren. Erfahre, wie du Quora als leistungsstarkes Werkzeug für dein Affiliate-Marketing einsetzen kannst und wie du damit deine Reichweite und Einnahmen steigerst.


ChatGPT & KI für Social Media:
In diesem Abschnitt sprechen wir über die Optimierung deiner Social-Media-Präsenz und zeigen dir, wie du mithilfe von Künstlicher Intelligenz und ChatGPT kreative Ideen für soziale Medien entwickeln und in ansprechende visuelle Inhalte umsetzen kannst. Entdecke AI-gesteuerte Brainstorming-Techniken, verbessere deine Content-Erstellung und steigere die Interaktion durch mitreißende Bildunterschriften. Meistere die Hashtag-Strategie mit KI-Unterstützung, organisiere deine Inhalte mit einem Content-Kalender und vertiefe das Engagement durch effektive Kommentarantworten. Künstliche Intelligenz und ChatGPT spielen eine zentrale Rolle bei der Steigerung deiner Social-Media-Performance.


ChatGPT: Landing Pages und Produktbeschreibungen mit KI
Entdecke die neuesten Innovationen und Strategien, wie du Künstliche Intelligenz (KI), insbesondere ChatGPT, nutzen kannst, um Aufmerksamkeit zu erregen und überzeugende Produktbeschreibungen sowie Landing Pages zu erstellen. Wir konzentrieren uns auf wichtige Bereiche wie die Gestaltung fesselnder Titel, die Erstellung ansprechender Einleitungen und Listen, die Verwendung des FAB-Modells für überzeugende Argumente und die Formulierung effektiver Handlungsaufforderungen (Call-to-Actions, CTA). Mit diesen Strategien und ChatGPT als deinem Partner kannst du Landing Pages und Produktbeschreibungen erstellen, die deine Zielgruppe ansprechen und überzeugen. Steigere die Conversion-Raten, gewinne Kundenvertrauen und maximiere den Erfolg deiner Produkte und Dienstleistungen, indem du aufmerksamkeitsstarke Landing Pages und verlockende Produktbeschreibungen erstellst, die deine Besucher begeistern werden.

courses.description:
Welcome to the "6 Figure Supplements Affiliate Marketing Autopilot System," a comprehensive course designed to teach you the ins and outs of building a profitable affiliate marketing business in the supplements niche. This affordable course will equip you with the skills and tools necessary to create a thriving, automated business that generates passive income without the need for coding or extensive technical knowledge.


In this course, you will learn how to master affiliate marketing through various Affiliate Networks, including Amazon Associates and ClickBank. You will discover how to create a stunning, mobile-friendly WordPress website using the Elementor page builder and the JNews theme – all with No coding experience.


Dive into the world of SEO, as we take you from zero to hero with our in-depth lessons on on-page SEO, backlink outreach, and Ahrefs keyword research. Uncover your competition's secrets through Ahrefs and SimilarWeb competition analysis and reverse-engineer their business model for your success.


Master content creation with the power of ChatGPT, a cutting-edge tool that will revolutionize your blogging and SEO efforts. Learn how to build unique tools, such as calorie calculators and water intake trackers, using ChatGPT – all without writing a single line of code.


This course also covers essential aspects of web security, teaching you how to protect and backup your website. Get hands-on experience with the Gutenberg editor, and effortlessly connect your website to Mailchimp for seamless email marketing integration. Enhance user experience by adding subscription forms and attention-grabbing popups to grow your audience.


Finally, you'll learn how to convert your WordPress website into a mobile app and reverse-engineer your competition's business model to skyrocket your sales and marketing efforts. By the end of this course, you will have built a solid foundation in affiliate marketing, automation, and WordPress web development, setting you on the path to a 6-figure business model.


Join us now and unlock the secrets to building a successful supplements affiliate marketing empire, complete with passive income and a strong brand presence. Enroll in the "6 Figure Supplements Affiliate Marketing Autopilot System" today and take the first step towards a thriving online business.
target_audience: Aspiring entrepreneurs seeking a proven, passive income stream in the digital space.
Affiliate marketers looking to optimize their strategies and maximize earnings.
Website owners wanting to master WordPress, SEO, and content creation techniques.
Individuals striving for financial freedom and a scalable, automated online business.

Ce qu'est l'affiliation sur internet et comment ça marche
Qu'est ce qu'une plateforme d'affiliation et comment en choisir une adaptée à son activité
Combien ça coûte et combien ça peut rapporter
Combien de temps faut-il allouer à l'affiliation en tant qu'entrepreneur
Comment bien gérer son affiliation une fois en place

Qu'est ce que l'affiliation: Les différentes façons de faire de l'affiliation
Que se passe-t-il lors d'une vente ?
Quelle plateforme d'affiliation est fait: Déterminez la plateforme d'affiliation faite pour vous
Par où commencer pour se lancer ?: La configuration de votre compte annonceur
Ce qu'il faut savoir juste avant de créer son réseau d'éditeurs
Quel type d'affiliation pour quel annonceur ?
Comment définir son programme d'affiliat: Se positionner sur les options de rémunérations
Que faire après le lancement ?: Rédigeons la page de présentation de votre programme d'affiliation

requirements: Aucun
courses.description:
Vous avez flairé du potentiel du côté de l'affiliation pour votre activité ? C'est qu'il y a probablement quelque chose à faire ! Si votre produit s'y prête, l'affiliation peut être un game-changer et faire décoller votre chiffre d'affaire en quelques semaines.
Pour se lancer, ce n'est pas compliqué : tout le monde peut y arriver mais attention à ne pas griller les étapes : il faut comprendre de quoi on parle et être vigilant sur certains points clés.
Dans cette formation, j'ai synthétiser tout ce que j'aurai aimé connaitre au moment de me lancer et qu'il m'a fallu plusieurs années d'expérience pour maîtriser. Je m'adresse aux entrepreneurs occupés qui souhaitent recourir aux services d'une plateforme d'affiliation.  L'objectif est de gagner du temps dans vos débuts dans le monde de l'affiliation, pour voir TRÈS vite des résultats et comprendre comment maximiser vos revenus à moindre frais.


Ce que je vous apprends :
- le vocabulaire de base du métier pour s'y retrouver
- comment utiliser une plateforme d'affiliation
- comment définir son programme d'affiliation
- comment attirer des affiliés
- comment gérer un réseau d'affiliés efficacement
- comment savoir où on va en mesurant les résultats


Vous trouverez des exercices pratiques CONCRETS ET PRAGMATIQUES tout au long de la formation pour être DIRECTEMENT OPÉRATIONNEL.


Parce que l'affiliation ce n'est pas compliqué mais il faut bien s'y mettre pour en bénéficier vous aussi.


Bonne formation !
target_audience: Les entrepreneurs commercialisant leurs produits ou services en ligne qui souhaitent se lancer dans l'affiliation
Les personnes étant décidées à mettre en place un programme d'affiliation et qui souhaitent savoir comment faire concrètement
Les personnes cherchant à concevoir et animer un programme d'affiliation
Les personnes qui souhaitent comprendre ce qu'est l'affiliation et en quoi cela peut être utile à leur activité

NO shortcuts.

Say YES to getting your promising legitimate business based on marketing automation!
Affiliate Marketing is a serious business that requires all your dedication and focus.
But what if I told you that you could automate all the tedious tasks that waste countless hours of your work and just let you earn money with Telegram, while you can focus on growing your audience?
With affiliate programs such as Amazon Associates, you can earn money using Telegram as a tool to promote products from the most famous brands to your audience automatically, and receive a commission for every purchase made through your link!
Telegram is the best upcoming platform for affiliate marketing because it lets you create your stream of products to show your audience and earn a commission every time a user buys from your link. No coding or experience required.
Now don't worry if you aren't familiar with Telegram or Affiliate marketing, because we will take a step by step approach.

In this course, I'm going to show you how to use Telegram as your tool to make money with Affiliate Programs like Amazon and many more.
People trust Amazon and other well-established platforms; that's the reason why they are so successful. You can be successful too as their affiliate.
Affiliate income is reliable and secure because you independently earn money, recommending products from famous brands without effort.
Automate and customize your affiliate income in a way that would not be possible without Telegram. If you want to know more, enrol now or just look at the free preview video for this course!

courses.description:
はじめまして、旅するブログコンサルタントの山口加奈子（Kanako）です。
ブログ歴は7年、現在200名以上のコンサル生をブログ収益化に導いてきました。




あなたは、こんな悩みを抱えていませんか？


AIライティングを使って効率よく記事を作成したいけれど取り組み方がわからない
SEO基礎知識がなく書いてもなかなかアクセスが集まらない
ChatGPTを使い始めたけど書いた記事が上位表示できない


あなたは毎日、熱心にブログを更新しているのに、思うようにアクセス数が伸びず、もどかしい思いをしていませんか？
せっかく時間を割いて記事を書いても、誰にも読まれずに埋もれてしまう。




そんな経験、一度はあるのではないでしょうか。


・時間と労力をかけて書いた記事がそもそも上位表示しない
・上位表示は一時的にできてもすぐに順位が下がってしまう
・どんなに質を意識しても順位は上がらない




私も同じ悩みを抱えていたことがあります。


日々ブログを更新し、SEOについて学んでは試行錯誤を繰り返す日々。なかなかうまくいかず挫折しそうになったことは何度もあります。


アップデートが起きると何を書いても全く順位が上がらなくなることもありました。


そんな時、AIの力を借りてSEOライティングを行う方法を発見しました。


この方法を使うと、新規ブログでもコースで解説している相性の良いキーワードを見つけることができるので、最速で1時間以内に上位表示ができるようになりました。


AIの文章生成能力のおかげで1記事の作成時間もたったの30分。


正直AIの力にびっくりしましたし、私が行っているやり方をクライアントさんにも教えた所同じような結果を出していただけるようになりました。


直近の事例でも初心者の方の方が初月から10〜30記事程度で、1日100pv超えです。これらすべてAIが書いた記事。AdSense審査にも通過済み。


そして、経験者の方もプロンプトなどを参考に記事書きを始められた方は、ブログのアクセスが10倍になりました。


これって実はめちゃくちゃすごいことなんですよね！


私はもちろん、私のクライアントさんにも今はほぼ全員ChatGPTを使っていただいて、単なるアクセスアップだけではなく、AIツールを使い、順位を上げることにも成功しています。


この劇的な変化とAIの素晴らしさからもっと多くの方に伝授してお役に立ちたいと思い（というより使わないなんてもったいなさすぎるでしょ！というおせっかいな気持ちもあり...）「ChatGPT×SEOライティング革命！30日で検索1位を目指せるAI時代の爆速アクセスアップ術」というコースをゼロからつくりました。


このコースでは、どんなAIツールでも応用が可能な「ChatGPT×SEOライティング」の手法をお伝えします。初心者の方でも簡単に実践できるよう、ステップバイステップで丁寧に解説していきます。




具体的には、以下の内容を学んでいただけます。






【学べる内容】


・SEOとAIライティングの基本：検索エンジンの仕組みから、ChatGPTの効果的な使い方まで、基礎からしっかり押さえます。
・効果的なキーワード戦略：競合の少ない「宝の山」を見つけ出し、効率よく上位表示を狙う方法を伝授します。
・実践的なSEOライティングテクニック：読者にも検索エンジンにも好まれる、魅力的な記事の書き方をマスターできます。
・プロンプトの活用法：AIの力を最大限に引き出す「魔法の呪文」、プロンプトの作り方を詳しく解説します。
・最速で上位表示を取る8つのステップ：検索1位を獲得するための具体的な手順を、実例を交えながら説明します。




このコースを受講すれば、あなたにはこんな未来が待っています。まず、毎日の記事作成が楽しくなります。AIの力を借りることで、アイデア出しから執筆までの時間が大幅に短縮。


これまで1日がかりだった作業が、わずか1〜2時間で完了するようになるでしょう。


そして、アクセス数が徐々に、しかし確実に増えていきます。検索上位表示を獲得した記事が増えるにつれ、ブログ全体の評価も上がり、さらなる集客へとつながりますよ。


収益面でも嬉しい変化が。広告収入やアフィリエイト報酬が増加し、副収入を得られるようにもなるはずです。


さらに、時間的な余裕も生まれます。


AIを活用することで、1日10記事の更新も可能。空いた時間で家族との時間を増やしたり、新しい趣味に挑戦したり。新しいビジネスに挑戦して、収入の柱を増やすのも良いかも知れません。




そうやって良い循環が生まれ、お金にも心にも余裕が生まれると思います。


AIツールは使えば使うほど、あなたの人生の選択肢が広がるのは間違いありません。






「でも、本当にうまくいくの？」「AIをそんなに信用していいの？」そう思われるかもしれません。


ですが、私がすでに出しているChatGPT×ブログで爆速でアクセスアップコースを受講された方や私のコンサルを受けてくださっているクライアントさんからはこのようなメッセージが届いています。




・藤田さん（30代・主婦ブロガー）
このコースを受講して驚きの結果を出しました。「山口さんのコースを受講して、ブログのPVが1ヶ月で3倍になりました。ChatGPTを使ったSEOライティングの効果は絶大です！育児の合間を縫って更新していた私のブログが、今では立派な副収入源になっています


・山ノ内さん（40代・サラリーマン副業ブロガー）
SEOの知識がゼロだった僕でも、このコースのおかげでここ一ヶ月でアフィリエイト収入が発生するようになりました。副業としてのブログ運営がこんなに楽しくなるとは。たくさんの有益な情報に本当に感謝しています


・Tanakaさん（20代・女性ウェブライター）
正直ChatGPTの凄さはずっと理解はしていて、やっとこの世界に足を踏み入れました。結果「もっと早く学んでおけばよかった」と後悔しています。
ChatGPTがこんなに優秀だとは知りませんでした。先行者利益という言葉がありますが早く実践するほど効果があると実感しています。これからAIをうまく活用してブログを資産にしていきたいです。






通常、このようなノウハウを吸収するために個別コンサルティングを受けるとなると50万円以上はかかります。しかし、今回のオンラインコースなら、そのノウハウのすべてを27,800円（税込）でお届けします。




さらに、今すぐお申し込みいただいた方には、ボーナスレクチャーにて特別な特典をご用意しました！！




【受講者限定の3大特典】


★特典1：タイトルマスターChatGPTs（通常価格：19,800円）
検索キーワードと関連キーワードの入力のみであとはGPTsがSEOに最適化したタイトル案を10こ以上提案してくれます。


★特典2：タイトルマスターChatGPTsの使い方解説動画（通常価格：9,800円）
検索キーワードと関連キーワードの見つけ方やどのように魅力的なタイトルにできるのか？検索上位表示率がかなり変わる記事の看板となるタイトルの作り方も動画内でレクチャーしていきます。


★特典3：受講後3ヶ月間の質問し放題サポート（通常価格：29,800円/月）
コース終了後も、実践の中で生じた疑問にしっかり対応。
あなたの成功を全力でサポートします。




そして、あなたの決断を後押しする、もう一つの特典があります！




※満足度保証付き：
コース終了後30日以内であれば、全額返金に応じます。
つまり、リスクなく、安心して受講いただけるのです。






今がその時です。このチャンスをお見逃しなく！


コース購入ボタンをクリックして、あなたのSEO成功への第一歩を踏み出してくださいね。


あなたのブログが、多くの人に読まれ、そして豊かな収入をもたらすそんな未来が、すぐそこに待っていますよ。






P.S. 質問やご不明な点があれば、いつでもお問い合わせください。


私山口加奈子（Kanako）が、あなたのChatGPT×ブログSEOの成功を全力でサポートいたします！


「今日」という日は、残りの人生の最初の日です。
その第一歩を、私と一緒に踏み出しませんか？




それではコースでお会いできることを楽しみにしております！
target_audience: 初めてChatGPT（AI）で記事を書くブログ初心者
ChatGPTのSEOのライティングでブログ記事（個人ブログ）を上位表示させたい人

requirements: 特になし
courses.description:
■はじめに
はじめまして。SNSマーケティングコンサルタントのタクミです。
現在、X（旧Twitter）で総フォロワー4万人を抱え、アフィリエイト、コンテンツ販売、PR案件など、複数の収益の柱で月間安定した収益を上げています。


■このコースの概要説明
「Xで副業を始めたいけど、どうやって収益化すればいいのかわからない...」
「フォロワーは増えているのに、全然マネタイズできていない...」


私は、このような悩みを抱える方々を数多く見てきました。実は、X運用での収益化に失敗する最大の理由は、「自分に合っていないマネタイズ方法を選んでしまうこと」にあります。


このコースでは、私が実践して成果を出してきた6つのマネタイズ手法を徹底解説。あなたに最適な収益化の道筋を見つけ出し、具体的な行動計画に落とし込んでいきます。


◆アフィリエイト、クライアントワーク、コンテンツ販売、コンサル、PRなど、具体的なマネタイズ手法を網羅的に学べる
◆フォロワー数に関係なく収益化できる実践的な戦略とノウハウを取得
◆目標収益から逆算した、具体的なロードマップの作り方を習得
◆実際の成功事例・失敗事例から学ぶ、効果的な発信方法
◆すぐに実践できるテンプレート＆ワークシートで、迷わず行動できる


■コースを受講することで…
・自分に最適なマネタイズ手法が明確になり、効率的な収益化が可能に
・目標金額に向けた具体的なロードマップを手に入れられる
・フォロワー数に依存しない、持続可能な収益モデルを構築できる
・発信内容に迷わず、戦略的なアカウント運用ができるようになる
・複数の収益の柱を作り、安定した副業収入を目指せる


■こんな方が受講に向いています
・これから副業としてXを運用してみたい方
・X運用でどのようにマネタイズをするのか知りたい方
・具体的にどんな手法でマネタイズしているのか知りたい方
・X運用を通してアフィリエイトやコンテンツ販売で成果を出したい方
・Xマネタイズの全体像を知りたい方


■このコースは全部で10セクションです


セクション1：はじめに
セクション2：Xで稼ぐための基礎知識と全体像
セクション3：自分の経験を棚卸ししてマネタイズ手法を決定する
セクション4：Xアカウントの構築と基本設定
セクション5：ファンとフォロワーを増やしながら収益を生み出すポスト作成術
セクション6：【実演】アフィリエイトで稼ぐ
セクション7：【実演コンテンツ販売で稼ぐ
セクション8：【実演】PR案件で稼ぐ
セクション9：【実演】コンサルティング・コーチングで稼ぐ
セクション10：まとめと今後のアクションプラン
ボーナスレクチャー


全部で5時間4分のコースです。
その他、必要に応じてワークシートが用意されています。ワークシートに沿って実践していただくことで、確実にX運用のスキルを身につけることができます。


■最後に

courses.title: Formation Affiliation Premium pour Devenir un Super-Affilié
courses.bio: Le Guide Complet pour Commencer De Zéro à Super Affilié
objectives: Choisir votre niche à succès
Bien utiliser les plateformes d'affiliation
Créer des blogs et des Tunnels de Vente pour avoir plus de clients
Créer des Campagnes Emailing Efficaces

Avoir un bon état d'esprit pour réussir

Comment vendre ?: Comment vendre n’importe quoi à n'importe qui ?

requirements: Avoir un ordinateur et une connexion internet
courses.description:
L'affiliation n'est pas un concept compliqué, au contraire. Pour en expliquer l'essence et le principe, inutile d'avoir recours à un jargon particulièrement technique et pointu.
Saviez vous que l'affiliation est l'un des plus vieux métiers du monde ? Je suis sur que la réponse a cette question est "non" :)
Elle est apparue en même temps que le commerce. Le principe de base est le suivant : un marchand rémunère un tiers (un individu ou un autre marchand) pour chaque client que celui-ci lui amène en boutique.


Et bien l'affiliation sur internet est basé sur le même principe.
Remplaçons les boutiques physiques par des sites en ligne, le parcours des clients entre les boutiques par leur navigation sur internet, et nous obtenons l'affiliation telle qu'elle existe et s'est développée depuis quelques années sur le web.
Alors bien évidement, l'affiliation n'est certainement pas la seule façon de gagner de l'argent sur internet.
En revanche, l'affiliation est clairement l'un des moyens les plus rapides et les plus "faciles" de faire de l'argent en ligne.
Alors quand je dis "facile" je ne veux pas non plus dire en un claquement de doigt, mais comparé a la plupart des autres business model, l'affiliation est clairement la façon de gagner de l'argent sur internet le plus accessible, tout particulièrement quand on débute.
Bien évidement, comme tout business, cela demande quand même un vrai travail, d’être constant, et, surtout, une vraie méthode.


L'affiliation a beaucoup d'avantages par rapport au autres business model. Et Le principale avantage , c’est qu’une connexion Internet suffit !
Pas besoin d’investir pour se lancer, pas besoin de diplômes, tout ce qu'il vous faut pour débuter, c'est une connexion Internet, un ordinateur et c'est parti.
Un autre avantage majeur, c'est qu'il n'as quasiment rien a gérer une fois l’effort initial fourni, a part faire un petit peu de maintenance de temps en temps.
Tout ce qu'il vous faut, c'est un ou des produits a promouvoir, une source de trafic qualifié, et une fois tout ça en place, vous générerez alors des revenus en pilote automatique, ce qui vous laissera du temps pour étendre votre réseau de site, ou même vous occuper d’autres projets !


Donc si vous cherchez un moyen de vivre d'internet, sans compétences, sans investissement (ou quasi pas), et depuis n'importe ou dans le monde... Le marketing d'affiliation est vraiment votre ticket d'or pour atteindre cet objectif.


Ce que vous apprendrez dans cette formation :
Choisir une niche à succès
Trouver des produits d’affiliation qui vendent a haute commissions ( 40-50% et plus !)
Créer un blog facilement et gratuitement !
Créer des tunnels de vente pour capturer l'email des prospects
Créer des Campagnes E mailing Efficaces
Et bien plus encore !
Dans cette formation, je ne me contente pas de parler pendant des heures.
Je vous guide pas à pas en vous montrant des exemples concrets, et simple pour vous aider a bien comprendre.


Ce que cette formation va vous apporter :
Comment gagner de l'argent sur internet, même si vous êtes un débutant
Avoir un état d'esprit optimal pour réussir sur internet, et dans la vie !
Etre capable d'utiliser internet, pour devenir financièrement libre.


Réussir dans l'affiliation est à la portée de tous. Il suffit de vous inscrire ici et maintenant. Ceux qui réussissent sont ceux qui passent a l'action !
Et aujourd’hui, est le jour ou vous faites votre premier pas, pour rejoindre les rangs des super affiliés qui gagnent un montant à 5 chiffres.
Vous pouvez le faire, et je suis la pour vous guider. Je vous attends de l’autre côté, a tout de suite ;)
target_audience: Ceux qui veulent se créer un business en ligne.
Ceux qui veulent devenir financièrement libres.

If you're looking to make money online, CPA marketing can be very profitable because unlike affiliate marketing, you do not need to spend time and money creating landing pages, websites and articles. CPA marketing is way easier than affiliate marketing and definitely easier than launching your own products and making money online. You could simply join the network shown in this tutorial for absolutely free and start promoting Pay Per Lead offers using just a social media.
In this CPA Marketing course, the CPA network used is the only such network that allows free social media traffic. You do not need to spend money on paid traffic to promote the offers.
So, if you are just starting out and want to make money online or maybe you don't have a lot of budget to spend on building websites or paid traffic, this course is for you because through CPA marketing you can make thousands of dollars every month without all the problems associated with affiliate marketing and launching your own products. It is very easy and anyone from anywhere can start making money online following the baby steps outlined in this CPA Marketing tutorial.
About The Course:
Every Internet marketer would agree that CPA marketing is the easiest way to make money online, but a good CPA marketing course is very hard to come by. There is two hour-long CPA marketing  course Would teach you CPM marketing from scratch to finish including everything from creating your account and getting verified and accepted to creating profitable social media campaigns and also using specialized tools available at your disposal for free.


What You Will Learn:
In this CPA marketing course, you will learn how to join a CPA marketing network that offers immediate approval. You won't have to prove your experience to get approved.
You will learn how to take very simple offers from the CPA network and promote them on social media – Facebook, YouTube and Instagram without spending money on traffic.
You will learn how to use specialised tools built inside the network such as banners, SmartLink systems, deep link systems and various other tools to maximise conversions.
You will learn how to do proper targeting inside social media to reach the right audience with your CPA offers.
You will learn how to create paid traffic campaigns inside native advertising to your CPA marketing offers.
If you have any questions, do not hesitate to get in touch with me using the contact button or, if you want you can also raise your questions in the Q&A dashboard.
Thank You.
Angshuman Dutta

courses.description:
إذا كنت تبحث عن وسيلة أو دروة تساعدك في تحقيق الأرباح من العمل على الانترنت وتحديدا كمسوق للعمولة لمنتجات كليك بنك، فأنت اليوم هنا في المكان السليم والصحيح
هذه الدورة موجودة هنا لتثبت لك أن حلمك في تحقيق الأرباح من خلال كليك بنك في متناول يدك
تخيل نفسك وأنت نائم وأصوات البريد الوارد التي تحمل معها تحقيق مبيعات وعمولات من خلال كليك بنك
سواء كنت تستمتع بتناول وجبة مع أحبائك، أو في نزهة مع أصدقائك، أو تتنقل من مكان إلى آخر، أو تنام، يمكنك تحقيق الأرباح حتى عندما تكون بعيدًا عن جهاز الكمبيوتر الخاص بك.
دورة النجاح في أفلييت كليك بنك سوف تعلمك بالضبط كيف يمكنك جعل هذا حقيقة!


لست بحاجة إلى أن تكون خبيرًا في التسويق عبر الإنترنت لتحقيق ذلك. وليس عليك إنفاق آلاف الدولارات للتعلم.
في هذه الدورة ، ستجد كل ما تحتاج إلى معرفته لمساعدتك على البدء ورؤية النتائج الحقيقية.
حتى إذا لم تكن لديك أي خبرة مع كليك بنك في الوقت الحالي، فستكون واثقًا من الخطوات التي يجب اتخاذها لربح أول دولار لك مع كليك بنك بعد المشاركة في الدورة!


تكلفة الدورة ستدفعها مرة واحدة فقط وستحصل ليس فقط دخول على الدورة مدى الحياة ولكن أيضا التحديثات الدورية والإضافات التي سأحدثها وأضيفها على الدورة أول بأول
سوف أقوم بتحديث هذه الدورة بانتظام بمحتوى جديد لأقدم لك أحدث المعلومات .
بمجرد تسجيلك كطالب ، ستتلقى جميع التحديثات المستقبلية وإضافات المحتوى الجديدة تلقائيًا دون أي تكلفة إضافية.
نعم! تحصل على تحديثات مدى الحياة - وهي مجانية.!


تم إنشاء هذه الدورة لغرض واحد فقط
إذا كنت لم تحصل على دولار واحد بعد مع كليك بنك، فهذه هي الدورة التي ستساعدك على تحقيق ذلك ، بكل تأكيد!


حتى تتمكن من التصريح للعالم أنك فعلتها وأخيرا مع كليك بنك وحققت أول أرباحك مع كليك بنك، فستستطيع ذلك


سواء كنت
مبتدئ تماما مع كليك بنك والافلييت والتسويق بالعمولة بشكل عام
أو كنت تعمل على ترويج منتجات كليك مع تحقيق أرباح خفيفة خلال الفترة الماضية


هذه دورة نظرية وعملية ستعلمك نظامًا قابلاً للتطبيق وسهل المتابعة لتحقيق الربح عبر الإنترنت من خلال الترويج لمنتجات كليك بنك
سوف تكتشف مدى سهولة البدء من خلال تعلم التقنية الأساسية للروابط المباشرة من خلال التسويق عبر محرك البحث - لن تحتاج إلى موقع ويب أو نطاق أو استضافة ، على الإطلاق.
تم تصميم هذه التقنية خصيصًا لمساعدتك في قضاء أقل وقت ممكن للحصول على مبيعاتك الأولى حتى تتمكن من اكتساب الثقة التي تحتاجها والتوسع في مجال الافلييت وبناء قائمة عملائك
في الجزء الثاني من هذه الدورة ، سوف تتعلم كيفية زيادة دخلك على المدى الطويل باستخدام صفحات الهبوط أو نفق المبيعات دون الحاجة إلى موقع ألكتروني وكذلك باستخدام التقنية الحديثة في تويتر لجلب العملاء والمتابعين


فيما يلي ملخص سريع لما ستتعلمه من هذه الدورة:
فهم مقاييس وأرقام كليك بنك وكيفية تحقيق أقصى استفادة منها!
كيفية اختيار المنتجات المناسبة للترويج ، والمنتجات التي يجب تجنبها!
كيفية إنشاء حملات ترويجية لبدء تحقيق المبيعات بسرعة!
كيفية بناء دخل أكثر استدامة على المدى الطويل!
قم بتطبيق هذه الاستراتيجيات على البرامج الافلييت الأخرى التي تنضم إليها في المستقبل
target_audience: هذه الدورة مخصصة للأشخاص الذين يحاولون تحقيق عمولات والربح من منصة كليك بنك مع مع نجاح ضئيل أو معدوم
كما أنها مناسبة للأشخاص الذين ليس لديهم أي خبرة سابقة في الترويج لمنتجات كليك بنك
هذه الدورة ليست للأشخاص الذين يبحثون عن طرق سريعة لتحقيق المال عبر الإنترنت. كل شيء في هذه الدورة يستغرق الوقت والجهد لرؤية النتائج

courses.description:
Unlock the secrets to generating a steady stream of passive income with our comprehensive "Affiliate Marketing with ChatGPT" course. This course is meticulously crafted to take you from a complete novice to an affiliate marketing expert, leveraging the power of ChatGPT and proven strategies to drive free website traffic. Imagine waking up to new earnings every day, all from the comfort of your home. This course makes that dream a reality.
Affiliate marketing is one of the most lucrative online business models available today. It allows you to earn commissions by promoting other people’s products and services. However, without the right knowledge and tools, it can be challenging to succeed. That’s where this course comes in. With over 5 hours of engaging and actionable content, we’ll guide you through every step of the process, ensuring you have the skills and confidence to succeed.
We begin with an introduction to affiliate marketing, explaining what it is, how it works, and why it’s such a powerful method for generating income. You’ll learn about the key components of affiliate marketing, including how to choose the right products to promote, where to find affiliate programs, and how to create compelling content that converts visitors into buyers.
Next, we delve into the requirements for affiliate marketing. You’ll understand why you need ChatGPT, how to set up your website, and the essential tools and resources required to streamline your efforts and maximize your results. By the end of this section, you’ll have a solid foundation to build your affiliate marketing business.
The course then takes you through the process of setting up a WordPress website, from securing a domain name to choosing the right hosting service and installing WordPress. You’ll get hands-on experience in setting up and optimizing your site for both performance and search engines.
We also cover the critical components of affiliate marketing in depth. You’ll learn how to join affiliate programs, select the best products to promote, and get your unique affiliate links. We’ll show you how to create effective landing pages and drive traffic to your site using a variety of free methods.
One of the unique aspects of this course is our focus on leveraging ChatGPT for affiliate marketing. You’ll discover how to use this powerful AI tool to generate content, automate responses, and engage with your audience in a way that boosts conversions and sales.
In addition to the fundamentals, we reveal several special secret methods that can supercharge your affiliate marketing efforts. From launch jacking and copy-paste strategies to advanced automated techniques, these insider tips will give you an edge over the competition.
By the end of this course, you’ll be equipped with the knowledge and tools to run a successful affiliate marketing business. But it doesn’t stop there. We’ll also introduce you to other affiliate marketing methods, ensuring you have a well-rounded understanding of the industry and can adapt to its ever-changing landscape.
Don’t miss out on this opportunity to transform your financial future. Enroll now in "Affiliate Marketing with ChatGPT" and start your journey to financial freedom today. If you don’t take this course, you risk missing out on one of the most effective ways to earn passive income online. Secure your spot now and unlock the potential of affiliate marketing!

courses.description:
Bu ileri seviye Affiliate Marketing kursunda, profesyonellerin sır gibi sakladığı uzman ipuçlarını öğrenerek, internetten pasif gelir elde etmenin tüm detaylarını keşfedeceksiniz! Türkiye'de hazırlanmış en kapsamlı ve detaylı kursla, hem teorik hem pratik bilgiye sahip olacaksınız.
Kurs boyunca, denenmiş ve kanıtlanmış ücretli ve ücretsiz pazarlama stratejilerini öğrenerek, satış potansiyeli yüksek ürünleri nasıl araştıracağınızı ve reklamlarınızı en doğru şekilde nasıl hedefleyeceğinizi göreceksiniz. Üstelik, sizi dijital pazarlamada bir adım öne çıkaracak Google ADS eğitimiyle, en az maliyetle en yüksek trafik ve satış gücüne ulaşmanın sırlarını öğreneceksiniz.
Canva ile görseller hazırlamaktan landing page ve squeeze page oluşturmaya, yeniden pazarlama (remarketing) reklamları oluşturup müşteri e-postaları toplamanıza kadar her aşamada, affiliate marketing kariyerinizi ileri taşıyacak bilgiler edineceksiniz. Ayrıca, Google Analytics ve Google Tag Manager hakkında temel bilgilere sahip olup, yurtdışındaki platformlardan ödeme almayı öğreneceksiniz.
Eğer dijital pazarlamada ustalaşmak, pasif gelir sistemi kurmak ve online başarıya ulaşmak istiyorsanız, bu kurs tam size göre!


ŞU ANDAN İTİBAREN, ÖNÜNDEKİ SEÇENEKLER NELER?


1. Seçenek: Başlamadan vazgeçersin;
“İnternetten para mı kazanılır? Bunlar hep yalan dolan böyle şeylerle vakit kaybetmeye gerek yok.”
“Yok ürünün satış sitesine ziyaretçi gönderiyorsun da, bu kişi ürünü satın alınca biz komisyon kazanıyoruz. Böyle iş mi olurmuş!”
“Yine birisi çıktı hayal tacirliği yapıyor. Bu da kesin SAADET ZİNCİRİ gibi bir şeydir.”
Önyargıları yüzünden online kazanç serüvenin daha başlamadan vazgeçersin.


ÖNEMLİ SORU: AFFİLİATE MARKETİNG SAADET ZİNCİRİ GİBİ BİR ŞEY MİDİR?
HAYIR! Affiliate marketing kazanç modelinde herkes bireyseldir. Kimse kimsenin üstünden para kazanmaz. Gerçekleşen her satıştan affiliate marketingi yapan kişi ürünü satın alacak müşteriyi bulduğu için payını veya başka bir deyişle komisyonunu alır. Ürün sahibi kendi payına düşeni alır. Ödeme altyapısını ve satış ortaklığı yazılımını kullandıran affiliate ağı da kendi payını alır. Özetle; müşteriden, aldığı ürün karşılığında tahsil edilen tutar ürün sahibi, ürünü satışına aracılık eden kişiler (yani biz) ve kaydolunan affiliate ağı arasında paylaştırılır ve bu payın en büyüğü (genelde toplam tutarın 75% ile 90% kadarı) bize, yani satışa aracılık eden tarafa verilir.


2. Seçenek: Kısa zamanda zengin olma hayalleriyle bu işe girersin;
İlk etapta büyük beklentilerle ve zengin olma tutkusuyla bu işe girişirsin. Kısa zaman sonra başarısız olduğunu düşünüp bu işin sana göre olmadığına karar verirsin. Çünkü kafanda belirleyeceğin başarı çıtası o kadar yüksektir ki, doğal olarak kısa sürede o çıtaya erişemeyeceğin için hayal kırıklığına uğrarsın.
Dolayısıyla kısa sürede affiliate marketing sektörüne zaman harcamayı bırakıp yaşadığın sıkıcı iş hayatına devam edersin.


3. Seçenek: Mantıklı ve gerçekçi hedefler koyarak zamanla kendi online kazanç altyapını oluşturursun;
Zengin olma hayalleriyle boşa zaman harcamak yerine, çevrendeki insanlarda asla göremeyeceğin bir hayat tarzı kurma hedefine ulaşmaya çalışıp kendi online kazanç altyapını kurmaya odaklanırsın.
Uzun vadeli hedefler koyarak ve verimli bir şekilde çalışarak, şu anda kurduğun sana imkansız gelen tüm güzel hayalleri ileride gerçekten hayatının bir parçası yaparsın.
Gerçekçi hedefler koyarak ve uzun vadeli bir çalışma planı hazırlayarak kararlı bir şekilde yoluna devam edersin. Ve sonunda hayalindeki o kusursuz online satış altyapısını kurarsın. Kendi online işinin patronu olmanın keyfini yaşarsın.
target_audience: İnternet ortamında pasif olarak düzenli yüksek gelir elde etmek isteyen, e-ticaretin henüz tam anlamıyla keşfedilmemiş bir dalında bilgi ve beceri sahibi olmak isteyenler.
Sıfırdan başlayarak iş kurmak isteyenler.
İnternetten para kazanmak isteyenler.
E-ticarete sermayesiz şekilde başlamak isteyenler.

courses.description:
Bienvenido a tu primer paso para conocer de redes de mercadeo
Entenderás como funciona este negocio sin estar detrás de tu prospecto ideal, lo que se requiere es fidelizar al equipo y eso lo logras con alguno pasos que te voy a dar a continuación, te recomiendo que anotes aplicando hoy mismo
Vas a aprender todos aquellas maneras de comunicarse en la oratoria, en la que no solo el producto es el principal protagonista, sino otros factores.
Cansado de buscar el paso a paso para tu primera vez en la industria del mercadeo en red, el famoso "NEGOCIO DEL SIGLO 21"?  pues tengo la solución para que puedas dar ese primer paso.
En este mercado es clave saber como persuadir y comunicarte con los demás, y para esto es fundamental tener las herramientas necesarias para lograrlo, no importa si eres de poca comunicación, es posible hasta con algunas palabras de la persona que escucha, poder armar tu mismo tu discurso previo.
No seas como aquellos vendedores molestos que te persiguen a todos lados para venderte un producto/servicio,  si tú eres el que tiene lo que les va a ayudar, para que deberías perseguirlo?  deja que sea él quien lo busca.

courses.bio: تعلم استراتيجيات التسويق بالعمولة عبر علي إكسبريس، من اختيار المنتجات إلى تحسين الأداء لزيادة الأرباح.

من الصفر إلى الأرباح: التسويق بالعمولة ع: مقدمة كورس التسويق بالعمولة علي اكسبريس
التسويق بالعمولة علي اكسبريس انشاء حساب
اختيار المنتج الرابح التسويق بالعمولة علي اكسبريس

تسويق منتجات علي اكسبريس على منصة تيك توك

requirements: معرفة أساسية بالإنترنت: فهم كيفية استخدام الإنترنت بشكل عام واستخدام تطبيقات الويب.
اهتمام بالتسويق الرقمي: رغبة في تعلم استراتيجيات التسويق الرقمي والتسويق بالعمولة.
امتلاك جهاز كمبيوتر أو هاتف ذكي: جهاز يمكن الوصول من خلاله إلى الإنترنت ومتابعة المحتوى التدريبي.
إلمام بأساسيات التجارة الإلكترونية: فهم بسيط لكيفية عمل التجارة الإلكترونية ومفاهيمها الأساسية.
courses.description:
هل يمكن البحث عن طريقة موثوقة للوصول إلى الاتفاق أو بناء مصدر أولي عبر الإنترنت؟


انضم إلى دورة "التسويق بالعمولة عبر علي إكسبريس" وتعرف على كيفية تنفيذ برامج التسويق بالعمولة لتحقيق الأهداف المرجوة. في هذه الفترة الشاملة، ستتعلم كيفية التسجيل في برنامج التسويق بالعمولة الخاص بعلي إكسبريس، اختيار المنتجات الرائعة والمربحة.


تقدم دورة "التسويق بالممولة عبر علي إكسبريس" دليلًا شاملاً الاشتراك في التفاصيل الكاملة من برنامج التسويق بالممولة على منصة علي إكسبريس. تبدأ الدورة بتعريف شامل حول كيفية الانضمام إلى برنامج التسويق بالعمولة، والاشتراك في خطوات واسعة النطاق لإنشاء حساب مؤسس وحملات تسويقية فّعالة. ستتعلم كيفية اختيار أفضل المنتجات الصحيحة، والتوصل إلى الخيارات الرئيسية والمربحة التي تلبي احتياجات السوق والتحقق من أعلى العوائد.


كما نستكشف التنوع التسويقي المتقدم، بما في ذلك محركات البحث المتقدمة (SEO) المتقدمة والإنتاج الرقمي في البحث، والتعاون عبر وسائل التواصل الاجتماعي والتعاون مع العملاء، بالإضافة إلى الإعلان عن المدفوع لتحسين نتائج الحملات. فترة طويلة لك أدوات وتقنيات تحليل الأداء والفعالية حملاتك، نصائح استراتيجية شاملة لك العديد من البيانات المجمعة.


سواء كنت مبتدئًا تمتلك مهارات جديدة في مجال التسويق بالممولة، أو صاحب عمل طموح بشأن طرق الوصول إلى الربح، فهذه فترة مخصصة لتعلمك بالمعرفة والمهارات الأساسية لتحقيق النجاح. انضم إلينا واكتشف كيف يمكنك تحقيق أقصى استفادة من التسويق بالعمولة عبر علي إكسبريس، وتستهدف تحقيق هدفك الرئيسي. ابدأ نحو رحلتك وتعلم كيفية بناء المصدر من خلال التسويق الرقمي عبر منصة عالمية!
target_audience: المبتدئين في التسويق بالعمولة: الأفراد الذين يرغبون في تعلم أساسيات التسويق بالعمولة وكيفية الربح من خلال برنامج علي إكسبريس.
رواد الأعمال الطموحين: الأشخاص الذين يسعون لبناء مشروع تجاري عبر الإنترنت ويبحثون عن طرق مبتكرة لتحقيق دخل إضافي.
مديري التسويق الرقمي: المتخصصون الذين يرغبون في توسيع مهاراتهم وتعلم استراتيجيات جديدة للترويج للمنتجات عبر علي إكسبريس.
أصحاب الأعمال الصغيرة: الأفراد أو الشركات الصغيرة التي ترغب في استغلال التسويق بالعمولة لزيادة المبيعات والإيرادات.
الطلاب والباحثين عن دخل إضافي: الأشخاص الذين يبحثون عن فرص عمل مرنة ومربحة عبر الإنترنت.

courses.description:
Welcome to this cutting-edge online course where you're about to embark on an exciting journey in digital marketing and AI technology. Imagine having a custom AI influencer representing your brand, with your choice of looks, ethnicity, hobbies, and background—all created by you, for free, and without any complex prerequisites!
With the rise of AI in today’s marketing landscape, the demand for unique content creation has skyrocketed—especially content that’s both engaging and cost-effective. This course is your golden ticket to not only understanding this new wave but also to riding it with confidence. Whether you're a marketing professional, a brand owner, or an enthusiast looking to explore the realms of AI and digital marketing, our course has been tailor-made for you.


What You Will Learn:
- Create a Unique AI Influencer: You'll learn how to design and customize your virtual brand ambassador—from their aesthetic to their personal story.
- Generate High-Quality Custom Images: Produce personalized scenes, backgrounds, and styles for your AI influencer that align with your brand's vision.
- Troubleshoot Like a Pro: We'll guide you through correcting common image generation issues to enhance the realism and authenticity of your AI-generated content.
- Maximize Your Marketing Impact: Discover effective strategies to use your AI influencer for marketing and promoting a wide range of products including apparel and accessories.
Our Teaching Approach:
- No Technical Barriers: Forget about programming complexities or the need for high-end hardware. If you have a device with a web browser, you’re all set!
- User-Friendly Platform: Dive into the world of AI with the latest Stable Diffusion XL combined with the intuitive Fooocus interface. It’s designed for easy adoption, putting powerful tools at your fingertips with minimal learning curve.
- Real-World Skills: Not only will you learn the technological aspects, but you'll also gain insights into practical, real-world applications for AI influencer marketing.


Exclusive Early-Bird Perks:


- Stay Ahead of the Curve: This completely new course offers you the chance to jump on the trend before it becomes mainstream. Gain a significant advantage in the marketing sphere by mastering skills that are currently at the industry’s forefront.
- Cost-Effective Learning: Create your AI influencers at no cost—up to 1 hour of generation per day, completely on us.


Who is This Course For?


This course is designed for anyone eager to pioneer in marketing using state-of-the-art image generation. No previous experience? No problem. This is for beginners and pros alike.


Enroll Now!


Don't miss this chance to turn virtual dreams into marketing might. Enroll today to secure your spot at the forefront of the AI influencer revolution!

requirements: This course is designed for beginners, so no prior experience in affiliate marketing or digital marketing is required. However, basic computer skills and internet usage are essential. You should be comfortable browsing websites, using social media platforms, and handling basic online tasks like email and content creation. A willingness to learn and experiment with different affiliate marketing strategies is crucial for success. While not mandatory, having a blog, website, or active social media presence can be beneficial for applying the concepts taught in this course. Additionally, a reliable internet connection and a laptop or smartphone will help you follow along with the lessons and implement the strategies effectively. Most importantly, an entrepreneurial mindset, patience, and dedication to building a sustainable online income are key to making the most of this course.
courses.description:
Affiliate marketing is one of the most accessible and rewarding ways to generate income online. It involves promoting products or services from other companies and earning a commission for each sale made through your referral. This business model allows individuals to monetize their online presence without having to create or manage their own products. By leveraging websites, social media, blogs, or email marketing, anyone can build a sustainable income stream with the right strategy.
In today's digital world, businesses are constantly looking for effective ways to reach their target audience. Affiliate marketing plays a crucial role in modern e-commerce by connecting brands with potential customers through trusted recommendations. It provides businesses with a cost-effective marketing strategy while offering individuals an opportunity to earn passive income. Unlike traditional business models, affiliate marketing requires little to no upfront investment, making it an attractive option for aspiring entrepreneurs, freelancers, and content creators.
Advantages of Affiliate Marketing
Low Startup Costs – No need to create a product, hold inventory, or manage customer service.
Passive Income Potential – Earn commissions even while you sleep through automated marketing strategies.
Flexibility & Freedom – Work from anywhere in the world and set your own schedule.
Diverse Opportunities – Choose from thousands of affiliate programs in various industries.
Scalability – With the right approach, your income can grow exponentially over time.
This course is ideal for beginners who want to explore affiliate marketing as a side hustle or full-time career. Entrepreneurs looking to diversify their income streams, bloggers and content creators seeking monetization opportunities, and digital marketers aiming to enhance their skills will all benefit from this foundation course. Whether you have prior experience in online marketing or are just getting started, this course will equip you with the knowledge and strategies needed to succeed.
Affiliate marketing is evolving rapidly, with advancements in AI, automation, and data analytics shaping the industry. As e-commerce continues to grow, so will the demand for affiliates who can drive targeted traffic and conversions. With the right skills and strategies, affiliate marketers can stay ahead of the curve and tap into emerging opportunities in influencer marketing, niche blogging, and social media promotions.
By the end of this course, you'll have a solid understanding of affiliate marketing fundamentals, practical steps to get started, and insights into long-term success strategies. Whether you're looking to earn extra income or build a full-fledged online business, this course will set you on the right path to achieving your financial goals.
target_audience: This course is ideal for anyone looking to generate passive income online, whether as a side hustle or a full-time business. Entrepreneurs, freelancers, content creators, bloggers, and digital marketers can benefit by learning how to monetize their platforms effectively. Beginners with no prior experience in affiliate marketing will gain a solid foundation, while those with some knowledge can refine their strategies for better results. If you're passionate about online business, want financial independence, or seek flexibility in your work schedule, affiliate marketing offers a scalable and low-risk opportunity. This course is also perfect for students, stay-at-home parents, or professionals looking to diversify their income streams without significant investment. By mastering affiliate marketing, learners can build long-term, sustainable revenue by promoting products and services they believe in.
