courses.description:
このコースはこれまでコソコソと副業でサイトアフィリエイトをしながら、月収50万円以上を安定して稼ぎ続ける人たちの「思考法」を享受するものです。言わずもがな・・・ですが、本講義を視聴しただけでは稼げるようになりません。あなたの手を使って作業しないとダメです。
もちろん手を動かしても全員が稼げるようにはなりません。サイトアフィリエイターの商売道具は「キーワード選定」です。あるキーワードで誰かが稼げているということは、同時に誰かが稼げていないことを指します。（ここら辺の意味がわからない人は受講をお控えください）
本コースは思考の方法を教えるものであって、具体的なキーワードなどを伝授するものではありません。繰り返しますが、僕たちの商売道具はキーワード選定です。キーワードそのものが競争優位性を維持しているので、何らかの形でキーワードがリーク（漏洩）したり、スティール（盗難）されたりすると、売上が激減してしまいます。
僕の場合はMacのNumbersにキーワードをリストアップして、パスワードを二重にかけてUSBで保存してあります。そのくらいのセキュリティを施しておかなきゃいけないくらい、キーワードは重要なものなのです。もちろん火事になってそれらUSBが燃えても大丈夫。スターは、お金を払って別の場所に保管してありますから・・・。
さて、それほど重要なキーワード選定の手法や、サイトの構築方法、アフィリエイトの商流などを動画講義に収めました。質問などがあればいつでも教えてください。後日PDFにまとめるか、追加講義という形で配布しようと思います。
講義自体は1日もあれば見終えることができるはずです。しかし手を動かして作業をしながら"体で理解"しようと思ったら最低でも7日間は必要だと思われます。逆に言うと手を動かしながら、頭をフル回転させれば月収100万円を稼ぐ（いわゆる）スーパーアフィリエイターと呼ばれる人になれるポテンシャルがあるということです。
あなた他には2つの道があります。そのポテンシャルを取る人生と、取らない人生。あくまでもポテンシャルです。その可能性が開花すれば、リッチになれますが、開花しなければリッチになれません。しかしポテンシャルを取らなければ、いずれにせよプアのままです。
あなたはどっち？
target_audience: サイトアフィリエイトで月収50万円未満の方

Introducing
A Brand New Over-The-Shoulder Video Series On How To Launch Your Product With JVZoo
JVZoo Advanced: Fast Track Training


Here's What You'll Learn In These Upgraded Video Series:
How to work with the advanced features and make the best of it.
How to become more efficient in your daily activities and speed up your output using this platform.
Learn the smart way to make things happen fast as the experts do with some key features of this service.
Learn how to reduce frustrations and time-consuming activities by applying my practical advice when using this service.
How about automation? Learn the simple tricks and tips we use to get it done.
Master every aspect of this service so that you can train other people how to use it as it.
Stay at the top of your competition and keep your business ahead of the learning curve.
And so many more...


Dear Friend,
The biggest challenge all online businesses face is getting traffic and making sales. You can’t make a single cent if you’re not getting any traffic.
How does a business attract customers if they’re not marketing professionals? The answer is through affiliate marketing.
More to the point, it’s by having your offer on JVZoo. JVZoo products can be promoted by thousands of affiliate marketers.
Their promotion of your product will free you to do other things. Now you’ll be able to focus on improving your existing product or even create a new one.
We Go Over The Process From Start To Finish
When you first start using JVZoo, it can seem complicated. There are all kinds of terms you have to learn, and the whole process can be overwhelming.
Don’t worry, we’ve got you covered. Our videos lay out in detail everything you need to do to have your offer on JVZoo.
We’ll also give you tips on how to find the best affiliates who’ll send traffic that converts.
You see, it’s not just a matter of having your offer listed in JVZoo.
You also need to attract the right affiliates to ensure that your offer gets as much exposure as possible.
Affiliate Marketers Are A Tough Nut To Crack
First, you've got to find them. Then, you’ve got to convince them to promote your offer.
JVZoo does all of that.
You don’t need to worry about any of it. By having your offer listed there, you’ll immediately get a sense of legitimacy.
You wouldn’t have this if you were trying to get affiliates through your site. Affiliates see your offer listed at JVZoo and they immediately think that it’s legit.
That’s the power of working with a trusted name like JVZoo.
You’ve Got Questions, And We’ve Got Answers
You’ve got plenty of questions about JVZoo. Sure, you could search the entire internet all day long trying to find answers to your questions.
You’ll end up finding some of the answers you’re looking for. But, it’s not a good use of your time.
More importantly, you’ll end up with several questions that go unanswered. You don’t want to go the route of seeming like a novice to those who will promote your offer.
The way you ensure this doesn’t happen is by watching our videos. They will know that you’re familiar with JVZoo and all of the features it has to offer.
Plus, you’ll be able to take advantage of those features as well. Success at JVZoo is a two-way street, and our videos are at the intersection of prosperity and wealth.
Skyrocket Sales With The Help Of JVZoo
You’re not here to earn peanuts. You want to make big bucks.
You can do just that with the power of the affiliates at JVZoo promoting your offer.
Don’t leave money on the table by not fully understanding how JVZoo works.
We’ll explain it all in an easy to follow format.
By investing a short amount of time now, you’ll be able to reap the massive rewards in the not so distant future.
Sign up for this training today and make your future as bright as it possibly can be.
----------------------------------------------------

requirements: None
courses.description:
Beginners Guide to Digital Email Marketing for 2021 was designed to teach anyone who wants to earn money online.  We teach you the strategies that are being used now in 2021.  Its important we teach you at the beginning, first we show you how to use optin pages to build your email list.  You will then learn how to create lead magnets and how to optimise your sends for more return on investment.
Whats Email Marketing?  Where do we begin?  Have you ever looked at a website that interests you, and you are asked to sign up to their newsletter and in return, they will send you promotional offers.  Most of us do this naturally, signing up, especially on a topic that excites us  You may not have purchased anything at that point, but in their follow up email they offer you 20% off the products you love, and this time you go ahead and make the purchase.  Think of all the millions like you, who visit a site, never purchase and close down without signing up - you are simply forgotten about.  With Email Marketing you capture that audience and create a list for future use.  It is possible that the client may purchase from them in the future... see how this works.
In the online business world it is a proven fact that most sales are not made from advertising on different platforms like Facebook, Instagram or Google, but instead from the email lists that they build up, over time.  There are many software programs that store the emails for you....this is not shown in this course.
Email Marketing is the Golden Nugget, the key to any successful business online.  So join me as we go through the basics of Email Marketing.
Look forward to working with you.
Sarah
target_audience: People who want to learn email marketing
People who want to send emails to make money online
Anyone who wishes to create or grow a business online

courses.description:
الكورس الشامل في التسويق بالعمولة هو كورس يمكنك من بدأ اول مشروع لك عبر الانترنت حيث من خلاله تستطيع تطوير و تحسين مدخولك .. ستتعلم في هذا الكورس العديد من الدروس التطبيقية كيفية اختيار نيتش للعمل عليه، كذلك كيفية اطلاق حملات اعلانية ناجحة من مختلف المنصات الاعلانية المشهورة مثل: فايسبوك وغوغل .


كما ستتمكن من تتبع الحملات الخاصة بك و تحسينها و انشاء جمهور مستهدف خاص بك و جمع الداتا الخاصة بك من اجل اعادة استهدافها و العمل عليها من اجل زيادة المداخيل الخاصة بك.


كما تطرقنا في الكورس الى الطرق المجانية التي تساعدك للبدأ من الصفر وبدون صرف اي مبلغ من المال و تطوير واستثمار العائد من اجل تحقيق نتائج افضل.


و كذلك هناك فصل خاص بالايمايل ماركتنغ حيث يعتبر افضل طريقة للعمل مع التسويق بالعمولة واكثره امانا وسهولة . حيث يمكنك انشاء حملات بريد وارسالهم تلقائيا بدون اي مشاكل مع المنصة المستخدمة في الكورس.


كما لا ننسى كيفية انشاء صفحات هبوط احترافية و بطرق جديدة تساعدك على جلب العديد من الزبائن و الحصول على العديد من التحويلات.
كما يوجد في الكورس طريقة العمل عن طريق اليوتيوب ادس و كيفية كتابة عناوين ذات قيمة و تساعدك في البدأ في العمل مع اعلانات اليوتيوب التي تعتبر كذلك طريقة ممتازة لتطوير العمل الخاص بك.

courses.description:
Course Description
Would you like to earn passive income by promoting travel services — even when you’re not traveling yourself?
This course is designed for beginners and aspiring entrepreneurs who want to start and grow a travel affiliate business. Whether you’re a content creator, blogger, YouTuber, or simply someone looking to build an extra income stream, this step-by-step course will teach you exactly how to get started in the travel affiliate marketing space — from the basics to more advanced strategies.
What You’ll Learn in This Course:
How the travel affiliate business works — explained clearly from scratch
How to sign up for top CPA (Cost Per Action) travel affiliate programs
How to access and use powerful affiliate tools provided by networks
How to promote travel offers using your blog, website, YouTube channel, or social media platforms
How to earn commissions by booking for yourself, your family, friends, or customers
How to build your own travel affiliate blog or website
How to create long-term partnerships with major brands in the travel industry
You’ll get exclusive access to affiliate programs offering commissions on:
Flights
Hotels
Car rentals
Travel insurance
Tours & activities
Why Travel Affiliate Marketing?
The travel industry is one of the world’s largest and most profitable sectors. Travel has become a regular part of life for millions of people. This means more bookings — and more opportunities for affiliate marketers to earn commissions. Imagine getting paid every time someone books a flight, hotel, or tour through your links — even if it's just for yourself or your family.
Through this course, you’ll learn how to turn those bookings into real income using the right platforms and strategies.
Final Note:
Please watch each lesson in order — skipping may cause you to miss important steps. If you have questions at any point, feel free to reach out via the course Q&A section.
Let’s get started and build your travel affiliate business together.
target_audience: Anyone who wants to make money online through travel affiliates
Anyone who wants to become a travel services provider and make money of it
Anyone who wants to pursue career in travel industry

courses.description:
複数あるアフィリエイトという手法の中に、「トレンドアフィリエイト」という手法があるのをご存知ですか？
ゲス不倫、ポケモンGO、リオ五輪…2016年は"トレンド"フィーバーでした。まさに神ってました。でもこれは決して一過性のものではありません。
トレンドとは、世間で流行っているもの、話題になっているもの、注目を集めているもの、旬なもの…などと定義されますが、日常生活からトレンドが消えてなくなることはありません。昼夜を問わず、新しい出来事が常に発生し、新しい商品や流行、これまでになかった概念などは常に生まれ続けます。
インターネットがこれだけ発達した現在、そのトレンドを敏感にキャッチして、検索ユーザーにとっての付加価値を付けて有益な情報として発信するスキルを身に付ければ、少なくとも食いっぱぐれることはありません。現時点ではほとんど考えられませんが、たとえいつかインターネットがこの世から消滅したとしても、その時はもっと便利な媒体に変わるだけで、トレンド情報に対する需要がなくならない限りは、その発信者の価値が廃れることもないでしょう。
また"トレンド"には、「多くの人が向いている方向」という意味もあります。生きていく上では、各人の個性や、他人と違う考えなどはとても重要な要素ですが、ビジネスという面では、マジョリティ向けのコンテンツのほうが高い価値があることは容易に理解できると思います。
トレンドアフィリエイトという手法は、まさに、より多くの人々が求めているトレンド情報を発信するというビジネスです。そして私たちの直接の取引先は財務基盤が盤石なGoogleになりますので、今月の売上が翌月には回収できるという、非常に魅力的な資金サイクルです。
私はこのトレンドアフィリエイトに出会って、わずか1年半で独立起業することができました。もちろん今ではトレンド以外のアフィエイトやDRMなども幅広く展開していますが、トレンドアフィリエイトが独立のきっかけ与えてくれたことは間違いありません。
PCとネット環境さえあれば、いつでもどこでも実践できるビジネスモデルですので、時間や場所に拘束されない生活も夢ではありません。万一、全ての事業が傾いたとしても、すぐにまたWordPressでオリジナルのサイトを構築して、そこからトレンド情報を発信していけば簡単に再構築が可能な仕組みです。
企業は絶対に従業員を守ってくれません。自分を守れるのは自分しかいないのです。いざとなったらいつでも辞表を叩きつけられるという切り札を持っておくためにも、まずは副業で自分のスキルを高めることから始めてみませんか？
このコースでは、アフィリエイト初心者の方、ネットビジネス初心者の方でも実践できるように、Googleのアカウントの作り方から解説しています。いざという時の切り札を持っているだけで、息苦しいサラリーマン生活の中においてもだいぶ精神的な余裕が生まれると思いますよ。事実、私がそうでしたから。
target_audience: 副業で収入を増やしたいサラリーマン
時間や場所に縛られず、PCとネット環境さえあればいつでもどこでも稼げるスキルを身に付けたい人
外に働きに出ることが難しい子育て中の主婦の方
将来の脱サラを見据えて、ネットビジネスの入り口として実績を作りたい人
初期投資がほとんど不要で、利益率の高いビジネスを始めたい人
株式投資や不動産投資の元手作りとして、すぐにキャッシュが入ってくるビジネスを探している人
Yahoo!で気になるニュースをついつい見てしまうゴシップ好きな人

courses.bio: 食いっぱぐれない職業としてアフィリエイターは非常に魅力的ですが、現実には職業アフィリエイターはわずか5%。残り95%はただの記事生成マシーン。まずブログを毎日3回更新してください。そして月間アクセス数10万PVを目指してください。

アフィリエイト業界のパワーバランス知ってますか？
アフィリエイターは社会的に蔑まれているからこそ稼げる
7ポケット企画 - 最低でも収入口を7つに増やしなさい

requirements: インターネットビジネスに関する基礎知識
courses.description:
MMD研究所（モバイルマーケティングデータ研究所）が実施した「アフィリエイトに関する実態調査：有効回答…1796人」によれば、月額報酬が1,000円〜4,999円が77.2%と最も多い結果となっています。
仮にこの報酬を、カップラーメンを待つ間の作業時間程度で稼げるなら、まぁ割にあった職業といえるかもしれませんが、10時間や20時間も投下して4,999円程度じゃあ、確実にブラック企業よりも悪条件の労働をしていると言わざるをえません。
本コースでは、アフィリエイターのほとんどが無視している「リスト」という概念を紹介し、スモールビジネスの作り方を教えます。
あくまでも概念的なことしか話していないので、報酬は当然のことながら発生しません。しかし本コースで紹介するアイディアを頭に入れて作業をするのと、入れずに作業をするのでは結果が全く異なってくることでしょう。
現状で全く稼げていないアフィリエイターはもちろん、月に5000円すら稼げていないアフィリエイターにとって有益な情報を提供しています。あなたはこの講座を受講することで、例えば・・・
キャンペーンを打って1件500円で生きたリストを購入する方法
1つのネタを3つに拡散して3倍のリストを得る方法
複数のLP（ランディングページ）を用意して事業を安定させる方法
について学ぶことができますし、もう少しディープな内容を知りたければ・・・
なぜメールマーケティングは終焉するのか？
情報商材業界における販売者とアフィリエイターのパワーバランスは？
有力アフィリエイターのリストを合法的に抜けるのか？
といったことも学ぶことができます。
ここまでの情報は比較的リスクの少ない方法でしたが、ある程度資本のある方にとっては次の講座（#04以降）が有益になるはずです。例えば・・・
プロダクトローンチを仕掛けてリストを一気に増やす方法
オプトインキャンペーンを自ら実施し収支プラスでリストを集める方法
などを勉強することができます。
いずれにせよ初心者が知っておくべき情報を網羅的に詰め込みましたので、カリキュラムを見て自分に必要な講義があれば受講してみてください。たった1つの講義がアフィリエイター人生を気持ちのいいものにするかもしれません。
target_audience: 思ったよりも稼げてないので一度アフィリエイトを止めた人
アフィリエイトのやり方が分からない未経験者
懸賞や着うたなどの儲からないアフィリエイトをやっている人

courses.description:
Welcome to Affiliate Marketing Mastery for Beginners, the ultimate course designed to help you learn the foundational principles of affiliate marketing and equip you with the tools and strategies to start earning a sustainable income online. Whether you're looking for a side hustle or aiming to build a full-time business, this course will set you on the path to success in the affiliate marketing world.
Who Is This Course For?
This course is tailored for beginners with no prior experience in affiliate marketing. If you have:
A desire to earn money online.
An interest in promoting products or services you believe in.
A willingness to learn and apply proven strategies.
Then this course is perfect for you! It’s designed to take you from zero knowledge to confidently running your own affiliate marketing campaigns.
Course Duration
This comprehensive program spans 4 weeks, featuring 6 in-depth modules that guide you step-by-step through every aspect of affiliate marketing. Each week focuses on a specific area, ensuring you have the time to learn, apply, and master the concepts.
Course Objectives
By the end of this course, you will:
Understand the core principles of affiliate marketing and how it works.
Identify profitable niches and affiliate products aligned with your interests.
Build a platform to promote affiliate links, whether it’s a blog, website, or social media.
Create engaging, high-quality content that attracts and retains your target audience.
Learn powerful strategies to drive traffic and boost conversions.
Track your performance, analyze data, and optimize your campaigns for greater success.
What You'll Learn
Module 1: Introduction to Affiliate Marketing
What is affiliate marketing, and how does it work?
Why affiliate marketing is one of the best ways to earn passive income online.
Key terminology you need to know: affiliates, merchants, affiliate networks, commissions.
Real-life success stories to inspire and motivate you.
Module 2: Choosing Your Niche and Products
How to identify profitable niches based on your passions, interests, and market trends.
Tips for evaluating affiliate programs, including commission rates, cookie durations, and program reputation.
Tools and resources for researching the best affiliate products.
Case studies of successful niche selections and their results.
Module 3: Building Your Platform
Choosing the right platform for your affiliate marketing journey: blog, website, or social media.
Step-by-step guide to setting up a professional-looking website or blog.
Leveraging social media platforms for affiliate marketing: how to choose the best platform for your niche.
Optimizing your platform for conversions: designing with user experience in mind, including clear calls-to-action and mobile responsiveness.
Module 4: Content Marketing for Affiliates
The role of content marketing in building trust and credibility.
How to create valuable content that educates, entertains, and informs your audience.
Exploring different content formats:
Blog posts: crafting informative and engaging articles.
Videos: creating tutorials and reviews.
Social media content: using posts, stories, and reels effectively.
Infographics: presenting complex information visually.
Tips for integrating affiliate links naturally into your content.
Module 5: Affiliate Marketing Promotion Strategies
Organic Traffic:
SEO (Search Engine Optimization): how to optimize your website and content to rank higher on search engines.
Social media growth strategies to attract organic followers and engagement.
Paid Traffic:
Introduction to paid advertising options like Google Ads, Facebook Ads, and Instagram Ads.
Budget-friendly strategies for running your first paid campaign.
Email Marketing:
Building an email list from scratch.
Crafting compelling email campaigns that drive clicks and conversions.
Influencer Marketing:
Partnering with influencers in your niche to reach a broader audience.
Negotiating deals and ensuring a win-win collaboration.
Module 6: Tracking, Analysis, and Optimization
Understanding the key metrics in affiliate marketing:
Clicks
Conversions
Earnings per click (EPC)
Return on investment (ROI)
Using analytics tools to monitor performance:
Google Analytics for tracking website traffic.
Affiliate network dashboards for monitoring clicks and commissions.
A/B testing different strategies to find what works best.
Continuous optimization for sustained growth and improved results.
Why Choose This Course?
Proven Strategies: Learn techniques that have helped thousands of affiliates succeed.
Actionable Content: No fluff—everything you learn is practical and results-oriented.
Lifetime Access: Get lifetime access to the course material so you can revisit and learn at your own pace.
Mentorship: Receive guidance and support from an experienced affiliate marketer.
Community: Join a thriving community of like-minded individuals for networking and collaboration.
Bonuses Included
Free Templates and Tools: Access templates for email campaigns, social media posts, and blog layouts.
Exclusive Case Studies: Dive into real-world examples of successful affiliate marketers.
Lifetime Mentorship: Personalized coaching to guide you beyond the course.
Certificate of Completion: Showcase your new skills to potential clients or employers.
Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)
Q: Do I need any prior experience to take this course?
A: No! This course is designed for complete beginners.
Q: How much time do I need to dedicate each week?
A: We recommend spending 4-6 hours per week to complete the modules and apply what you learn.
Q: What if I don’t have a website or blog?
A: Don’t worry! We’ll guide you through the process of setting up your platform step-by-step.
Q: How soon can I expect results?
A: Results vary depending on the effort you put in, but many students see progress within the first few weeks.
What Students Are Saying
“I had no idea where to start with affiliate marketing, but this course broke everything down into simple steps. Within two months, I made my first $500 online! Highly recommend it to anyone looking to start their journey.” — Jane K.
“The mentorship and community support are unmatched. I feel confident and equipped to grow my affiliate marketing business.” — David M.
Enroll Now
Take the first step towards building a profitable online business. Enroll in Affiliate Marketing Mastery for Beginners today and transform your passion into income.
Limited-Time Offer
Sign up now and get 20% off the course fee. Don’t miss this opportunity to start your affiliate marketing journey!
Enroll Now

As the digital landscape evolves, Pinterest has emerged as a powerhouse for inspiration and ideas, making it an ideal space for your brand to shine, To navigate this dynamic platform effectively, a strategic Pinterest affiliate marketing plan is crucial, In this class, I will guide you through essential steps to craft a winning Pinterest strategy.


From identifying the right keywords to creating visually captivating pins, you'll gain practical insights to enhance the visibility of your content in searches, I've got you covered with tips on leveraging Pinterest boards strategically to grow your online presence, Learn how to organize boards that mirror your brand, attracting a broader audience and fostering engagement within a community.


Discover the art of securing a spot on people's homefeeds through proven strategies that align with Pinterest's algorithm, I'll unveil techniques to optimize your profile and pins for increased visibility in search results, ensuring your content reaches a wider audience.


Delve into the power of analytics and uncover trending topics and keywords using data, This invaluable information enables you to stay ahead of trends and tailor your content to resonate with the current Pinterest landscape.


Furthermore, I'll share tips on optimizing your content to encourage more saves, a metric that can significantly boost your reach and influence on the platform, Whether you're a seasoned marketer or just starting, this course provides accessible, actionable advice to tailor Pinterest to your advantage.


Join me as we dive into the world of Pinterest marketing, unlocking the potential to propel your brand to new heights, Let's transform your Pinterest presence and make it work for you!

courses.description:
WILLKOMMEN ZUM KOMPLETTEN UDEMY AFFILIATE MARKETING KURS
In meinem Kurs "Praxis - Mit Affiliate Marketing zum eigenen Online Business" zeige ich dir alles von A-Z. Nachdem ich eine kleine einleitende Präsentation zu Affiliate Marketing und meinen Strategien im Affiliate Markt, gehalten habe, geht es im zweiten Video auch schon direkt mit der eigentlichen Praxis los. Die ersten beiden Videos sind dabei noch komplette Theorie, um dir einen vernünftigen Überblick von vornherein mit in den Kurs und in die Praxis geben zu können.
Mit diesem Kurs baust du dir dein eigenes Online Business als Affiliate Marketer auf. Nach dem Kurs (vorausgesetzt du machst mir alles Schritt für Schritt nach) wirst du langfristig bares Geld verdienen. Wie viel du verdienst hängt dabei ganz und alleine von dir und deinem Willen ab, es auch durch zu ziehen!
Also solltest du Geld im Internet seriös verdienen wollen, ist dies der perfekte Einstiegs-Kurs für dich und deine Freunde :)
Du lernst folgende Dinge in diesem sehr ausführlichen Affiliate Marketing Kurs:
1. "Nischen und Partner": In diesem Modul erkläre ich dir was Nischen sind und welche du belegen solltest weil diese den meisten Umsatz für dein eigenes Online Business bringen und mit welchen Partnern und Partnerprodukten wir arbeiten.
2. Im zweiten Modul "Gewerbeanmeldung" erkläre ich dir alle Formalien die du für eine Gewerbeanmeldung benötigst, einschließlich steuerliche Empfehlungen von mir und natürlich einem solidem Gewerbegrund.
3. Im dritten Modul "Domain und Hosting" zeige ich dir den besten Anbieter und erkläre dir alles über die Domain Erstellung und das Installieren von Wordpress auf diese Domain.
4. Im vierten Modul "Wordpress", erkläre ich dir alles über Wordpress und wie du damit wunderschöne Blogs und Landingpages erstellen kannst.
5. Im fünften Modul "Optimizepress" zeige ich dir unsere Geheimwaffe für das Erstellen von sogenannten OPT-IN Seiten und alle Funktionen von Optimizepress.
6. Im sechsten Modul "Landingpage erstellen", erstellen wir zusammen eine wunderschöne und conversionstarke Landingpage bzw. OPT-IN Seite.
7. Im siebten Modul "Email Software Klick Tipp" zeige ich dir Klick Tipp mit allen wichtigen Funktionen und einen ersten Aufbau deiner ersten Follow-Up Kampagne oder auch Salesfunnel (Verkaufstrichter) genannt.
8. Im achten Modul "Exit Grabber" erkläre ich dir was ein Exit Grabber ist und wie du in anwenden kannst und solltest, natürlich machen wir dies alles zusammen direkt in der Praxis auf einer Testseite von mir.
9. Im neunten Modul "Verkaufspsychologie" erkläre ich dir alle Tipps und Tricks wie du am besten automatisiert mittels Salesfunnels verkaufst.
10. Im zehnten Modul "Webseiten Struktur" zeige ich dir unsere getestete Webseiten Struktur die du natürlich nachbauen darfst. Diese Struktur ist unfassbar effektiv im verkauf von fremden Produkten.
11. Im elften Modul "Kostenloser Traffic" erkläre und zeige ich dir sämtliche Strategien um kostenlosen Traffic für deine erste Landingpage zu generieren. In diesem Modul gehe ich unter anderem auch auf ein Tool ein, mit dem du 24 Stunden am Tag automatisiert Traffic erzeugen kannst.
12. Im zwölften und letzten Modul "Google Analytics" zeige ich dir Google Analytics, wie du dir deine erste Property erstellst bis hin zum installieren deines ersten HTML-Pixels um den Traffic auf deiner OPT-IN Page zu tracken.
Dieser Kurs hat es wirklich in sich und wird dich zu einem Affiliate Marketing Profi machen. Nach der erfolgreichen Umsetzung des Kurses wirst du Geld im Internet verdienen und kannst somit dein Online Business immer weiter skalieren.
Falls du Fragen zu meinem Kurs oder zu meiner Person hast, kannst du mir immer jederzeit schreiben.
target_audience: Online Marketer

Networker

objectives: ライバルと価格競争をせず、需要があるのに見過ごされている「ブルーオーシャン市場」を見つけ出す「ずらし思考」が身につきます。
PPC広告への「怖い」「高い」という誤解を解き、1クリック数円といった低予算からでも広告をテストできるリスク管理術を学びます。
ChatGPTなどのAIツールを「思考のパートナー」として、キーワードのアイデア出しやターゲットの悩み深掘り、広告文作成に活用できるようになります。
講座内の実践ワークを通じて、あなた自身が扱う案件で、実際に収益化が狙える「お宝ずらしキーワード」の候補を3つ以上発見できます。
SEOのように何ヶ月も待つことなく、最短1日でアクセスを集め、最速で収益化を目指すための具体的な考え方を習得します。

はじめに - SEOの消耗戦に終止符を打つ新しい道: ようこそ！この講座であなたが得られる「新しい未来」

requirements: PPC広告やAIに関する専門知識は一切不要です。  ゼロから丁寧に解説しますので、ご安心ください。

courses.description:
【こんな悩みを抱えていませんか？】
毎日ブログを更新しても、一向に順位が上がらない…
狙いたいキーワードは、いつもライバルが強すぎる…
キーワード選定に膨大な時間をかけているのに、成果に繋がらない…
Googleのアップデートがある度に、収益が吹き飛ぶ恐怖に怯えている…
AIが便利だと聞くけど、何から手をつければいいかわからない…


かつての私がそうだったように、もしあなたが一つでも当てはまるなら、この講座はあなたのためのものです。




【この講座で、あなたは「新しい地図」を手に入れます】
こんにちは、カズヤンです。


かつてSEOで月200万円を稼ぎ、しかしアップデートで全てを失った僕が、その絶望から見つけ出した「新しい時代の戦い方」。
それが、「ずらしキーワード」×「PPC広告」×「AI」を組み合わせた戦略です。


この入門講座は、その戦略の最も重要で本質的な部分を、誰でも実践できるよう体系化したものです。


もうGoogleの顔色をうかがい、ライバルと消耗戦を繰り広げる必要はありません。




【この講座で学べること】
ライバルがひしめくレッドオーシャンから抜け出すための「ずらし思考」
AIを「便利な相棒」として、キーワードのアイデア出しや悩みの深掘りに活用する方法
あなただけのお宝「ずらしキーワード」の候補を、実際に3つ見つけ出す実践ワーク
PPC広告への「怖い」「高い」という誤解を解き、低リスク・低予算で始めるための考え方
AIにクリックされやすい広告見出しを考えさせる具体的なテクニック


【これは、単なるノウハウではありません】


この講座でお伝えするのは、小手先のテクニックではなく、Googleの変動に左右されずに長期的に安定した収益を目指すための「思考のコンパス」を手に入れることです。


あなたの努力が正しく報われる未来へ、一緒に第一歩を踏み出しましょう。
講座の中でお会いできることを、心から楽しみにしています！
target_audience: 長年SEOアフィリエイトを頑張ってきたが、Googleのアップデートや競合の激化で収益が不安定になり、限界を感じている方
キーワード選定に多くの時間を費やしているものの、なかなか成果に繋がらず消耗してしまっている方
AIツールに興味はあるものの、種類が多すぎたり、使い方が分からなかったりして、ビジネスに活用できていない方
SEOのように成果が出るまで待つのではなく、もっと早く、再現性の高い方法で収益を上げたいと考えている方
ライバルがひしめくレッドオーシャンでの競争に疲れ、「戦わない戦略」で安定して稼ぎたいと願う方

During the course I will walk you through the exact steps I took to building a video affiliate network and make sales on autopilot and also building a list of hungry buyers.
Back in 2014, I was trying every way I could to build a successful online business so that I could work from home or travel anywhere in the world.
I tried many different ways to build the perfect online business but always had a passion for video.
I learnt and understood the power of video, especially with YouTube being one of the biggest social platforms today with over a billion views a day, I knew there was a business to be created and built.
If you are new to affiliate marketing or CPA and are not sure how you make sales via affiliate links then this course is perfect for you,it will show you how to build a video empire and make sales whatever niche you are in.
The course itself is set out in video format with me on each video explaining how we build your new business, (no boring slide shows) it will be me walking you through all the steps, over  the shoulder training course so you can really get to grips on how I do it day by day in my business.
Becoming one of my students you will have access to communicate directly with me under the heading course comments.
I am here to help you succeed in your new venture of Video SEO, so feel free to reach out to me and together let’s make this happen.
There are new products being launched everyday on JVzoo and Clickbank, you can become an affiliate marketer and work from anywhere in the world promoting products from JVzoo and any other affiliate network. YouTube is one of the most powerful ways today to do affiliate marketing as it grows day to day. Understanding JVzoo and how video marketing works you can turn your hand to many different angles for multiple streams of income using video and YouTube, Check out my other courses on other ways you can use video to build a good online business.

courses.description:
Are you looking for a reliable way to earn money online? Amazon Affiliate Marketing is one of the most popular and profitable ways to generate passive income by promoting products on Amazon. In this "Make Money Through Amazon Affiliate in Hindi/Urdu" course, you will learn everything you need to know about getting started with Amazon’s affiliate program, how to drive traffic to your affiliate links, and strategies to maximize your earnings.
This comprehensive course is designed specifically for beginners and is taught in Hindi/Urdu to ensure the content is accessible and easy to understand. Whether you're a student, a stay-at-home parent, a full-time professional, or someone looking to start an online business, this course provides you with the knowledge and tools to start earning money through affiliate marketing on Amazon.
What You Will Learn:
Introduction to Amazon Affiliate Program: Understand the basics of Amazon’s affiliate marketing program and how it works to help you earn commissions by promoting products.
Creating an Amazon Associates Account: Learn how to sign up for Amazon’s affiliate program, set up your account, and configure your settings.
Choosing the Right Products to Promote: Discover how to find profitable products with high demand and decent commission rates to promote in your niche.
Generating Affiliate Links: Learn how to create affiliate links for products, how to customize them, and how to share them on your website, blog, or social media.
Driving Traffic to Your Affiliate Links: Master techniques for increasing traffic to your affiliate links using SEO, content marketing, social media platforms like YouTube, Instagram, and Facebook, and email marketing.
Creating Effective Content: Learn how to produce valuable content (blogs, YouTube videos, posts) that engages your audience and persuades them to purchase the recommended products.

courses.description:
Академію арбітражу трафіку «Arbitrage Up» засновано у серпні 2020 року. Спочатку ми проводили лише навчання для медіабаєрів нашої команди. Але згодом ми почали отримувати багато повідомлень від інших арбітражників із проханням навчити їх. Так і почав розвиватись наш проект.

Головний принцип нашого навчання – індивідуальність, тому з кожним учнем працює персональний коуч, який є на 100% практиком в арбітражі і так само працює з трафіком щодня. Таким чином, будь-який учень отримає тільки ту інформацію, яка працює тут і зараз, і за допомогою якої він зможе працювати: запускати рекламні кампанії, створювати рекламні креативи, орієнтуватися у виборі оферів.

Ми створили такий підхід до навчання, завдяки якому кожен учень отримує не просто базові знання, а реальні навички, котрі дають можливість працювати уже після проходження курсу. Ми не хочемо створювати черговий інфопродукт, який не несе реальної користі для студентів. Ми не ведемо навчання сугобо по записаним відео та текстовим матеріалам.

НАША МЕТА
Навчити студентів професії медіабаєра та направити до рівня топових фахівців у сфері арбітражу трафіку

У стартовому курсі ми розібрали такі теми:
- Що таке арбітраж трафіку
- Чим відрізняється арбітражник від таргетолога
- Де беруть клієнтів (товари) арбітражники. Що таке партнерка?
- З чого складається день арбітражника І багато іншого.
- Що таке напрямок нутра - Що таке напрямок гемблінг - Що таке напрямок дейтинг - Чому варто займатися арбітражем? І багато іншого
target_audience: Для тих, хто десь чув про арбітраж, але не до кінця розуміє, як там можна заробляти
Хто вже пробував запускатися, але не до кінця зрозумів, що потрібно зробити, щоб працювати в плюс
Стикається зі складнощами в запуску і не знає, як їх вирішити самотужки

हमारे संपूर्ण हिंदी में प्रदान किए गए इस कोर्स में, आप एफिलिएट मार्केटिंग की दुनिया में एक परिवर्तनात्मक यात्रा पर निकलेंगे। चाहे आप इस विचार के नए हों या अपने कौशल को बेहतर बनाने की तलाश में हों, यह कोर्स एफिलिएट मार्केटिंग की जटिलताओं की गहराईयों में घुसने की गहराईयों में दृढ़ अनुभव प्रदान करता है। आपको इस कोर्स के माध्यम से मूल सिद्धांतों की समझ से लेकर उन्नत रणनीतियों को समझाया जाएगा, ताकि आप अपने व्यवसाय में महत्वपूर्ण योगदान कर सकें।

استعد للانطلاق في رحلة تعلم استثنائية واكتساب المعرفة والمهارات اللازمة لتحقيق النجاح المالي والمهني في مجال التسويق بالعمولة
هذا الكورس الممتاز سيمكنك من اكتشاف أسرار التسويق بالعمولة واستغلال قوتها لبناء عمل مربح على الإنترنت وتحقيق الاستقلال المالي الذي تصبو إليه


من خلال هذا الكورس، ستغوص في عالم شيق يكشف لك أفضل الاستراتيجيات والتقنيات للتسويق بالعمولة. ستتعلم كيفية اختيار الشركاء المناسبين والعروض المربحة، وكيفية بناء شبكة عملاء قوية تعمل على زيادة مبيعاتك وأرباحك.


ستتعلم أيضًا كيفية استخدام أدوات التسويق الرقمي والتواصل الاجتماعي بفعالية لجذب الجمهور المستهدف وبناء علاقات طويلة الأمد مع العملاء. ستتمكن من تحليل البيانات وقياس أداء حملاتك التسويقية وتحسينها لتحقيق أقصى قدر من النتائج.


بفضل هذا الكورس الشامل، ستكون لديك القدرة على بناء استراتيجية تسويقية ناجحة وتحقيق أرباح مذهلة في مجال التسويق بالعمولة. ستحصل على المعرفة والأدوات اللازمة لتطوير مهاراتك وتحقيق نجاح مستدام في مجالك.


بعد الانتهاء من هذا الكورس، ستكون قادرًا على بناء سمعة ممتازة في صناعة التسويق بالعمولة والتميز في أداءك. ستتمتع بالثقة والقدرة على التعامل مع أي تحدي يواجهك وتحقيق نتائج استثنائية في حملاتك التسويقية.


لا تضيع الفرصة، انضم إلى هذا الكورس الاستثنائي الآن واستعد للانطلاق نحو النجاح الشخصي والمالي في عالم التسويق بالعمولة. احصل على التدريب الشامل والدعم المستمر لتحقيق أهدافك وتحول حلمك إلى حقيقة ملموسة

Are you new to Affiliates, Partnerships & Influencers? Are you looking at setting up an Affiliate and Influencer channel in your own business? Or perhaps looking to improve your existing channels and relationships?
Then this is the course for you!
Affiliates, Partners and Influencers, are all extremely similar but also very different, with their own individual characteristics to grasp, in order to capitalise on each. Many marketers might already be familiar with affiliates, but are they capturing the true power of integration partnerships via API's? Or truly benefiting from the explosion in Influencer Marketing options? This course aims to bring all these aspects together into one easy to digest place.
Learn about some of the biggest brands in the world; Pepsi, Samsung, Spotify and Nike and how they're managing their affiliate programmes. Learn how Deliveroo, New Look and Citymapper are breaking new boundaries in partnership marketing. And understand how H&M, Maybelline, and Taco Bell are realising the power of influencers like Zoela, David Beckham and Joy Cho via Instagram, TikTok and YouTube.
To truly become an all-round marketer one needs to understand the ever-evolving techniques of Affiliates, Partnerships & Influencers!

Partnercademy is the largest FREE resource hub for Partnerships & Affiliate professionals to learn and upskill. We'll turn you into a Partnerships expert with our FREE resources, expert courses, and bespoke 1-to-1 Q&A sessions.

Our aim is to turn you all into experts!

Neste curso, você vai aprender o passo a passo de como criar sua própria estrutura de vendas automatizadas para trabalhar de forma mais profissional em busca de grandes resultados.


Para afiliados e produtores digitais.


A historia mostra que o marketing não é novo, mas sim muito velho. As únicas coisas que mudam são as técnicas utilizadas.


O mercado de produtos digitais cresce a cada ano, no Brasil 7 em cada 10 usuários de internet realizam compras.
Isso equivale a R$ 166,2 Bilhões nos últimos anos (dados de 2018) em vendas de produtos pela internet.
São Milhares de pessoas 24 horas por dia buscando soluções, receitas, dicas, entretenimento e informação e claro...produtos que atendam suas necessidades.
Se uma pessoa busca emprego, existem centenas de treinamentos que podem ajudar... se as pessoas buscam formas de empreendimentos para melhorar sua renda com o tempo livre em suas casas, teremos muitos E-Books que poderão ajudar.
Neste cenário o Empreendedor digital, aquele que se dedica a criar material de qualidade em vídeos, Blogs, Sites... E-books tem papel protagonista.


O curso é focado para criar uma, ou varias, estruturas própria para aumentar as vendas trabalhando de forma totalmente profissional.
Mandando seus clientes, ou compradores em potencial, para o seu próprio link de afiliado.

requirements: O único pré-requisito para este curso é a sua vontade de ter sucesso e desenvolver-se numa carreira primissora
O interesse em negócios com Marketing Multinível (MMN) e o desejo de trabalhar desenvolvendo plataformas o ajudarão a ampliar seus horizontes
courses.description:
O Marketing de Rede ou Multinível é um dos modelos de negócios mais exclusivos e lucrativos do mundo, mas ainda muito incompreendido atualmente. A beleza do marketing de rede é que qualquer pessoa tem a chance de começar sem nenhuma experiência, conhecimento ou educação. Infelizmente, a maioria das pessoas não valoriza essa oportunidade e espera ficar rico magicamente rápido sem trabalhar duro para isso.
Embora você possa ingressar facilmente em qualquer empresa de Marketing Multinível, mesmo sem conhecimento ou habilidades anteriores, você precisa se atualizar rapidamente com a autoeducação para obter sucesso. No entanto, não existem cursos de marketing de rede oferecidos por escolas de negócios e não é fácil encontrar uma boa fonte para se educar como um profissional de marketing de rede.
Assim sendo, num esforço para preencher esta lacuna educacional, um grupo de especialistas em marketing de rede vêm se reunindo através de uma Plataforma voltada às Vendas Diretas. Chamamos esta comunidade de Plataforma de Negócios e no ano de 2022, motivado pela procura de pessoas à procura destes conhecimentos, nosso CEO Mauricio de Araujo decidiu lançar pela primeira vez este programa de Formação de Especialistas em Plataformas MMN, onde você poderá ter acesso de forma única e exclusiva à uma Série de Masterclasses e Aulas produzidas, num compilado de mais de 20 aulas práticas onde ensinamos a realizar a criação de uma Plataforma de Marketing Multinível MMN, desde a contratação do servidor ideal até a instalação do sistema e preparação para as primeiras vendas e cadastros. Uma experiencia completa para capacitar os profissionais de marketing de rede e vendedores diretos, dando-lhes o conhecimento e a autoconfiança de que precisam para ter sucesso em suas carreiras.
A Formação de Desenvolvedor de Plataformas MMN oferece uma riqueza de conhecimento condensada nas Masterclasses em vídeo, dividido em videoaulas que levam você em exemplos práticos,  revelando os segredos para se tornar um profissional desenvolvedor desta plataforma de rede, bem-sucedido e auto suficiente.
Ao final deste curso, você estará preparado para iniciar ou impulsionar seu próprio negócio de vendas diretas com estratégias de Marketing Multinível sem depender de sistemas de terceiros.
target_audience: Desenvolvedores, programadores iniciantes, entusiastas, empreendedores e idealizadores de negócios.
Vendedores diretos iniciantes e experientes e profissionais de marketing de rede poderão se beneficiar deste curso.

Mães e pais em home office, estudantes e qualquer pessoa que queira ganhar dinheiro fazendo um negócio de baixo custo e pouco risco. enfim, qualquer pessoa que deseja criar um fluxo de renda sustentável e crescente.
Nunca vendeu ou comercializou nada? Nem gosta de marketing e vendas? Então este curso é para você também! Isto vai lhe surpreender... Garantido!

courses.description:
Unlock the secrets to success with Amazon Affiliate Marketing, Amazon FBA, Kindle Direct Publishing (KDP), and ACX with Team-LearnersCare LLC's comprehensive and in-depth course. Perfect for entrepreneurs, authors, and marketers looking to elevate their e-commerce business, this course covers everything you need to know about leveraging Amazon's vast platforms for profitability and growth.
Join Team-LearnersCare LLC's ultimate Amazon Affiliate Marketing, Amazon FBA, Kindle Direct Publishing (KDP), and ACX course, designed to transform your understanding of online business.
This course is meticulously crafted to cater to both beginners and seasoned professionals aiming to harness the full potential of Amazon's ecosystem.
Whether you are looking to dive into affiliate marketing, start an Amazon FBA business, publish your own Kindle books, or create audiobooks with ACX, this course has you covered.
Why Choose This Course?
1. Amazon Affiliate Marketing: Begin your journey with a thorough overview of affiliate marketing, including choosing the right products to promote, utilizing various marketing channels, and advanced tactics to maximize your earnings. Delve into strategies for selecting affiliate marketplaces, driving traffic, and crafting a solid marketing plan.
2. Mastering Amazon FBA: Unlock the secrets of Amazon FBA with insights into avoiding common mistakes, essential tools for sellers, and strategies for seamless WooCommerce and Amazon integration. Learn how to select profitable products, price them effectively, and source high-quality inventory. Gain valuable tips on understanding buyer personas and the advantages of Amazon FBA for reselling businesses.
3. Kindle Direct Publishing (KDP): Explore the world of Kindle publishing with comprehensive lectures on content guidelines, setting up a KDP account, and creating engaging Kindle Vella episodes. Learn to format your book, use Kindle Create software, and craft compelling titles and covers. This section also covers converting eBooks to paperbacks and optimizing your book for both print and Kindle.
4. Digital Product Marketing – eBook Riches: Discover the lucrative potential of eBooks with steps to write, outsource, and sell your own eBook. Learn to format your eBook for Kindle, create eye-catching covers, and price your book for maximum profit. Explore advanced strategies for repurposing eBook content and leveraging platforms like JVZoo for sales.
5. Publishing AudioBooks with ACX: Step into the world of audiobooks with detailed guidance on setting up an ACX account, meeting ACX requirements, and hiring narrators. Gain hands-on experience in recording, editing, and processing audio manuscripts. Learn the intricacies of the claim and upload process, including creating cover art and managing your author page.
6. Advanced Publishing and Marketing Strategies: Enhance your skills with advanced courses on KDP, using PLR content, and essential tools for audiobook creation. Learn to strip video into audio, edit chapters, remove noise, and render high-quality audio files. This section also covers transcription, blogging for your author page, and running Amazon giveaways to boost visibility and sales.
Course Highlights:
Comprehensive Curriculum: Covering all aspects of Amazon Affiliate Marketing, Amazon FBA, Kindle Direct Publishing, and ACX.
Expert Instructors: Learn from industry professionals with hands-on experience.
Practical Insights: Real-world strategies and tools to implement immediately.
Flexible Learning: Access the course anytime, anywhere with lifetime access.
Community Support: Join a network of like-minded learners and industry experts.
Who Should Enroll?
Aspiring entrepreneurs looking to start an online business
Authors and writers aiming to publish and market their books
Marketers and affiliates seeking to maximize their earnings
Anyone interested in leveraging Amazon's platforms for success
Embark on a transformative journey with Team-LearnersCare LLC's Amazon Affiliate Marketing, Amazon FBA, Kindle Direct Publishing, and ACX Mastery Course. Enroll today and take the first step towards e-commerce success!
target_audience: Entrepreneurs and Aspiring Business Owners: Individuals looking to start or scale their online businesses using Amazon's platforms for affiliate marketing, FBA (Fulfillment by Amazon), Kindle Direct Publishing (KDP), and ACX audiobooks.

Authors and Content Creators: Writers interested in self-publishing eBooks and audiobooks on Kindle and Audible platforms, seeking to understand the nuances of digital publishing and audiobook production.
Digital Marketers and Affiliates: Professionals aiming to enhance their affiliate marketing strategies, drive traffic effectively, and optimize earnings through Amazon's expansive affiliate programs.

Anyone Interested in Passive Income: Those intrigued by the potential of passive income streams through digital products like eBooks and audiobooks, using platforms like KDP and ACX for distribution and sales.

courses.description:
Learn the fundamental concepts, techniques, and steps that you will need to build fully functional affiliate marketing niche-websites
Build a strong foundation in affiliate marketing and SEO-oriented strategy in this tutorial for beginners. The lessons contains the most up-to-date 2017 plugins in Wordpress.
Wordpress website and Domain name creation
Item categories development
Types of affiliate marketing programs – evaluation
SEO structure enhancing technique + search engine rank boost
Launch of finalized affiliate marketing website

A Strategic and Insightful Tool at Your Fingertips
Learning the fundamentals of affiliate marketing puts a powerful and effective tool at your fingertips. Affiliate marketing in itself is free, easy to master, well documented throughout the Internet, and is of considerable importance if you plan on expanding your knowledge on the online market.
Jobs in affiliate marketing are plentiful, and being able to learn affiliate marketing will give you a strong background to easily pick up other marketing-oriented types of business.
For example, during the course we will learn how to design the layout of your website homepage. Not only you will learn to fully develop a website, as well as to promote affiliate marketing products on it–you will also master some skills that are part of the advertisement-marketing industry. You will consolidate to a great extend your skills as a 360° computer/business person.
Content and Overview
Suitable for intermediate computer users, throughout this course of 16 lectures and 2 hours of content, you will learn all of the Affiliate Marketing fundamentals and acquire a strong understanding of the concept behind affiliate marketing. In each video I limited all of the unnecessary points. I kept every video lesson concise and straight-to-the-point.
Starting with the installation of Wordpress as our main website-development platform, this course will take you through choosing your niche, your theme, adding social media plugins and show how to use them. By establishing a strong niche for your website, as well as a neat-looking design, you’ll build a strong understanding of the affiliate marketing.
With these basics mastered, the course will take you through Search Engine Optimization techniques, which are fundamental to master in order to rank high in the search engine (i.e. Google). You’ll learn how to remove unuseful footer credits, how to create high-quality interlinks/backlinks/anchors, how to setup your Categories Page, and how to target keywords to redirect users to the products they’re looking for.
You will learn how to target keywords organically, without appearing “spammy” to Google’s algorithm. You will master the art of creating original content, which is instrumental in order to rank high in the search engine. You will finally learn how to choose the right products to add on your website, and which affiliate marketing program best fits your specific case. You will see how to add “Check It Out” buttons to your products, and insert backlinks to redirect visitors to the main seller with whom we partner as affiliate marketers. We will add a bit of coding to our Categories and Home pages, so that we can further enhance our SEO status.
Students completing this course will have the knowledge to create functional and useful affiliate marketing niche websites.
Complete with working files and screen-recorded videos, you will be able to work alongside the author as you learn each concepts, and will receive a verifiable certificate of completion upon finishing the course.
target_audience: The ideal student for this course is an intermediate computer user who wants to expand his/her own current marketing skills; or an entrepreneur who wants to launch a product, an online startup business of their own

courses.description:
Introducing
A Brand New Over-The-Shoulder Video Series On How To Launch Your Product With JVZoo
JVZoo For Beginners: Fast Track Training


Dear Friend,
The biggest challenge all online businesses face is getting traffic and making sales. You can’t make a single cent if you’re not getting any traffic.
How does a business attract customers if they’re not marketing professionals? The answer is through affiliate marketing.
More to the point, it’s by having your offer on JVZoo. JVZoo products can be promoted by thousands of affiliate marketers.
Their promotion of your product will free you to do other things. Now you’ll be able to focus on improving your existing product or even create a new one.
We Go Over The Process From Start To Finish
When you first start using JVZoo, it can seem complicated. There are all kinds of terms you have to learn, and the whole process can be overwhelming.
Don’t worry, we’ve got you covered. Our videos lay out in detail everything you need to do to have your offer on JVZoo.
We’ll also give you tips on how to find the best affiliates who’ll send traffic that converts.
You see, it’s not just a matter of having your offer listed in JVZoo.
You also need to attract the right affiliates to ensure that your offer gets as much exposure as possible.
Affiliate Marketers Are A Tough Nut To Crack
First, you've got to find them. Then, you’ve got to convince them to promote your offer.
JVZoo does all of that.
You don’t need to worry about any of it. By having your offer listed there, you’ll immediately get a sense of legitimacy.
You wouldn’t have this if you were trying to get affiliates through your site. Affiliates see your offer listed at JVZoo and they immediately think that it’s legit.
That’s the power of working with a trusted name like JVZoo.
You’ve Got Questions, And We’ve Got Answers
You’ve got plenty of questions about JVZoo. Sure, you could search the entire internet all day long trying to find answers to your questions.
You’ll end up finding some of the answers you’re looking for. But, it’s not a good use of your time.
More importantly, you’ll end up with several questions that go unanswered. You don’t want to go the route of seeming like a novice to those who will promote your offer.
The way you ensure this doesn’t happen is by watching our videos. They will know that you’re familiar with JVZoo and all of the features it has to offer.
Plus, you’ll be able to take advantage of those features as well. Success at JVZoo is a two-way street, and our videos are at the intersection of prosperity and wealth.
Skyrocket Sales With The Help Of JVZoo
You’re not here to earn peanuts. You want to make big bucks.
You can do just that with the power of the affiliates at JVZoo promoting your offer.
Don’t leave money on the table by not fully understanding how JVZoo works.
We’ll explain it all in an easy to follow format.
By investing a short amount of time now, you’ll be able to reap the massive rewards in the not so distant future.
Sign up for this training today and make your future as bright as it possibly can be.
---------------------------------------------------
Course Description And Overview:


Most people do not know how to get started with all the puzzling functions of the JVZoo Platform today. With this Fast Track Training course designed to take you through the Beginner's level, you will be up and running in no time using JVZoo with confidence.


JVZoo For Beginners: Fast Track Training is a straight to the point, step by step training course to get you started immediately.

courses.description:
Are you new to Influencer Marketing? Or are you looking to utilise Influencer Marketing in your business? Or perhaps you are a Marketing Manager who's looking to further up-skill on the topic?  Then this is the course for you.
Influencer Marketing is one of the most exciting marketing channels, with millions being spent by global brands such as Maybelline, Topshop, Taco Bell and H&M, so the time is now for marketing managers to fully grasp how to get the most out of it. This course aims to teach all those budding marketing managers, in particular those focusing on Influencer Marketing, how to start working with influencers, which influencers are right for your business and how to strategise top performing campaigns, and importantly track them.
Many Influencer Marketing courses out there are focusing on how to be an influencer, the concept of influencer marketing, or specifically Instagram or TikTok Influencers. While this course aims to look at it from the perspective of a Marketing Manager, and what they need to do to master the channel. We look at budgets, ROI, and tracking solutions to measure success.
Having worked for multiple UK start-ups to FTSE 100 companies, running their multi-million dollar affiliate and influencer programmes, I've noticed the power of utilising these channels for growing acquisition and brand building. And now I want to share this knowledge with you.
All marketers should understand the power of Influencer Marketing. This course is dedicated to those Influencer Marketing Managers who aim to utilise all it has to offer.


About the instructor:
Partnercademy (follow us on LinkedIn) is the largest FREE resource hub for Partnerships & Affiliate professionals to learn and upskill. We'll turn you into a Partnerships expert with our FREE resources, expert courses, and bespoke 1-to-1 Q&A sessions.
Partnercademy's courses now have over 10,000+ students with 500+ positive reviews. Some are even rated in the top 5% of all Udemy courses!
Our aim is to turn you all into experts!

courses.description:
はじめまして！講師の優花(Yuuka)です。


私はこれまでの様々なブログ収益化経験を元に、
ブログ収益化の講師やコンサルティングを行っております。
合わせて全日本SEO協会認定のSEOコンサルタントとしても活動しており、
皆様のWEBの上位表示を叶えるお手伝いもさせていただいております。


本コースにご興味持っていただいた方には、
・アフィリエイトに興味あるけれど、実際にどうやって始めたらよいのかわからない
・アフィリエイトで収益化できるイメージがわかない
・今までチャレンジしたけれど収益化できなかった


という方も多いと思います。


私もブログを始める前は同じように手探りでしたが、
学んで実践した結果、累計1000万円以上、また1記事で300万円以上の収益化など、
少ない記事で収益化させることができるようになりました。


そこでこのコースでは、
◆ただのアフィリエイトブログの手法ではなく、
「少ない記事で収益化する・アフィリエイトブログの収益化方法」について徹底解説します。
収益化の流れやノウハウ・重要な原則やポイントを凝縮してお伝えしています。


少ない記事数で収益化するためには必ず知っておきたい
◆収益化の流れや普遍のノウハウ
◆ジャンルやネタの狙い方の重要な原則やポイント
◆売れる記事の書き方やしかけ
◆欲しがる顧客を集客できるSEO対策


だけでなく・・・


長く稼ぎ続ける秘訣や、
最短距離で収益化させるネタやパターンの「実例」も余す所なくお伝えしていますので、


「より少ない記事」で「効果的に」
そして「継続的に」ブログ運営ができる方法がわかるようになります。


ブログ経験者でも、今あるブログにプラスして収益を増やせる、必須のスキル。


AIなどが出てきた現在でも「普遍の原理原則」ですので長く使える内容になっています。


今やビジネスマンでも主婦でも「副業」は当たり前の時代。
未来に備え、自分のビジネスを作るにはブログは最適です。
ブログで「売れる仕組みを作る力」はあなたを助けてくれる糧や資産となってくれます！

ブログで収益化するための原理原則とコツを理解して
最短距離で収益化させていきましょう！




■今でもブログで収益化できる理由とは？


ブログでの収益化は難しくなったと言われ、かれこれ10年。
でも依然として「ブログ初心者」でも収益化に成功している人は多数おり、ブログビジネスはいまだ健在です！


世の中は常に新しいニュースや話題、商品があふれ、人々の興味や関心が止まることはありません。
また、人々の悩みや不安も尽きることはなく、むしろ悩みは深く、増えている面もあります。
そんなところに着目し、世の中のニーズや悩みをしっかり押さえて発信していくことでブログ収益ができるようになります。


私が収益化できたのも、同じ理由です。なので皆さんにも、そして今からでもできることなのでご安心ください！
あなたの興味や趣味、気になることは同じように誰かが知りたいはず。

あなたが代わりに適切に記事にすることで、役に立ちながら収益化に繋げていくことができるのです。

■ただ・・・闇雲に記事を書いても収益化できません！


・人が集まる場所に (検索結果での上位表示)
・人が買う商品をおき (商品選定、ネタ選定)
・人が買いたくなる仕掛け作りをしておく (売れるライティング)
この3つを満たしていなければ収益化することは難しいです。


商売としては当たり前ですが、
「これをブログに置き換えたらどうしたら良いのか？」
を徹底解説しているのが本コースです。


ブログ収益化にはいくつかのパターンがありますが、いずれも
・ブログで売るための原理原則を理解して
・最短距離で収益化させる


方法を身につけることが肝になります。
本コースでは、これらの基本をしっかり段階的に学べるしくみになっています。


具体的には、


◆【必見】ブログマネタイズの基礎知識とおさえるべき重要ポイント
◆やってしまいがちな「収益化できないブログ5つの特徴」とは？
◆実際に収益化できたネタの実例・具体例を秘蔵公開！
◆ブログジャンル・テーマを決める時に外せない要点チェック法とは？
◆成果の出る案件の選び方とは？具体的ポイントを実演で解説
◆少ない記事で収益化を加速させるライティングテクニック
◆初心者でもできる！効果を高めるSEOポイント実践リスト


など、収益化ブログに育てるために欠かせないポイントをステップ別にお伝えしています。
ブログは山ほどあれど、これらを徹底できているブログが少ないのも事実です。
経験者の方にもぜひ押さえていただきたいポイントが満載です。
受講いただくと、ブログやネットビジネスが簡単に、そしてとても身近に見えてくることと思います。

初心者の方でもわかりやすく始められる内容となっておりますので、
ぜひ楽しみながら学んで頂ければと存じます。




■このコースを受講することで・・・


・アフィリエイト収益化への普遍の原理原則・手順を知ることができる。
・実績ある実例を知ることで
どんなネタをどんな記事にして収益化していくのかがわかる。
・自分にあったジャンル・案件選びのコツを把握できる。
・「売れる記事の型」を知り、効果的に記事を書く方法がわかる
・売れるしかけや、欲しがっている顧客の集客方法がわかる
・SEOコンサルタントによる Google検索での上位表示方法(SEO)なども知ることができる。


■こんな方が受講に向いています


収入の柱を増やしたい・副業をつくりたいと考えている人
ブログを使ったビジネス・収益の仕組み作りに興味がある人
ブログは作成していてもっと収益を増やしたい人
アフィリエイト広告の収益化ができるようになりたい人
少ない記事で収益を上げるためのネタや方法を具体的に知りたい人
SEOで集客するための施策、記事ライティングを知りたい人


■このコースは全部で９セクションです


セクション１：はじめに
セクション２：ブログで収益化するためのアフィリエイト導入の基礎知識
セクション３：なぜブログで収益化できないのか？
セクション４：少ない記事で収益化するためのトレンドASP戦略と実例紹介
セクション５：ブログジャンル・テーマの決め方
セクション６：アフィリエイト導入方法と成果の出る案件の選び方
セクション７：少ない記事で収益化するための記事作成と流れ
セクション８：効果を高めるSEO施策
セクション９：お礼とまとめ
セクション１０：ボーナスレクチャー


全部で8時間16分のコースです。
初心者の方でも、ポイントチェックシートや、記事作成のテンプレートを配布しておりますので、理解を深めながらじっくり進めていただけますので安心してご受講ください。


■最後に


ぜひこの機会に、役立つだけでなはない「収益化できるブログ」を作っていきましょう！
それでは、コースの中でお会いできるのを楽しみにしております！
target_audience: これからブログを始めてみたい人・ブログ初心者
ブログでどうやって収益化していくのか、収益化の仕組みと全体像を知りたい人

courses.description:
Complete Affiliate Marketing Course For Beginners


Are you ready to start making money online with affiliate marketing, even if you have no prior experience? This beginner-friendly course is designed to give you everything you need to launch and grow a profitable affiliate business by promoting ClickBank and other top affiliate platforms.
In this course, you'll learn step-by-step how affiliate marketing works and how to find high-converting products that pay commissions. You'll discover how to set up a simple but powerful sales funnel that collects leads and turns them into buyers—on autopilot.
One of the key skills you'll master is email list building, which is the foundation of long-term online success. You'll learn how to attract quality leads, build trust with your audience, and follow up with emails that convert.
To drive traffic to your offers, we’ll dive deep into solo ads—one of the fastest and most effective ways to get targeted visitors to your landing pages. You'll learn how to find reputable solo ad vendors, how to structure your campaigns for success, and how to track and improve your results over time.
This course is ideal for beginners who want a clear, proven system to follow—without having to build a website, create a product, or become a tech expert. If you’ve tried affiliate marketing before and struggled to get results, this course will help you fill in the missing pieces and finally start earning commissions.
By the end of the course, you’ll have a complete affiliate system up and running, and you’ll understand how to generate traffic, build your email list, and earn income consistently.
Whether you’re looking to make a little extra money or build a full-time business, this course will give you the tools and confidence to get started the right way.
What You'll Learn:
How to choose profitable affiliate products (ClickBank & more)
How to build a high-converting sales funnel
How to create and grow an email list from scratch
How to drive targeted traffic using free and paid email traffic
How to track, test, and optimize for better results
No experience? No problem. Just bring your motivation—and let’s build your affiliate marketing business together!
target_audience: This course is perfect for beginners who want to make money online through affiliate marketing, even with no prior experience. It’s ideal for anyone looking to promote ClickBank and other offers, build an email list, and drive traffic using solo ads. If you’re ready to learn and take action, this course is for you!

courses.description:
➡️ Nou in 2021 ⬅️
Invata ce este Marketing-ul Afiliat si cum il poti folosi pentru ca castiga niste bani sau pentru a monetezia proiectele tale. Cursul te va ajuta sa acoperi costul acestui sau in primele saptamani daca te tii de treaba.
In Romania exista sute de magazine online care iti ofera un comision in cazul in care le aduci clienti noi si comenzi. Profita de acest lucru, promoveaza produse pe care le cunosti sau care iti plac si castiga bani facand asta.
In acest curs iti voi explica modul in care poti sa analizezi ce magazine online sunt mai potrivite pentru a le promova, cum sa gasesti produse populare pentru a-ti creste sansele de conversie dar si mici exemple de proiecte care folosesc marketing-ul afiliat pentru monetizare.
In functie de cunostintele tale legate dar si de timpul pe care il ai la dispozitie iti ofer cateva variante prin care pot sa faci Marketing Afiliat. Nu e nevoie sa ai un website sau o pagina de facebook cu 100.000 de likes, poti genera comisioane folosind doar o platform de mesagerie online.
Le langa continutul video al cursului iti ofer si multe resurse extra, majoritatea gratuite, care sa te ajute sa te dezvolti.
Hai sa incepem!

courses.description:
Welcome to the Affiliate Marketing Course 2025, your comprehensive guide to mastering the world of affiliate marketing and earning passive income. Whether you're new to affiliate marketing or want to level up your existing skills, this course is crafted to take you step-by-step through the entire process, ensuring you're equipped to succeed in 2025 and beyond.
In this course, you'll start with the fundamentals: learning how affiliate marketing works, how to choose profitable niches, and how to find the best affiliate programs. You’ll then move on to setting up your affiliate website and mastering content creation to drive organic traffic. courses.description:
If you have always wanted to build profitable affiliate sites but could not find a guide that explained the whole process to you, this is the answer you have been looking for.
This series of video lectures covers just about everything you need to know about building amazon affiliate sites that generate commissions every month like clock work.
Creating these sites is possibly one of the easiest ways to start and setup an online business.
Niche research, keyword research, site structure for siloed sites and niche sites, basic SEO, advanced on page SEO and link building.
You will not find a course on the market that covers as much material as this course does - even most courses that cost several $1000 do not have half the information that's covered in this course.
The numerous worked examples will help you understand exactly how to choose profitable niches, what to look for while selecting keywords, how to develop content and build the site.
You are sure to be blown away by the material that's covered in the advanced SEO section. There is simply no other course on the market that covers what worked now in as much details as this course does.
The approach adopted here is 100% white hat. If you build your amazon affiliate sites like it is detailed here, you will not have to worry about any future Google updates that target spam sites and shady link building practices.
Here you will see how to build 100% white hat sites that can dominate the SERPs for 10s, if not 100s of keywords with minimal link building.
While this may sound hard get started with initially, the numerous step by step worked examples will show you all you need to know to build these sites yourself. And you will see how simple all of this really is once you know the key concepts and have seen all of the steps.
You will see how to get your sites generating revenues month after month almost like clockwork. Making money with amazon associates and creating successful sites is easy - once you know how. And you will get to see every step of the process in this course.
This course has been designed with beginners in mind - people who have never done any online advertising or SEO or even setup Wordpress sites ever. It will hold your hand and show you every step you need to take to generate an income online with these simple sites.
This course would be good even for affiliates who already have revenue generating sites and are looking for proven tips to increase their earnings.
These sites comply with amazon's official policies - these are not black hat sites that are here today and gone tomorrow.
This approach does is not about building a store on amazon - this is purely about building 100% white hat associates sites. And the two approaches are entirely different from each other.


Introduction


What is affiliate marketing?
In a nutshell, affiliate marketing is about sending traffic to a vendor’s site. The vendor will pay you a commission if the people you send to their site buy anything they may happen to be selling.
Amazon is one such vendor that has a very, very popular affiliate program.
Amazon - and its subsidiaries in several countries - will pay you commissions for sales you generate through your website.
For this to happen, you will need to have a site ranking high in Google and other search engines. These high rankings will mean folks who are searching for products will see your website in Google's search results, click on your website, read your article - and then hopefully click on your affiliate link, go to amazon and buy one or more products.
Since they clicked on your affiliate link and landed on amazon, your site acted as a bridge between Google and amazon.
And since you sent them to amazon, you will get a commission for products they might buy while on the site.
This is what affiliate marketing is all about.
You create websites, rank those sites on Google and other search engines, get traffic to your site - and send your visitors to the merchants site. In this case, the merchant is amazon. And you get paid commissions for whatever the people you sent to the merchant's site buy.
But before you will be able to build such websites that rank high on Google, you will need to learn SEO - or search engine optimization.
SEO is the process of getting organic - or free - traffic from Google and other search engines.
Without a sound knowledge of the various SEO techniques and principles, you will not be able to rank your websites in the search engines and get any organic traffic to your sites.
Which is why a large part of this course is about SEO.
All aspects of SEO are discussed in this course - from the fundamentals of SEO to advanced SEO concepts like silos that can help your pages rank with hardly any external backlinks.
Here's a detailed overview of what is covered in this course ...


Niche Research
A niche is a market segment that caters to a very specific group of people.
Before you can build a website, you will need to know which segment of people your website will target.
Ideally, your website should target to a very clearly defined niche. It simply cannot be everything to everyone.
Since amazon sells products, your niche has to be one that has several products being sold on amazon.
In this course, several niche research ideas are discussed. By applying these ideas, you will easily and quickly be able to find lucrative niches that have hot products on amazon.


Keyword Research
Once you have selected a bunch of niches that you find interesting, you will need to identify keywords within the niche that you would want to target.
This is possibly the most important part of the entire SEO process. You will need to select keywords that are fairly easy to rank - and can generate revenues if your site is to earn revenues month after month.
Selecting great keywords is one of the most important tasks an SEO does. It's critical that you target the right keywords - or else no amount of SEO might be able to help you rank your site.
This course covers keyword research in great depth.
Every step of the keyword research process is detailed, so you will be able to select the right kind of keywords. Nothing is left to chance.
Keyword research methods to generate keyword ideas in just about any niche are discussed in excruciating detail.
And then you get to see how to evaluate keywords for ease of ranking and revenue generating potential.
Once you have watched these keyword research videos, finding appropriate keywords in just about any niche will be a breeze.


Silo Architecture
This is rarely discussed in SEO and affiliate marketing courses - but this is a very, very important SEO concept.
Get this right and you will have a much easier time ranking your site in the search engines.
Many other SEO courses gloss over this concept, or do not present it in a easy to understand manner.
This course covers silos in depth - in a way that is very easy to understand.
Mastering silos will put you leagues ahead of your competition.


Complete Worked Example - mattress site blueprint
In this section, you will get to see a complete worked example.
You will get to see how the keyword research and selection process works, and how silos are designed.


The niche site model
While silos work very well, not everyone might want to build a siloed site. Most affiliate marketing sites are in fact niche sites.
This section discusses niche sites and how to make niche sites rank better in the search engines.


Choosing a domain name
This is a very important step in the process. Certain kinds of domain names may either help or hinder your SEO efforts. These are discussed here.


Building the website
We use WordPress - possibly the most popular CMS - to build our sites.
Almost everything you would want to know about building affiliate marketing WordPress sites is discussed here. Everything from
selecting a Wordpress theme
customizing themes
creating a child theme
Customizing Wordpress settings
choosing plugins
setting up plugins
choosing and setting up widgets
creating a favicon
adding and editing pages
adding social sharing buttons
and more.
You get to see which plugins you might want to use, how to configure each plugin for the most SEO benefits and more. The step by step worked examples that show these plugins being setup will help you set these up yourself.


Backup and restore
It's essential you know how to backup your WordPress sites. You would want to backup your sites periodically - and you would want to know how to restore your site if something were to go wrong.


Site speed - making your WordPress site fast
The faster your site loads, the better it will be for conversions.
You would want your site to load as fast as possible. Slow sites irritate people and can hurt your conversions.
In this section, you will get to see exactly how to make your WordPress site load as fast as possible. And you also get to learn what really matters when it comes to site speed.


Implementing silos in WordPress
Once you have learned what silos are and how they can help your SEO efforts, you would want to implement them.
But WordPress does not make implementing silos easy. It's not built that way. To implement silos, WordPress makes you jump through several hoops.
Here, you will see various methods to implement silos for your affiliate marketing sites in WordPress.


SEO 101
SEO is not hard, but it's a knowledge game. You either know what works or you do not. If you do not get the basics right, your affiliate site will not rank as well as it otherwise could.
The basics of SEO are covered in detail here.


Advanced on page SEO
While getting the basics of SEO is important, you will not be able to rank your associates website in competitive niches with just the basics alone. And most affiliate marketing sites are usually in fairly competitive niches.
For that, you will need to learn advanced SEO concepts that can turn the tables in your favor.
And there are a lot of these concepts that will need to be mastered before your site will do well in the search engines.
All of these are covered in detail here.
And numerous worked examples will help you understand these concepts better.


Link building
The right kind of links is essential if you are to succeed with your SEO efforts.
This section looks at the kind of links you would want to build, where to get them and more.


Building sites in niches with higher commissions
Recently, amazon changed their affiliate commission rates.
This section looks at the impact of the recent changes, and how to build sites in niches that pay very well now.
target_audience: Just about anyone who speaks English and is teachable.

Eine E-Mail-Liste kann ein äußerst wertvolles Instrument sein, um mit potenziellen Kunden in Kontakt zu treten, Marketingkampagnen durchzuführen und letztendlich deine Umsätze zu steigern.
Der "E-Mail Listen Multiplikator" ist speziell für Unternehmer, Online-Marketer und solche, die ihr Online-Business auf das nächste Level bringen möchten, konzipiert. Egal, ob du bereits eine kleine E-Mail-Liste hast oder ganz von vorne anfängst, dieser Kurs bietet dir die richtigen Strategien und Techniken, um deine Liste schnell und effektiv zu vergrößern.
In diesem Kurs werden wir verschiedene Aspekte behandeln, darunter:
Grundlagen der E-Mail-Marketing: Wir werden die Bedeutung von E-Mail-Marketing für dein Unternehmen verstehen und wie du es erfolgreich nutzen kannst, um deine Zielgruppe zu erreichen.
Erstellung einer attraktiven Lead-Magnet: Erfahre, wie du einen unwiderstehlichen Anreiz für potenzielle Abonnenten schaffst, um ihnen den Mehrwert zu bieten, den sie suchen. Wir werden verschiedene Lead-Magnet-Optionen erkunden und lernen, wie du sie effektiv einsetzen kannst.
Landing Pages, Opt-In-Formulare und Anmeldeprozesse: Entdecke bewährte Techniken zur Erstellung ansprechender Landing Pages, effektiver Opt-In-Formulare und optimierter Anmeldeprozesse, um hohe Konversionsraten zu erzielen.
Traffic-Generierung: Lerne verschiedene Strategien kennen, um qualifizierten Traffic auf deine Landing Pages zu leiten und so die Anzahl der Abonnenten zu steigern. Wir werden über organische und bezahlte Traffic-Quellen sprechen und die besten Ansätze für dein Business herausarbeiten.
Listensegmentierung und E-Mail-Automatisierung: Erfahre, wie du deine E-Mail-Liste segmentieren und personalisierte Kampagnen erstellen kannst, um deine Abonnenten zu engagieren und den Umsatz zu steigern. Wir werden auch die Automatisierung von E-Mail-Sequenzen behandeln, um deine Effizienz zu verbessern.

courses.description:
Se hai sempre desiderato creare un sito web di affiliazione redditizio, ma non hai trovato una guida che ti spiegasse l'intero processo, questo corso è esattamente ciò che stai cercando.


Il mio corso di Affiliate Marketing con Amazon e WordPress copre tutti gli aspetti che è necessario conoscere per costruire un portale redditizio che generi ogni mese decine di vendite dalla semplice promozione dei prodotti di Amazon.


Se vuoi lanciare la tua prima attività online nel mondo dell'affiliate marketing, sappi che si tratta di uno dei settori in maggior sviluppo negli ultimi anni!


DI COSA PARLEREMO DURANTE IL CORSO
Ho realizzato il mio corso in modo da coprire in modo esaustivo tutti gli argomenti che è necessario conoscere per lanciare un sito web di affiliazione realmente efficace.
Nello specifico, ecco gli argomenti di cui parleremo durante il corso:
Ricerca di una nicchia
Il processo di vendita di un prodotto
Ricerca di parole chiave efficace
Scelta dei migliori prodotti da promuovere
Ottimizzazione SEO
Architettura SILO
Realizzazione del sito web tramite WordPress
Personalizzazione delle funzionalità e della grafica del portale
Stesura di contenuti orientata alla vendita


Non troverai un corso sul mercato italiano che copra tutto il materiale di questo corso in modo così esaustivo!


METODOLOGIA DI LAVORO
Ho realizzato il corso con un approccio quanto più pratico possibile. Non ti porterò a studiare numeri, probabilità e concetti astratti ma ti guiderò invece in un percorso di apprendimento pratico e veloce, in modo che tu possa diventare rapidamente attivo con il tuo sito web.


I numerosi esempi di lavoro ti aiuteranno a capire esattamente come scegliere le nicchie redditizie, cosa cercare selezionando le parole chiave, come sviluppare contenuti e costruire il sito in modo da veicolare fin da subito dei volumi di traffico interessanti, con l'idea di farli crescere nel corso del tempo.


L'approccio che seguiremo durante il corso ti porterà a realizzare un sito di affiliazione efficace nella comunicazione ed apprezzato dai motori di ricerca come Google. Questo ti permetterà di non rischiare alcun tipo di penalizzazione da parte dei motori di ricerca.


PENSATO PER CHI PARTE DA ZERO


Non temere di rimanere indietro con le lezioni solo perchè stai appena cominciando ad imparare. Questo corso è pensato principalmente per quegli studenti che vogliono avvicinarsi per la prima volta al mondo del Marketing di Affiliazione e per questa ragione ogni aspetto trattato nel corso verrà curato in modo minuzioso e dettagliato.


Se dovessi trovarti in difficoltà, i numerosi esempi che ti proporrò ti permetteranno di chiarirti ogni aspetto delle lezioni. Inoltre, per qualunque dubbio che dovesse rimanere irrisolto, potrai contattarmi direttamente nella sezione Q&A di Udemy. Io o gli altri studenti saremo ben lieti di rispondere ad ogni tua domanda.




Cos'è il marketing di affiliazione?


In poche parole, con Marketing di Affiliazione, o Affiliate Marketing, si intende una pratica di marketing con la quale veicoliamo del traffico verso il sito web di un fornitore di beni o servizi, col fine di convertire queste visite in vendite.
Per ogni vendita da noi generata, il titolare del servizio che abbiamo promosso ci corrisponde una commissione sul fatturato.


Amazon, così come tanti altri portali, dispone di un proprio programma di affiliazione, che consente a chiunque sia in possesso di un sito web di guadagnare del denaro tramite la promozione di prodotti e servizi (come Amazon Music o Amazon Prime).


Quanto è possibile guadagnare con un sito web di affiliazione?


L'affiliate marketing è solo uno strumento. Per ogni vendita che portiamo verso Amazon, ci viene corrisposta una percentuale del totale variabile dal 3% al 12%. Non ci sono limiti virtuali al numero di vendite mensili per le quali possiamo generare una commissione.
L'unico limite che abbiamo è quello che ci poniamo noi stessi con l'ottimizzazione del nostro sito web di affiliazione. Lavorando duramente, è possibile costruire un portale in grado di generare anche centinaia di euro al mese, per non dire migliaia se si lavora con costanza ed impegno.


è davvero possibile guadagnare con l'affiliate marketing?


è più che possibile, anzi, si tratta di una vera e propria opportunità che sarebbe sciocco non cogliere!
Non bisogna tuttavia credere che i guadagni arrivino da soli. Per portare un sito web di affiliazione al successo è necessario seguire una metodologia di lavoro solida e precisa.
Puntare al caso, non è un'opzione e proprio per questo motivo ho impostato il contenuto di questo corso per darti una base di lavoro solida ed efficace da cui partire per impostare i contenuti del tuo sito web di affiliazione.
Lavorando con costanza ed applicando il metodo di lavoro che ti insegnerò, posso assicurarti che i risultati arriveranno prima di quanto ti aspetti!


Non ho altro da dirti. Ci vediamo in video!
