courses.description:
Affiliate Marketing con Wordpress e Amazon.
*******************
Corso completo su come costruire un sito completo utilizzando la popolare piattaforma di content management system di Wordpress, per poi monetizzarlo tramite il programma di affiliazione di Amazon. Siete liberi di visionare i prime tre moduli del corso anche se deciderete di non acquistarlo.
*******************
In questo corso vi farò vedere step by step come impostare un sito in affiliazione Amazon in grado di farvi guadagnare passivamente mese dopo mese, grazie alla sua capacità di posizionarsi organicamente sui motori di ricerca.
Tutto ciò che dovrete fare, è creare ottimi contenuti che i vostri visitatori vorranno leggere e condividere
************
Questo corso si basa sulla mia esperienza nel costruire siti in Affiliazione Amazon e non possiedo nessun contratto di associazione con Amazon esterno al programma di affiliazione.
************
In questo corso scoprirete come:


Individuare una niche sulla quale impostare il vostro sito
Ricercare le keywords più profittevoli, mirate e a bassa concorrenza sulle quali impostare i contenuti
Come iscriversi al programma di affiliazione di Amazon
Come importare i prodotti selezionati sul sito
Come effettuare il 'link cloaking'
Scoprire le strategie per posizionarsi organicamente sui motori di ricerca
Effettuare la condivisione sui social per massimizzare l'esposizione
Creare una strategia efficace per i contenuti
Scegliere un dominio efficace
Evitare gli errori tipici di un affiliate marketer alle prime armi
Inoltre in questo corso imparerete come utilizzare Wordpress per la costruzione del sito:


Installazione di Wordpress
Plugins
Temi
Categorie
Pagine
Modifica della homepage
Modifica della sidebar
Creazione del logo e del favicon
Modifica del menu principale e del footer del sito
Creazione delle pagine essenziali di qualsiasi sito che opera in affiliazione
Impostazione dello YOAST plugin per il Search engine optimisation del sito
Connettere i servizi di analisi targati Google essenziali come Google analytics e Google search console
E molto altro ancora...


Questo corso contiene tutti gli elementi di cui avete bisogno per avere successo con un sito di affiliazione Amazon.
************
Più di 8 ore di contenuto suddivise in 153 videos
************
Perchè dovreste investire sulla vostra formazione e acquistare questo corso?

In questo corso imparerete un sistema provato e comprovato. Prenderete un settore di mercato (niche) profittevole, e andrete a creare contenuti di qualità basati su keywords che andrete a ricercare e a validare. Dopodichè li andrete a monetizzare inserendo i links ai prodotti Amazon da voi selezionati. Solo la vostra perseveranza, e la vostra capacità di trovare un settore di mercato poco competitivo che vi permetterà di guadagnare in poco tempo, vi faranno avere successo in questo business. Ma non preoccupatevi! È tutto nel corso.


L'unico elemento del quale non discuteremo in questo corso, sono le sponsorizzate, in quanto potrebbero essere molto dispendiose e poco pratiche se non sappiamo come impostarle alla perfezione.


Grazie a questo corso, una volta che saprete come creare un sito, potrete ripetere l'intero procedimento e crearne a volontà. Ricordatevi che lo stesso procedimento, vale per la monetizzazione del sito utilizzando altri programmi di affiliazione oltre ad Amazon.
************
Iscrivetevi oggi stesso, non vedo l'ora di vedervi all'interno del corso!


Peace and Love
Paolo

requirements: Before starting this course, grab a big pad of paper and be prepared to take lots of notes.
courses.description:
This is a list of the Chapters you get when you sign up for this course.


Chapter 1 - Tried and Failed
I tried and failed over and over again and always blamed somebody else for my failure. The truth is you are the one person who will determine whether or not you will be successful.


Chapter 2 - Do What Successful People Do
If anybody else has made money in your company, you can make money in your company. Successful people are always willing to do things that unsuccessful people are unwilling to do.


Chapter 3 - You Don't Have To Be a Rocket scientist and You Don't Have To Be a Salesperson
Many people feel that they aren't cut out to become successful in network marketing because they aren't smart enough or because they don't like sales. Actually these are advantages because you are much more likely to allow yourself to be taught instead of believing you already have all the answers.


Chapter 4 - Do You Really Want To Succeed?
There are two kinds of people in this world, people who tell you what they are going to do and people who do what they say they're going to do. Success in network marketing is simple, it's all about action.


Chapter 5 - So What's Your Excuse?
Everybody has at least two or three excuses why they cannot become successful in network marketing. The truth is those excuses are the reasons you should become successful. For example, if you are 50 years old and you've been working for 30 years and you don’t have any money you might think, well that's my excuse, I can't do it because I don’t have any money. The truth is, if you've been working for 30 years and you’re broke, that is the REASON you should become a network marketer.


Chapter 6 - Follow The Simple System
Understand the system and follow it to success. If you were a basketball player you could learn on your own, but if the best head coach offered you a roadmap to success, don't you think it would be wise to listen to him?


Chapter 7 - Change The Way You Think
One of the reasons many people fail in network marketing is so simple, yet so true: they expect to fail. The people around them tell them it's a scam, their spouse thinks they're crazy for doing "one of these things" and so it goes. The power of negative expectation says you will get what you expect, BUT the "Power of Positive Expectation" says the same thing. You need to EXPECT success in your new business.


Chapter 8 - Plant Like There's No Tomorrow
You will only become successful when you plant seeds of success in others. The parable of the plower and the seed rings true in network marketing.


Chapter 9 - Who Are You Going To Talk To?
Do you talk to people who NEED more or WANT more? This video will tell you what you need to understand who to talk to?


Chapter 10 - You Are a Consultant Not a Salesperson
You may think you need to be a salesperson to be successful. That is not the case. It is easier, and much more effective, to have the mindset of a consultant, and not a salesperson.


Chapter 11 - The Fortune Is In the Follow Up
Following up is an essential part of being successful in your business. This chapter tells you how to follow up with your prospects.


Chapter 12 - The Four Beliefs
There are four beliefs you must understand. Grab a pen and paper to take notes on the importance of the four beliefs.


Chapter 13 - You Must Believe In Network Marketing
Network marketing is all around us and companies, and people like you, make a lot of money the more “traditional” way. Making money in Network Marketing works in a very similar way.


Chapter 14 - You Must Believe In Your Company
People will say great things and bad things about your company. This video tells you how to believe in your company, and the importance of believing in your company.


Chapter 15 - You Must Believe In Your Products
It's not enough to say you like your company's products, you must love them, you must live them and whenever possible you must use every one of your company's products every single day so your belief in the products will skyrocket and so will your confidence.


Chapter 16 - You Must Believe In Yourself
You can have all of the previous three beliefs but if you do not believe YOU can succeed that it won't matter at all. Without belief in yourself you will sabotage this life-changing opportunity and you will find somebody or something to blame for your lack of success.


Chapter 17 - NEVER NEVER NEVER NEVER NEVER Give Up!
You get nowhere by quitting. Success may not always happen fast, but it will happen for you if you stay the course and never give up.

1. You're fed up with your progress or your profits so far?
2. You are sick of being up-sold, buying expensive software, etc?
3. You are confused with overly complex training?
4. You're ready right now to learn what will work for you in 2022?


If there is one thing that holds many people back, especially when starting out it's being led with false promises and losing trust in your trainer...


My Promise To You:
I, Ciaran Doyle, promise to show you the affiliate business-building steps to...
· Eliminate the confusion, squash the uncertainty and frustration, while...
· Earning an affiliate income,
· Working less than you think you have to,
· Getting more results, WITHOUT spending more money,
· And NOT trying to sell you anything during the training,
So, if you are looking for that final breakthrough, that last little push towards success, you are in the right place.


This training will show you the exact steps you can take to Start An Online Business For Free With Affiliate Marketing using SEO, Content Marketing and the Social SEO secret to make an affiliate marketing income for FREE!
==============================================

But what if you’re not qualified?
Here’s the truth about starting an online business with affiliate marketing…
1. You don’t need to be an expert,
2. You don’t need to have done this before to promote products and make sales,
3. You don’t need to be a university graduate, or college, or even high school…
4. And, you don’t need to spend thousands of dollars to make this a reality, (This really is KEY FOR THIS TRAINING)


This training is specifically created with the goal of you making your first money with Affiliate Marketing For FREE, without spending anything.


NOTE: During this training (in some videos) I might say I recommend upgrading when you make some money, BUT YOU DON'T HAVE TO, and it doesn't affect the work you do, only it will make it easier as your business grows.
• As you go through the training videos you will have tasks to do.
• Once you have finished them, tick them off the list, it's that straightforward.
A simple training structure (not over complicated like so many others) that has taken people just like You, with absolute zero knowledge of the internet, starting an online business and affiliate marketing, and given them the formula on how to create an income-producing affiliate business for FREE!


Why Take This Affiliate Course And Not Others?
Just have a look at what my students (of my other training) are saying...
==============================================
This is the best affiliate marketing course you will ever find online.
Lessons are planned out in a very structure manner and easy to follow.
The knowledge and experience shared are very practical and down to earth. Unlike those superstar guru telling you glamour technique which doesn't really work...
... With the value we are getting out of this course is absolutely worth it. The similar course out there sold by those celebrity guru easily cost you $497, $997, $1497.. and the worst you learn nothing!!!
This value of this course? Definitely way beyond $497 value... well that's my personal opinion only.
There's no risk to try out.
Ciaran is the genuine guru, successful yet very low profile and humble. Again, that's my personal observation and the way I see it.
Thank you Ciaran for making this course available to us and at such an affordable price with over delivered value.
Absolute Gold Mine !!! - Dylan Siauw
==============================================


WHY TAKE THIS ONLINE BUSINESS BUILDING AFFILIATE COURSE AND NOT ANOTHER ONE?


Well, this affiliate marketing training is based on a strategy that works, and that I use in my own business. Also, the more you do with this, the stronger it becomes.
You see,
It uses SEO (Search Engine Optimization), Content Creation, Social SEO and utilizes Google to make money for free.


Vs.


What many people teach (and only really applies to experienced marketers).
They teach setting up landing pages (which I do) BUT using overly priced Facebook and Instagram Ads (Which I don't).


This can work but has a huge and expensive learning curve to see any profit, which is why so many of my students love my formulas.


For a start, Facebook Ad costs have gone through the roof, and new affiliates are in a panic. And with the iOS update on Apple phones, it means that you are able to actually reach fewer people than before.


Fewer people to reach = MORE competition for the ads = MORE expensive ads.


Plus…


Did you know?


When people are browsing social media, they are relaxing, chilling out, talking with friends, stalking ex gfs and bfs, etc… their intent is NOT to purchase products.


So actually converting them into sales is really a long and expensive process (and better left until you have a solid affiliate business producing you income to enable you to test things).


· Unlike a person searching on Google, for a solution to their problem,
· When your FREE website appears they are actually actively looking for the solution you are offering,
· So that means they convert much higher.


Searching For A Real Solution To A Problem = A Higher Likelihood To Convert To A Sale For You.


If you have fallen for the social media gurus before, don’t worry, many of my students have been in the same predicament before they came to me.


So, for a change, you will learn the real fundamentals of how Google works, the INTENT ENGINE!


The skills and strategies haven’t changed since marketing began.


These are the things that actually WILL work for you, no matter the niche you want to be in, and in a much quicker time.


· Do you want to get real results for a change?
· Do you want to be able to quit your job and work on your online business?


You will be able to easily follow along with the over-the-shoulder step-by-step approach to help this become a reality for you…
Simply do what I do, and let me guide you to succeeding online.


==============================================


How This Affiliate Marketing Training works
The training is split into 2 Sections, totaling 7 modules.


Section 1 - Module 1-7,
Section 2 - Module 8,


In the first part of the training, you will discover the setup modules, this is where you learn, and setup the requirements:
- The exact steps you need to find niche affiliate products,
- Find a good niche,
- Understand the Social SEO Process - Your Key To Free Money,
- Find keywords to create your content around,
- Learn the skills for easy content creation (even if you hate writing),
- Setup You Squeeze and Bridge Pages (For Free),


Here is a quick summary of what you will take away from this part of the course


Understanding how you can make money online in ANY niche,
How to pick the perfect products so you know they will convert into sales (not all products are created equally),
How to See The Money In The Search Engines,
How to find money keywords just sitting right in front of you,
How to create killer content for ANY niche, super quickly,
How to build a squeeze page and bridge page for free,
How to apply what you learn to ANY OTHER marketing niche. This is the stuff that will make you a very wealthy person.


In Part 2, Module 8 You learn the actual, practical application of everything you have gone through...


And you will get your content and affiliate marketing offers LIVE online!


BUT MOST IMPORTANTLY:
How to rank the sites you need to rank, right smack bang in the search engines, just like Google Tells You!


Here's the breakdown...


Part 1 – Affiliate Marketing
This is all about affiliate marketing:
· What affiliate marketing actually is,
· How it will work for you,
· What you will be promoting and how you will get pay for what you do,
· How to find the right affiliate program on networks like Clickbank, Market Health, etc.
· But not only that, how to find the right industry, company, products or services, and partnerships to promote, in any niche, using the power of Google to help you find them.
I’ll show you how to find thousands of products and brands with a simple search, ready to be plucked up by you and used to create monthly affiliate revenue.
You'll also uncover:
· How to look at affiliate products and programs to know whether they are good or bad,
· And in addition, KNOW will that product sell well for you or not.
This is the real foundational base of what affiliate marketers do so you can understand how and why you will make money with this online business.


Part 2 – Niche Selection
When you know how to pick the right affiliate marketing niche to enter, starting your own business and your journey to success becomes a whole lot easier and quicker.
But...
If you pick the wrong niche to promote you might not make even a dime and waste your valuable time.


But what's the secret to it?


The key here is knowing how to look at niche markets and then...


· Actually See Inside Them,
· And Spot The Perfect Angle To Profit.


Because without knowing the Niche within the Niche, you will face too much competition and it will become so much harder to make any sales.


Here's an example: Yoga Market vs The Yoga For Women With Arthritis (Wide market vs targeted market).


Most beginners do this - they jump on the affiliate product or service that is on-trend, or because they heard another famous affiliate marketer made a million dollars with it, and when success eludes them and they make no referrals, they feel like a failure, burned by affiliate marketing, but that's not the case...


And is the complete opposite of what you will feel when you complete this section. Starting your own online business should be fun, and doing it in a niche you love is so exciting.


Part 3 - Optimization ManifeSEO
Yep, not a Manifesto, a ManifeSEO...
Basically, in Module 3 I'm going to turn you into an SEO expert over the course of this 32-minute training video with accompanying downloadable resources.


This is the skill that will help you push your online business to the top of the search engines for your affiliate products.


Yes, that 32-minute video is all it really takes for you to know the fundamentals unlike 99% of other online business people.


This is ALL you need to know about what is called On-Page SEO from all my years of experience, and not only can it be applied in this course, but in ABSOLUTELY ANYTHING you do online with websites, platforms, videos etc...


This is pure SEO Gold... and you are in for a treat.


Part 4 - The Replicate and Update Strategy
This is the Social SEO technique that I developed a few years ago which enables anyone, with the right knowledge to spot income-producing opportunities in the search engines by Examining what Google is telling you.


You see...


Google tells you EVERYTHING you need to succeed online, you just have to know what to look for, and how to make a profit from that search.


I can't go too much into this strategy here, because it's that's killer, that it's kept for my students... YOU WILL BE BLOWN AWAY!


Part 5 - The Quick and Freezy Keyword Research Method
When it comes to selling online, you need to understand what keywords are. These simply are the words people type into Google that get Google to give you results.


Imagine being able to actually see what are the right keywords to use for your content for free, right in front of you.


Keyword research is hard for people who don't understand it, but when you do... when you see what I show you... you will be laughing at how easy this is.


I'm going to show you 2 different strategies for finding the exact keywords you need for your content, and it's quick... it's easy, and you NEVER have to have done this before.


Part 6 - Content Cleverness
Content makes the internet go around, and for your sites, you need to learn how to create it, for free!


What's the point in doing things the hard way, let's look at how you can get off the ground running even sooner with this smart module on creating content that is not only super-fast but is also loved by the search engines.


And no... you don't need to be a writer to create content! Not with this way anyhow!


Part 7 - Freemail Marketing
Email marketing is the one thing that will build you a sustainable online business. But normally it costs a lot of money for expensive software.


BUT...


Not anymore, I'm going to show you a way to do it for FREE!


No fancy software that cost you an arm and a leg, no paid websites, or domain names, and no pulling your hair out (well maybe just a bit)...
Freemail marketing is just that... email marketing for free using software and platforms that allow free creation on them.


This isn't the most beautiful solution, BUT if you want FREE, you got it...


Part 8 - The Killer Blow - The Social SEO In Action Module
14 Videos, 7 Platforms, millions of opportunities to make money online for FREE with affiliate marketing.


This and the Social SEO Process Overview (Module 3 - The Replicate and Update Strategy) are really what this training is about... and really what anyone, even those who are not new to affiliate marketing needs to pay attention to.


This is where I open up Pandoras Box of tricks when it comes to getting visitors to your affiliate offers for FREE.


I can't say more about this, or share the platforms with you, because well... as I said before, it is for students of this training course.


Important Note: While many people will make really good money quickly, this training is NOT a get-rich-quick scheme and not an overnight solution.
You will have to put in the work to make this happen, you will have to watch the videos and take action on what I say. But, if you can do this, I will guide you through all the things you need to build your first online business with Affiliate Marketing for FREE.


If you can...
Follow the easy step-by-step training videos, YOU WILL get your first fully functional online business up and running and producing income in super quick time.
With Over 8 Hours Of  Easily Actionable Lessons and downloads,
· I walk you through every detail, step by step,
· So you get the same results as if I was doing it for you.
On top of that, if you ever get stuck, don’t worry, help is at hand.
Because once you become a student of this training course, you will receive continuous support from me – for lifetime.
I will share my advice and answers to your questions whenever you need help from me (please give me time to respond though).


So...
1. If you are looking for super straightforward instructional training that won’t have you pulling your hair out,
2. That IS FREE, no upgrades, software purchases etc,
3. And most importantly, a proven strategy to make money with affiliate marketing that cuts the learning curve and just gives you the actionable no fluff strategy you need,
4. If this is what you are after…then I look forward to welcoming you into our tight and happy community.
I look forward to seeing you on the inside, helping you start affiliate marketing for FREE right away, and achieving the results that are going to turn your life around.
Dedicated to your success
Ciaran Doyle

courses.description:
ارتقِ بخبراتك في عالم التسويق الرقمي المتجدد وابدأ رحلتك نحو الازدهار الإلكتروني مع برنامج تدريبي شامل في التسويق بالعمولة. يوفر دورتنا فرصة لا مثيل لها لاكتساب المهارات الضرورية في مجال التسويق الرقمي، حيث تستفيد من استراتيجيات متقدمة وتقنيات ذكاء صناعي لتحقيق النجاح المستدام في عالم الأعمال الرقمية.


ابدأ رحلة التعلم الخاصة بك والتي تشمل:


- وحدات دراسية شاملة تستكشف مختلف جوانب التسويق بالعمولة، بما في ذلك دمج الذكاء الصناعي في الجهود التسويقية.


- تمارين عملية مصممة لتحويل المعرفة النظرية إلى مهارات عملية، مما يضمن تطبيقًا سلسًا للمفاهيم المدرسة.


- دعم مستمر وتوجيه من مجموعة من المحترفين ذوي الخبرة، مما يرافقك في كل خطوة على طول رحلتك التعليمية.


- بيئة تعاونية تعزز الفرص للتواصل مع الزملاء، مما يسهل تبادل الآراء والتجارب.


سجل الآن واستفد من مجموعة من الفوائد، بما في ذلك:


- الوصول إلى مواد تعليمية متميزة مصممة لتلبية احتياجاتك التعليمية الخاصة، مما يبسط المفاهيم المعقدة لتحسين فهمك.


- المشاركة في مشاريع عملية لكسب تجربة عملية قيمة، مما يعزز ثقتك ومهاراتك في ممارسات التسويق الرقمي.


- الحصول على توجيه شخصي واستشارات فردية تهدف إلى موازنة أهدافك مع استراتيجيات عملية لتطوير المهارات.


- المشاركة في مناقشات مفيدة وجلسات تبادل المعرفة مع زملائك، مما يوسع آفاقك ويعمق فهمك للمواضيع ذات الصلة.


عند اكتمال الدورة بنجاح، ستحصل على شهادة تثبت مهاراتك المكتسبة، مما يعزز سيرتك الذاتية ويزيد فرصك في سوق العمل.


ابق على اطلاع دائم مع:


- التحديثات الدورية حول أحدث التطورات في مجال التسويق الرقمي، مما يضمن أن تظل على اطلاع بالاتجاهات والتقنيات الناشئة.


- الوصول إلى مجتمع نشط من المتعلمين والمحترفين في الصناعة من خلال منصات التواصل الاجتماعي والمنتديات المخصصة للدورة.


- الموارد التعليمية الإضافية لتثري معرفتك وتعزز نموك المستمر خارج حدود الدورة.


- التعرف على الأدوات والبرامج الابتكارية في التسويق الرقمي، مما يمنحك الأسلحة اللازمة لتحقيق طموحاتك المهنية.


- الفرص للتوظيف والشراكات من خلال شبكتنا الواسعة من العملاء والشركاء المحتملين.


استثمر الفرصة لتحقيق أحلامك وبدء رحلتك نحو النجاح في مجال التسويق الرقمي. سجّل الآن وانطلق في طريقك نحو النجاح!
target_audience: المبتدئين في مجال التسويق الرقمي الذين يرغبون في اكتساب المهارات الأساسية وبناء أساس قوي لمستقبلهم المهني
أصحاب الأعمال الصغيرة والمتوسطة الذين يرغبون في تحسين استراتيجيات التسويق الخاصة بهم وزيادة الإيرادات
المسوقين الرقميين الذين يسعون إلى تحسين مهاراتهم وتطوير استراتيجياتهم لزيادة معدلات التحويل وتحقيق نتائج أفضل
الأشخاص الذين يرغبون في العمل كمسوقين بالعمولة والاستفادة من الفرص المتاحة في هذا المجال
أي شخص يرغب في تحقيق الحرية المالية والعمل بمرونة من أي مكان وفي أي وقت عبر الإنترنت

requirements: You will need an interest in affiliate marketing
No special tech skills are required, I will show you step by step tutorials for setting your CPA affiliate marketing campaign correctly
Interested in earning money from a side hustle
courses.description:
Are you interested in earning some extra money from a side hustle?
Are you familiar with affiliate marketing but do not know how to start?
Are you worried that it requires some specialized tech skills only known to IT guys?
Well… in this course my aim is to get rid of your worries and get you started with CPA affiliate marketing.
There are many other affiliate programs you can work with. But many have no tracking of results and require 45 days before you see any money.
That’s why I will be focusing on CPA affiliate marketing.
CPA affiliate marketing has live results and instant payouts. For that reason CPA affiliate marketing is the best way to start for beginners. You will know what works and what doesn’t by the results you instantly see, no 45 day delays.


What is CPA affiliate marketing?
CPA stands for cost per action. You get paid when a person completes an action, like filling in a form, or installing an app. In other words, you are providing leads.
It is easier than typical affiliate marketing because… people can take actions that do not require their credit cards… and you still get paid. A person doesn’t have to actually buy the product you promote, but you will be paid for the lead that you provide.


Why I created a CPA affiliate marketing course?
I decided to create this course when I noticed that all other courses were skipping on the most important part of CPA affiliate marketing. And that is the technical side of setting up the CPA campaign.
I used to work in an affiliate network. The hardest part was learning the setup process. It was a little technical, but soon I learned it and I started teaching new employees how to set it up.
So I decided to create this course and focus on the CPA affiliate setup process.
If you are new to CPA affiliate marketing, or a beginner struggling to earn money this course can help you and teach you the process for setting up your CPA marketing campaigns and optimizing them for profit.


Here’s what you will learn in this training:
The entire process of CPA affiliate marketing, from start to finish.
You will learn the tools that you need in your advertising so that you can review and optimize your campaigns.
I’ll show you an easy way to find nearly all the CPA affiliate networks available.
I will show you how to setup the most important step of CPA affiliate marketing, the step that is usually overlooked in other courses.
And at the end of this lesson, you will know where to find affiliate offers, how to configure them for your ad campaigns and where to advertise your offers.
You will literally have more advertising channels to choose from that you can handle. But not to worry I will also provide you with my recommendation on the best advertising sources for beginners.
So let’s get started. Enrol today and I will see you inside!
target_audience: If you are looking for an idea about creating a side income then CPA marketing could be for you
If you are struggling with CPA marketing then this will teach you the process for CPA marketing so that you can get started fast

If you have some experience with affiliate marketing but would like to promote CPA affiliate marketing offers (I will provide you a distinction between the 2 forms of affiliate marketing in the training)

courses.bio: Les 21 business à recopier pour générer des revenus sur internet dans les 30 prochains jours (sans expérience préalable)
objectives: La façon la plus simple pour commencer à vivre du web, sans site web, sans audience et en partant de 0

Un métier parfait pour les gens doués en marketing mais qui ne sont pas connus (pas besoin de notoriété : juste de compétences)…

Comment vendre les photos qui sont sur ton téléphone ? C’est possible, à une condition…
Transformer un groupe Facebook en business à plusieurs milliers d’euros par mois : c’est possible, et voici ce qu’il faut faire.
requirements: Aucune expérience préalable n'est requise pour cette formation.
courses.description:
Si tu lis ce texte, c'est sûrement que tu voudrais générer des revenus sur le web


Le problème…
C’est qu’il faut parfois du temps… beaucoup de temps…
Pour trouver l’idée qui va faire ton succès.
Souvent, les meilleures idées sont complètement inconnues du grand public.
Parce que ceux qui les exploitent les gardent jalousement pour eux.


À l’inverse, certaines idées sont trop connues.
Le dropshipping a connu son âge d’or, mais est en train de s’écrouler face à la concurrence, la mauvaise presse et la régulation.
L’investissement dans les cryptomonnaies, c’était une bonne idée en 2019 (surtout quand on voit que le marcher est entrain de saigner aujourd'hui)
A partir du moment ou ton once, ton neveu ou ta belle-mère achètent des Bitcoins… on sait tous que c’est trop tard.
La vente de formation est une idée géniale… mais certaines thématiques sont saturées.


Bref.
Si tout le monde en parle…
C’est sûrement que ce n’est pas une si bonne idée.
Alors, où trouver les bonnes idées ?
Des business que tu peux lancer seul, sans argent, et rapidement ?
Y a-t-il encore de la place ?
Des idées qui n’ont pas encore été prises d’assaut ?
La réponse est OUI.


La pandémie a tout changé.
On a vu se terminer de force un processus qui avait commencé depuis plus d’une décennie :
La grande migration des business physiques vers les business online.
Aujourd’hui…
Acheter sur internet n’est plus un choix.
C’est une nécessité.


Lancer un business en ligne n’est PLUS une exception.
C’est la nouvelle norme.
Les entrepreneurs, les commerçants, les restaurants, les boutiques, les artisans…
Tous doivent avoir une présence en ligne.
Il n’y a plus rien de moderne ou d’extrême à ça.
C’est la base.


Dans ce Nouveau Monde…
Il existe des idées qui peuvent changer ta vie.
Comme elles ont changé la vie de milliers d’entrepreneurs avant toi.
Des business qui s’adaptent parfaitement à tes compétences…
Et dont tu ne soupçonnes pas l’existence.


Des idées simples…
Qui ne te demandent ni d’avoir une équipe ni d’investir de l’argent…
Que tu peux lancer tout de suite…
Et qui peuvent te rapporter gros dès les prochaines semaines.


Ces idées…
J'ai passé des heures à les rassembler dans un programme complet.
J'ai identifié 21 business avec un bon potentiel de croissance pour les prochaines années.
Et j’ai enregistré une formation d'une heure pour te détailler ces idées une par une …
T’expliquer chaque business modèle en détail…
Te dire si ces idées sont pour toi ou pas…
Et te donner des conseils concrets pour les lancer avec succès.


C’est l'une des plus grosse formation que j’ai sortie cette année… et tu peux y accéder dés maintenant et cela gratuitement.


L’objectif est simple :
Trouver de nouveaux business auxquels tu n’avais pas pensé…
Les tester pour voir si c’est pour toi…
Que l’un d’entre eux devienne ta nouvelle activité…
Et t’apporte enfin le succès que tu attendais.

Voici comment ça va se passer :
Je vais te présenter les 21  idées de business en vidéo, en te montrant mon écran.
Ils sont classés par catégorie (ceux qui nécessitent des compétences, une audience, un produit ou un réseau).
Je te conseille de regarder toute la formation…
Mais tu peux aussi choisir dès le départ la catégorie qui te convient le plus.




Voici ce que je ferais si j’étais à ta place :
Après avoir suivi toute la formation…
Je choisirais le business qui m’enthousiasme le plus.
Celui que j’ai avant tout envie de faire par plaisir.
Je me lancerais à fond, en y passant un maximum de temps…
Et si ça ne marche pas, j’en essaierais un autre jusqu’à trouver l’idée qui va changer ma vie.


Une fois la formation commandée…
Elle sera ajoutée immédiatement à ton espace membre.
Tu pourras y accéder en illimité, à vie.
Ce qui te laisse le temps de la voir et de la revoir jusqu’à trouver l’idée géniale.
Ou d’y revenir quand tu auras besoin d’inspiration.


Je pense sérieusement que cette formation peut être un déclic pour toi …
Et j’espère qu’elle t’aidera à trouver ce qu’il te manque pour réussir sur le web.
target_audience: Cette formation s'adressent à toutes les personnes motivés pour passer à l'action dans le but de créer un business rentable sur le web en 2022.

courses.description:
Are you ready to tap into one of the fastest-growing eCommerce opportunities in the world? Welcome to "TikTok Shop Affiliate Marketing for Beginners"—a complete step-by-step guide for anyone who wants to earn money online by promoting products on TikTok, even without owning a store or having thousands of followers. Whether you’re a student, freelancer, content creator, or someone exploring side hustles, this course will give you everything you need to get started with affiliate marketing through TikTok Shop confidently and quickly.
This course is specifically designed for beginners who are new to affiliate marketing or TikTok’s selling features. It explains everything in simple, clear terms so that even someone with zero prior experience can follow along and start taking action. You’ll learn how to sign up for the TikTok Shop Affiliate Program, how to navigate the affiliate dashboard, and how to choose products that are not only high-converting but also fun and easy to promote. You don’t need to be a professional marketer or influencer—just a smartphone, internet connection, and motivation to learn are enough to begin your journey.
We’ll begin by explaining the fundamentals of how TikTok Shop works and how affiliate marketing operates within the platform. You’ll discover how to apply to the affiliate program, meet the requirements for approval, and set up your dashboard for success. Then, we’ll dive into product research and selection. You’ll learn how to find trending, high-commission products that people are actively buying and how to evaluate which items are worth promoting based on commission rates, visual appeal, customer reviews, and viral potential.
The course also focuses heavily on content creation—arguably the most important part of affiliate success on TikTok. You’ll explore various content formats such as unboxing videos, product reviews, quick demos, before-and-after clips, gift guides, and more. Even if you don’t have followers, you’ll learn how to create videos that have the potential to go viral using proven techniques like strong hooks, trending sounds, and effective captions. We'll show you how to engage your audience, drive clicks, and convert views into commissions—without needing any technical skills or expensive equipment.
One of the highlights of this course is its practical, action-based approach. You’ll be given real-world tips to increase visibility, boost engagement, and optimize your videos for TikTok’s algorithm. We’ll also cover the most common mistakes beginners make—such as promoting poor-quality products, using misleading links, or not disclosing affiliate partnerships—and how to avoid them to protect your account and maintain viewer trust.
In addition, you’ll learn how to track your clicks, monitor sales, and manage your earnings using the affiliate dashboard. We’ll guide you through setting up payouts, understanding analytics, and growing your earnings over time. Whether you want to earn a small side income or turn this into a long-term digital business, you’ll find the tools and strategies you need right here.
By the end of the course, you’ll have a complete understanding of how to use TikTok Shop Affiliate Marketing to your advantage. You’ll know how to pick products, create content, attract viewers, and earn commissions—all from your smartphone. This is your chance to join the growing community of affiliate marketers who are building income streams with just a few short videos a week.
Take the first step toward your online income journey. Enroll now and start earning through TikTok Shop Affiliate Marketing—even as a complete beginner!

5-STAR STUDENT REVIEW: "This is exactly what I was looking for when I have encountered objections. I did not know how to respond and this gave me tremendous insight and how to respond. courses.description:
Affiliate marketing is one of many ways that you can start generating some income online, but if you don’t know how to take advantage of the best that Clickbank has to offer, you’ll miss out on the opportunity to grow your business.
This course is designed for anyone who has already promoted an offer on Clickbank but wants to do better, as well as for those who have never used Clickbank or have never participated in affiliate marketing.
You’ll access the strategies that most people tend to glance over, but that actually work, so you’ll gain a competitive advantage over other affiliates who join Clickbank and similar platforms.
Easily Make More Money with Effective Clickbank Strategies
Clickbank is one of the world’s largest marketplaces for affiliate marketers, so this course focuses on what you can do to increase your profits on that platform. However, you can apply these same tactics to any other affiliate marketing network to increase your success.
Throughout this program, you’ll walk through six different and unique ways that you can increase profits with affiliate offers. You’ll even learn how to start making money before getting a single click on your affiliate link.
The tactics throughout this course are easy to follow, easy to understand, and easy to implement, regardless of your experience level. They make affiliate marketing simple so you can work smarter, not harder.
Course Content
After a short introduction, you’ll move right into how to increase your profits with just one simple strategy. You’ll walk through exactly what you need to look at when analyzing Clickbank offers.
Next, you’ll discover how to look for offers that will help you make money before you even get any clicks on your affiliate links.
To further increase your potential for higher profits, you’ll learn where you need to go to get the most commissions, and you’ll cover how to choose the right landing page for the appropriate traffic source to make a higher amount of sales.
In order to make things even easier, you’ll tackle how to perform some simple research to get 90% of the work associated with Clickbank done for you.
Finally, you’ll go over how to write high converting emails, even if you don’t have any experience in writing emails. This will help you save money, as you won’t have to hire a copywriter. By the time you complete this course, you’ll know exactly how to find the best offers for affiliate marketers on Clickbank, and you’ll have a set of strategies that will help you make the most money possible.
target_audience: Affiliate Marketers
Digital Marketers
Internet Marketers
Email Marketers

courses.description:
Are you just starting out in Brand Partnerships? Running a partnerships channel in your business? Or more experienced and looking for in-depth knowledge on Integration Partnerships? Then this course is for you!
It is the only recognised course out there on Brand Partnerships, which focuses on Integrations, Rewards and Awareness:
Integrations - where two brands plug into one another utilising API's and White-labelling.
Rewards - covers affiliate marketing, discount partnerships and offer pages.
Awareness - covers sponsorships, product placements and influencer marketing.
These marketing techniques are exploding across the globe, with most of our favourite brands now partaking in Brand Partnerships in some form. Companies like Spotify teaming up with TicketMaster, TripAdvisor's integration with Deliveroo, & Lastminute offering a discount on HomeAway. Business are starting to realise that teaming-up with like-minded brands is one the finest ways of attracting new customers, and this course aims to teach you exactly how they work and how to go about doing it.

This course aims to teach you:
The 3 Core Brand Partnerships Types - Integrations, Rewards, Awareness

API's, White-labels, Exclusivity, Discount Partnerships, Offer Pages and Tracking

If you want to get ahead in Brand Partnerships then this is the course for you!

courses.description:
Affiliate Marketing für Einsteiger – Dein Weg zu mehr Umsatz
Starte dein Online Business und verdiene passives Einkommen durch Amazon Affiliate Marketing und Digital Marketing.
Du willst online Geld verdienen, hast aber keine Ahnung, wo du anfangen sollst? Oder Affiliate Marketing klingt spannend, aber irgendwie zu kompliziert? Kein Problem! In diesem Kurs zeige ich dir ganz einfach, wie du Schritt für Schritt dein eigenes Online Business aufbaust – auch ohne Vorerfahrung.
Affiliate Marketing ist einer der besten Wege, um ein passives Einkommen zu schaffen. Du empfiehlst Produkte, die zu dir oder deiner Community passen, und bekommst dafür eine Provision. Einfach, clever und skalierbar.


Was ist Affiliate Marketing genau?
Affiliate Marketing bedeutet: Du bewirbst Produkte oder Dienstleistungen von anderen Unternehmen – zum Beispiel auf deinem Blog, YouTube-Kanal oder Social Media. Wenn jemand über deinen Link etwas kauft, bekommst du eine Vergütung.
Das ist besonders toll, weil du kein eigenes Produkt brauchst, keine Lagerbestände verwalten musst und keine teuren Investitionen erforderlich sind. Es ist quasi dein „digitaler Vertriebsjob“ mit großem Potenzial – besonders wenn du Amazon Affiliate Marketing und Digital Marketing clever kombinierst.


Was erwartet dich in diesem Kurs?
Ich nehme dich an die Hand und führe dich durch alle wichtigen Schritte. Du bekommst nicht nur Wissen, sondern auch praktische Tools und Vorlagen, die dir helfen, direkt loszulegen und echte Ergebnisse zu erzielen.


Grundlagen verstehen: Was ist Affiliate Marketing und wie funktioniert es?
Begrifflichkeiten lernen: Wichtige Fachwörter einfach erklärt, damit du den Durchblick hast.
Strategie aufbauen: Wie findest du deine Zielgruppe? Welche Inhalte funktionieren am besten?
Amazon Affiliate Marketing: Wie erstellst du dein Konto, setzt Links und nutzt die Plattform effektiv?
Digistore und weitere Partnerprogramme: Mehr Programme = mehr Chancen.
Technik & Tools: Wie misst du deine Links, wie nutzt du psychologische Kniffe, um mehr Verkäufe zu erzielen?
Vermarktung & Skalierung: Wie baust du Landingpages und Newsletter, die wirklich konvertieren?
Rechtliche Grundlagen: Was musst du beachten, um rechtlich auf der sicheren Seite zu sein?


Zusätzlich bekommst du PDFs zum Download mit Checklisten und Schritt-für-Schritt-Anleitungen – damit du immer genau weißt, was zu tun ist.


Warum solltest du jetzt starten?
Das Internet verändert sich schnell – wer heute startet, hat morgen schon einen Vorsprung. Affiliate Marketing ist ideal, um mit wenig Risiko ein Online Business aufzubauen und langfristig ein passives Einkommen zu generieren.
Besonders Amazon Affiliate Marketing bleibt ein starker Pfeiler, weil Millionen Menschen täglich auf Amazon einkaufen. Kombiniert mit cleverem Digital Marketing kannst du deine Reichweite gezielt erhöhen und mehr Umsatz machen.
Du kannst alles in deinem eigenen Tempo lernen und Schritt für Schritt umsetzen – egal ob neben dem Job, Studium oder als Vollzeitprojekt.


Wie kannst du den Kurs nutzen?
Der Kurs ist modular aufgebaut. Du lernst in übersichtlichen Einheiten, kannst jederzeit pausieren und die Inhalte direkt praktisch anwenden. So baust du dir systematisch dein Affiliate Business auf – ohne Stress und Überforderung.


Deine Chance auf finanziellen Erfolg
Stell dir vor, du schläfst und dein Affiliate Business verdient für dich Geld. Mit der richtigen Strategie und Umsetzung ist das kein Wunschdenken. Affiliate Marketing bietet dir die Möglichkeit, online ein Einkommen aufzubauen, das langfristig wächst – ganz ohne eigenes Produkt oder hohe Investitionen.


Jetzt durchstarten – so einfach geht’s
Sichere dir deinen Zugang zum Kurs, leg sofort los und lerne, wie du mit Amazon Affiliate Marketing und Digital Marketing dein Online Business startest und skalierst.


Jetzt Zugang sichern
Keine komplizierten Vorkenntnisse. Keine versteckten Kosten. Nur klar strukturierte Inhalte, die dich Schritt für Schritt an dein Ziel bringen.
Wenn du Fragen hast oder Hilfe brauchst, bin ich für dich da. Du bist nicht allein auf deinem Weg!


Bereit für dein Online Business und passives Einkommen?
Starte jetzt und mach den ersten Schritt in Richtung finanzieller Freiheit!

courses.description:
الرقمي وتحقيق الأرباح من خلال الإنترنت. تتيح لك شبكات التسويق بالعمولة إمكانية العمل مع عدد من العلامات التجارية والمنتجات المختلفة، وكسب عمولات مالية مقابل كل عملية بيع أو إحالة ناجحة تتم بواسطتك. للنجاح في هذا المجال، يتوجب عليك اتباع بعض الخطوات الأساسية:
التعليم والتدريب: ابدأ بتعلم أساسيات التسويق الإلكتروني وفهم كيفية عمل شبكات التسويق بالعمولة. هناك العديد من الموارد المجانية والدورات التدريبية المتاحة على الإنترنت التي يمكن أن تقدم لك مقدمة شاملة حول هذا الموضوع.
اختيار الشبكة المناسبة: ابحث عن شبكات التسويق بالعمولة التي تقدم منتجات أو خدمات تتماشى مع اهتماماتك ومعرفتك. هذا سيسهل عليك الترويج لها بشكل فعال. من أشهر هذه الشبكات ClickBank، Amazon Associates، وCommission Junction.
فهم السوق والجمهور: من الضروري أن تفهم جمهورك المستهدف وما يبحثون عنه. استخدم أدوات البحث والتحليل لفهم تفضيلاتهم وسلوكياتهم على الإنترنت.
إنشاء محتوى جذاب: يعتمد نجاحك في التسويق بالعمولة بشكل كبير على قدرتك على إنشاء محتوى يجذب الجمهور ويحفزهم على الشراء. سواء كان ذلك من خلال مدونة، قناة يوتيوب، أو حتى حسابات وسائل التواصل الاجتماعي، يجب أن يكون المحتوى الخاص بك مفيدًا، تعليميًا، ومقنعًا.
استخدام استراتيجيات التسويق الفعالة: تعلم كيفية استخدام الإعلانات المدفوعة، تحسين محركات البحث (SEO)، التسويق عبر البريد الإلكتروني، وغيرها من استراتيجيات التسويق الرقمي لزيادة الوصول إلى جمهورك وتحقيق المزيد من الإحالات.
تتبع الأداء وتحسين الاستراتيجيات: استخدم أدوات تتبع الأداء التي توفرها شبكات التسويق بالعمولة لمراقبة نتائج حملاتك وتحليل البيانات. استخدم هذه المعلومات لتحسين استراتيجياتك بمرور الوقت.

LATEST: Course Updated Again for April 1st, 2023


Attention: Desperate Affiliates & Broke Newbies: Learn how to make money online as an affiliate. Promote other people's products and make money for yourself. We show you how!
Lets face it… working from home is something we’d all like to do.

From being able to work when you want, from wherever you want, the percentage of people who are striving to work from home is continually increasing.
Perhaps another reason for the demand is due to the fact it’s now becoming a lot more attainable, with more and more people working from home and most importantly… more and more people making money online.
But where do you start?
You’ve probably heard of various ways to ‘make money online’ before, with the likes of Facebook, eBay, Twitter, Surveys and Forex appearing in most recommendations. But the issue with most of these methods is they only really work for the more advanced customer.
Today we wanted to shine the light on a method with proven success stories, and most importantly a system that can be used by anyone.
Want to work from home and make money online? Then listen up.
Affiliate marketing is probably one of the most talked about ways of making money as a sales professional over the Internet from the comfort of your own home or just about anywhere for that matter, as long as you have a reliable open Internet connection.
The web is littered with massive amounts of hype about affiliate marketing, other "make money online" topics and no information with any real value.

There are all sorts of affiliate marketing programs and books available that tell you that their system is tried-and-true and is guaranteed to work.
When we say "affiliate marketing" we're actually talking about a bunch of things:
Finding good products to promote
Building websites
Conducting market research
Search engine optimization (getting your website ranking well in the search engines)
Creative ways to promote your products
Social networking and "web 2.0" strategies
Email marketing
Pay-per-click marketing
Creating or sourcing content for your website or newsletter
Getting motivated, staying motivated, and avoiding potential mishaps
Earning money by displaying ads on your site (eg, Google AdSense)
... And there's quite a bit more.
Unfortunately, if all of them actually worked as well as they claim there would be so many options and people wouldn't get frustrated from not understanding concepts or not realizing that being a good affiliate marketer took a lot more time and effort. Then they originally anticipated.
This course is going to help you get rid of some of the misconceptions about affiliate marketing and boil it down to its very essence so that you only learn the things that have been proven effective in affiliate marketing so that you as an affiliate marketing entrepreneur can have a lucrative and successful career.
You will learn everything from what affiliate marketing actually means (it's when you become a third-party Internet-based sales associate for a given product or service. Essentially you are a middleman) to how to use a blog and social media profile on all of the various social media outlets, as well as email to help you advertise your given product or service close sales and make even better commissions.
By the end of this course, you won't need to worry about which system is going to be most effective, because you will already know all of the ins and outs and tried-and-true methods for being a successful affiliate marketer.
This course could easily sell for hundreds of dollars. I personally know of gurus out there who are charging hundreds, even thousands of dollars for a fraction of the information contained in this Udemy Course.
As with all my courses:
The initial low price will increase shortly - the course is currently $ 145, but will next increase to $ 250
You have unlimited lifetime access at no extra costs ever !!!
All future additional lectures, bonuses, etc in this course are always free
There's an unconditional, never any questions asked full 30 day money back in full guarantee
My help is always available to you if you get stuck or have a question - my support is legendary in Udemy.
PSS: Do you really want to be a Affiliate Marketer ? Do you really want to enjoy a lifestyle that you only dream about now?
PSSS: It will take hard work. It will take perseverance. But if you can honestly answer “Yes" then there is no reason why you can't start building your Affiliate Empire today.
This will be a truly interactive course with additional bonus routines added over the course of the first year, inspired by the feedback from students.

courses.description:
누구나 제휴 마케팅에 성공할 수 있는 마케팅 방법
오늘부터 바로 적용할 수 있는 마케팅 방법
오늘날 제휴 마케팅으로 돈을 벌 수 있는 전략
여러분들께 최고의 불로소득 수입원을 만들 수 있도록 본 강의를 통해 도와드리겠습니다. 웹사이트는 필요하지 않습니다.


[다른 강의가 아닌 이 제휴 마케팅 강의를 들어야 하는 이유]
다른 강의에서는 랜딩 페이지 설정, 페이스북 광고나 인스타그램을 통한 트래픽 유인, 가만히 앉아서 돈 벌기 등 효과 없는 전략들만 가르쳐 줍니다. 효과가 없을 거라는 점을 제외하고도, 광고는 너무 비싸서 수익성 있게 활용할 수 없고, 인스타그램이나 다른 SNS 채널들은 충분한 전환 트래픽을 유인하지 않죠.
그래서 사람들은 제휴 링크를 확보하여 페이스북이나 다른 SNS 사이트에 홍보하려고 하지만, 돈을 벌지는 못합니다.
여러분이 이런 상황에 처한 것 같다는 생각이 드신다면, 다행인 건 여러분만 그렇다는 건 아니라는 거죠. 제 고객들 중 많은 분들이 저를 찾기 전 동일한 경험을 하신 것으로 나타났습니다.
효과 없이 값만 싼 지름길로 가지 마세요. 제가 여러분께 ‘효과가 분명히 있을’ 아주 탄탄한 핵심 내용들을 알려드리겠습니다. 저에게는 제 학생들의 성공이 중요합니다. 그래서 제 강의는 여러분들이 따라오면 성공할 수 있는 정직한 단계별 강의이죠.


[본 제휴 마케팅 강의의 4가지 주요 파트 구성]
파트 1: 제휴 마케팅 기본 및 핵심 내용
파트 2: 수익성 있는 제휴 틈새 시장과 웹사이트 구축 방법 선정 후 제휴 제품 홍보 시작하기
파트 3: 실제로 제휴 마케팅 해보기-최고의 판매 제휴 제품 선정하기/클릭뱅크, 아마존 자회사인 아마존 제휴마케팅, 쉐어어세일, JVZoo, 맥스 바운티 등 수만 개의 제휴 오퍼 제공 사이트 탐색하기/수입 최대화하기
파트 4: 제휴 제품에 대한 트래픽 유인 마케팅 및 대용량 트래픽 판매로 전환하기


수십 만 개의 제휴 제품 확보에 대해 학습하기
클릭뱅크, 아마존 제휴마케팅이라고 불리는 아마존 자회사 프로그램, 쉐어어세일, JVZoo 등 수많은 제휴 사이트들을 보여드릴 겁니다. 이외에도 벤더에 직접 접촉하여 더 나은 제휴 거래를 얻어내는 방법에 대해서도 보여드릴 게요.


[강사 경력]
저는 10년 이상 제휴 마케팅을 하고 있는데요. 매주 새로운 제휴 마케팅 고객들을 만나 멘토링을 해드리고 있기 때문에 흔히 이런 분들이 겪고 있는 제품 판매 문제, 페이스북 광고 비용 낭비, 그럼에도 불구하고 판매되지 않는 등의 문제를 잘 알고 있죠. 여러분들도 본 강의를 통해 이런 문제들을 비롯한 여러 가지 또다른 어려움을 극복할 수 있도록 도와드리겠습니다.
또, 저는 15년 이상 사업가로 활동하며 1,000명 이상의 기업가들을 코칭하고 10만 명 이상의 학생들을 가르친 경력이 있습니다. 저는 제 일을 통해 전세계 모든 국가에 사는 이들의 삶을 개선하면서 수백 만 명의 기업가들에게 긍정적인 영향을 주었으며, 그 과정에서 10만, 100만 개 이상의 사업체를 만드는 데에 영향을 주었습니다. 그리고 이제는, 여러분들을 돕고 싶습니다.


[수강생만을 위한 보너스]
* 수많은 추가 무료 자료들과 다운로드 가능한 워크시트 및 활동들이 본 강의를 더욱 가치 있는 ‘대화형’ 강의로 만들어 줄 것입니다.
* 완강 후 제 페이스북 커뮤니티에 개인적으로 초대해 드리겠습니다.
* 완강 후 제50가지 사업 성공 스킬을 공유하도록 하겠습니다.
* ‘이 달의 수강생’을 선정하여 해당 학생의 사업을 소개하겠습니다.


[미리 드리는 안내 사항]
여러 제휴 프로그램에 등록하기 위해 해당 프로그램들에 대한 계정을 만들어야 할 수 있습니다. 무료 서비스이지만 이메일 주소를 입력해 주셔야 합니다.


[빠르게 응답하고 학생들을 신경 쓰는 강사: 어디서도 볼 수 없는 학생 지원]
질문이 있으실 때마다 제가 항상 여기 대기하고 있다는 걸 기억하세요! 저는 24시간 내로 학생들의 질문 중 99%에 대한 답변을 완료하고 있습니다. 많은 학생들이 응답이 없는 선생님들에 대해 이야기하곤 하죠. 하지만, 저는 다음과 같은 이유로 빠르게 응답해 줍니다.
1) 제 학생들을 신경 쓰고,
2) 학생들이 이 강의에서 얻을 수 있는 수익을 모두 얻어갈 수 있기를 바라기 때문이죠.


**강의를 들으시고 강의와 관련하여 궁금하신 점은 무엇이든 Q&A에 남기실 수 있지만, 꼭 영어로 내용을 남겨 주세요. 그래야 상세한 답변을 드릴 수 있습니다. :)


[30일 이내 환불 보장]
본 제휴 마케팅 강의는 유데미에서 지원하는 ‘무조건 30일 이내 환불을 보장’합니다. 보장 ‘제도’가 있기는 하지만, 제가 다른 수 천 명의 학생들에게 했던 것과 같이 여러분들이 유튜브 마케팅을 성공적으로 학습하실 수 있도록 제 개인적으로도 보장하겠습니다.


지금 바로 수강 신청하여, 여러분의 미래에 투자하세요.


- Alex




-


최신 업데이트 내용
이상적인 제품을 찾기 위한 최상위 6개 제휴 에그리게이터(aggregator) 사이트(클릭뱅크, 아마존 제휴마케팅, 쉐어어세일, JVZoo, 커미션정션, 맥스바운티)의 장단점
최상위 여행 산업 제휴 네트워크인 트래블페이아우츠(Travlepayouts) 추가
가능한 한 빠르게 판매하기 쉬운 수익성 있는 제휴 프로그램을 찾기 위한 8개 CPA 네트워크(CPA는 최대 전환율을 제공함)
최대 수익 창출 오퍼 선택에 관한 새 섹션

アフィリエイターのライバルは居酒屋
気づいていない悩みにリサーチ
石崎のビジネスモデル

requirements: インターネットの基本的なスキル
独自の世界観（人と違う考え方）
独自のライフスタイル
courses.description:
「ライバルは居酒屋だわ」
そう言うと多くの人が驚きます。正確には居酒屋とFacebookがライバルです。僕はあまり知りませんが、21世紀の地球人はFacebookと居酒屋に生命時間の大半を費やして死んでいくそうです。そのくらいFacebookと居酒屋というコンテンツは面白い。
新聞配達員の友人曰く、他人の出産と結婚とランチの写真を見るとイラつくそうです。旅行写真がアップされていた暁には、ディスプレイを鈍器でぶっ壊したくなる衝動に駆られると正直に白状していました。それでも見るのをやめられないFacebook。
多くの人は気付いたのです。
「世界一面白いコンテンツは、知り合いとのコミュニケーションだ」ということに。
映画やメルマガ、テレビ、書籍、雑誌、音楽、ゲーム、YouTubeなど、世の中にはたくさんのコンテンツが溢れています。しかも、各々のクリエイターたちはそれなりの時間とお金をかけてコンテンツを作ります。
悲しいかな、大抵のコンテンツは、素人がFacebookに投稿した一つの写真にすら勝てないのです。だから、読まれない、見られない。
さらにFacebookの登場は居酒屋の売上にも貢献しました。実際に居酒屋業界の売上高はワタミの1,631億円を筆頭に、年々伸び続けています。一見すると、Facebookと居酒屋は関係ないように見えますが、実際は、まるで蜂蜜のように甘い蜜月の関係にあるのです。
Facebookをプライベートの可視化です。ようは、相手が何しているか、どこにいるかが簡単にわかるようになりました。しかもメッセンジャー機能がある。「よう、今から居酒屋、行こうぜ」「今、ワタミにいるけど、来る？」「地元のみんなで集まっているからおいでよ」というお誘いが非常に容易になりました。
彼らの集まる場所は居酒屋。だから居酒屋の売上がFacebookのユーザー数に比例して伸びていくのです。（まだ誰も言ってないことですけど、僕は勝手にそう分析しています）
ここでアフィリエイターに厳しい現実を突きつけねばなりません。
居酒屋やFacebook上で行なわれている会話（コミュニケーション）よりも面白いコンテンツを作る自信がなければ、アフィリエイターはやめたほうがいいです。メルマガをやめ、ブログをやめ、YouTubeをやめましょう。
人生は有限です。3か月もアフィリエイトに時間を投下して、スズメの涙くらいしか稼げないようであれば、これほど人生を無駄にする行為はありません。もう一度言います。生命時間は限られており、世界中の人々は刻一刻と死に向かって歩を進めているのです。
たかだか数千円を稼ぐためだけにアフィリエイトをやるなんて馬鹿げています。どうせやるなら、家計を支えるくらいでないと、投下したコストを回収できません。
もし現時点で、居酒屋やFacebookが生み出すコンテンツを超えられないようであれば、まずはあなたが面白い人間になりましょう。少なくとも、面白いコンテンツを作れるようになりましょう。アフィリエイターの第一歩はそこからです。
本コースが、貧乏アフィリエイターの福音書になることを願っています。
target_audience: 真面目に副業したい人

courses.description:
This course is made by DHgate E-learning Official. Students enrolled here will have personal support from DHgate professional affiliate marketing team.


This is a beginner course, meaning that you don’t need to have any pre-existing knowledge, a specific degree or years of work experience. This course is open to everyone, as long as you are willing to learn and experiment.


The fact that you are checking out the intro to this course means that you are already taking the first step toward learning more about affiliate marketing. That’s a great start, keep going!


THIS COURSE IS CREATED FOR ONE SIMPLE PURPOSE –
If you have yet to successfully make a single dollar in affiliate marketing. This is the course that will help you to achieve that and more!


When you're first starting as an affiliate marketer:
You have no clue what you're doing
You have no resources
You have no results
You have no real strategy to follow


Whether you are:
Doubting your own abilities to be successful online
Having unsupportive friends and family who think you're crazy for wanting to be an entrepreneur
Looking for a way that can help you to gain a breakthrough as an affiliate marketer


This course will give you underlying logics on the 'whats' and 'hows' to help you succeed as an affiliate marketer as SOON as possible.


In particular, this course is divided into five main sections: the basics, how to get started, how to promote your affiliate links online, how to earn money, and learn from successful DHgate examples


We will start by learning what affiliate marketing is, why many affiliates have decided to promote their affiliate links online, how affiliate marketing works, and what you should look for in an affiliate marketing program. Of course, we will also see together why you should consider becoming a DHgate affiliate marketer, if you are not one yet.


In the second part of this course, we will focus on the niche and products that you can promote on your marketing channels, while targeting one or more audiences. We will look into the steps you should take to get started, from find the right products to promote to getting your custom affiliate links on DHgate.


Thirdly, we will move on to a marketing crash course, where we will dig deeper into how you can promote your links online, be it in your newsletter, blog, or social media channels.


Then we will focus on another essential aspect of affiliate marketing, which is earning money online. What are some of the points you should consider, including for example the payment timeline and payment methods available? We will also see how you can withdraw money from the DHgate affiliate platform.


Last but not least, we’ve got you covered with other questions you might have and an answer for each one. We will also share some examples of successful DHgate affiliates and how they are promoting their links on each channel.


Even if you do not have any experience with affiliate marketing right now, you will be confident of the steps to take to earn your first dollar with DHgate affiliate program after completing this course.


This is a practical course that will teach you how to generate income online through promoting DHgate products.


All the methods in this course will be broken into practical steps that are easy for you to understand and follow.


Each section comes with an assignment so that you can effectively apply what you have learnt.


Above all, if you get stuck or experience any difficulties along the way, you won't ever have to struggle on your own and worry about having no one to turn to for help.


In fact, you will also get to learn from fellow students like yourself! We have an incredibly active community where hardworking and committed students are posting new questions every day, and welcome you to join our growing community of success-driven students from all around the world!

courses.description:
I am Manuel and I am the creator of this course. In this course I share everything about making money online trough blogs, affiliate marketing, ecommerce and much much more. I have 7 courses here on Udemy and for the past 5 years I’ve taught more than 12,000+ students how to start, build and scale an online business. In the last 6 years I’ve helped thousands of people to escape the hamster wheel and create their own online business.


Prior to starting my own business (offline) in 2013 I worked for 16 years in a retailer both in Austria and later in Hong Kong. I have since ventured into online business models. I’ve done it all. From exhibiting at expos and selling physical products to retail, on eBay, on Amazon FBA, to blogging, creating online courses, authoring and selling 5 books on Amazon, coaching and a 1-year mentor program, to affiliate marketing.


I’ve spoken publicly at large events around the globe. From Hong Kong to Shenzhen to Hamburg to Miami. I’ve sold 2 businesses since then and still run several online businesses from anywhere I want. Now I teach people how they can do the same.

This is the worlds only “watch me over the shoulder” video course on how to build a website from scratch and start making money. 1, Build a site by Wordpress (costly, complicated, exhausted)

Our 8 stratege is different from below common sense ones:
Select the right affiliates.
Optimize your platforms.
Diversify your affiliate program.
Partner with an influencer.
Leverage coupon deals.
Initiate brand to brand partnerships.
Use affiliate marketing software.
Build your own affiliate program.
What is an Affiliate Program?


Simply put, an affiliate program is an agreement in which the company running the program is incentivizing another business or influencer (the “affiliate”) to send them referral traffic in exchange for commission payouts.
It is one of the most common ways for brands to extend their reach and attract new customers because of the full alignment of incentives between merchants and affiliates.
Most of the companies allow you to sign up for the affiliate program straight from their website.
Usually when a company has an affiliate program you can find a link to it within their website footer. This link could send you directly to the sign up page for the program on the specific affiliate network they run on or an initial landing page diving into more detail about becoming an affiliate for that merchant.


Advantage: Selling something without being a seller (lot of work, better than drop shipping)
Disadvantage: low traffic, low margin


Affiliate marketing is much better than Dropshipping
Dropshipping difficulty:
1, Store is must
2, No traffic or expensive traffic
3, Competing with Amazon ebay..not partner with them


Successful case Aliexpress Walmart affiliate marketer without site


2 affiliate program comparing
DHgate: high margin, mainly trade/wholesale
Aliexpress: lower margin, but more language available
Amazon affiliate / ebay affiliate…..


Clarify and don’t get confused
Affiliate programs
1, Direct platform: DHgate aff; Aliexpress aff; Amazon aff, Ebay aff..
2, Agent: Click bank; shareasale, cj…
Only work with direct platform not agent

どうしてもX（Twitter）、YouTubeやInstagramや他プラットフォームで副業を行おうとしても時間の確保が難しかったり、結局なにをすればいいかわからなかったり、つまずいてしまいがちです。

2025年に新たな挑戦をしたい方や集客できる経路を増やしてみたい方に学んでいただけると嬉しいなと考えています。

■こんな方が受講に向いています


このコースでは、以下のような具体的なスキルや知識を身につけることができます。


1. Threadsというプラットフォームの特性と活用方法
他のSNSとの違いや、アルゴリズムの仕組みを理解し、効果的に活用するテクニックを学びます。


2. ChatGPTなどの生成AIを活用した効率的なコンテンツ作成方法

3. ジャンル選定とリサーチの重要性と具体的な方法
HARMの法則やOATHの法則など、市場価値の高いジャンルを見つけ出す戦略を学びます。


4. 少ないフォロワーでも収益を生み出すための実践的な戦略
インプレッション数に依存しない、質重視の収益化モデルを学びます。


5. アフィリエイト、note販売など具体的な収益化の手法を
基礎的な部分から効果的な導線設計まで学びます。


6. Threads外での収益最大化のための顧客リスト構築方法
メルマガなどを活用した長期的な収益基盤の作り方を学びます。


すべての内容は、実際の画面を見ながら学べる実践的な内容となっていますので、理解しやすく、すぐに行動に移せる内容となっています。

Join over 5,000 students in getting your first sale from Clickbank or any other affiliate network you choose.


Imagine that you are waking up in the morning and you see 100+ emails on your phone and each says: 'Congratulations, you just earned a commission!' - while you were sleeping, you made hundreds of sales.
Yes, it's possible with affiliate marketing.
In this course, you will learn how can you become a top affiliate, how to pick products on ClickBank that are converting, how to set up your sales funnel, how to set up a compelling mailing list, and how to successfully create and promote your campaigns using Bing Ads and Google Ads.
You are probably thinking - 'oh, that's a lot of work!' Yes, that is what it seems at first. But if you set it up all once, then it's all automated and you just need to check it once in a while. And you will learn everything you need to know in this affiliate marketing training course.


Affiliate Marketing is not about sitting at the computer all day and looking at the screen and biting your nails. It's about focusing on the right tools. This course will give you guidelines that will set you up on a road to success. Everything you learn, you will be able to apply to YouTube, Amazon, Clickbank, or Shopify.


You will learn what other affiliate networks (such as Jvzoo) you can use to pick the best products and which tool you can use to prepare for future big promotions. Affiliate Marketing is about future planning: knowing when to promote which products and for how long. And then you can take these skills and go after high ticket offers.


This course is created for one simple purpose:
to show people that is possible to make a commission with a few simple techniques.


If you are:
a complete newbie when it comes to affiliate marketing or Clickbank
an affiliate marketer who has been struggling for a while to make a commission

„A very good explanation of things I find hard to get in other places“ - Aviv Ketter
„I learned a lot of new things I didn't know about affiliate“ – Hafsa
„An excellent teacher with a sweet voice. I love the transcription as well. Job made easy course. Great one. Keep it up dear.“ - Adewumi Taiwo
„Everything is attention to detail, awesome“ - Kahindo Mukokya Serge


When you know these secrets then you don't have to worry that you will miss out on any future commission.
Even if you don't know anything about mailing lists, picking products, sales funnel building then you will learn everything about it. We'll use great tools such as Aweber, Clickfunnels, and Keyword planners to set up converting campaigns for your products.


Everything you need to get started in affiliate marketing is covered in this course. We'll also give you other alternatives that you can use if you find that you don't like the software that we used in the course.


Affiliate marketing is one of the easiest ways to start your online business, making it easier than ever before to build your website traffic, your email list, your reputation in the community…and ultimately your revenue.


This course won't break your bank and you will learn which tools are affordable to set up your first affiliate offer. You will have confidence to start your journey after you complete this course.
It is a proven strategy that works even without a personal website. Yes! You can promote other people's products even if you don't have a domain and a website. In this course, I will teach you both ways on how to promote products and earn a commission.


In addition, we'll give you a few email examples that you can use for any business, not just affiliate marketing.
Whether you are just starting or you have been in affiliate marketing for some time now, this is the course for you. Leverage the power of internet marketing now and start making money.
If you want to maximize your earning potential then enroll in this course today and start your affiliate journey.


With this comprehensive, step-by-step course, you will learn all the skills you need to achieve massive success in the world of affiliate marketing.
It was designed after analyzing what students struggle with most when learning this industry.
We want you to be successful in any niche of your choice while making good money!

courses.description:
本業のお仕事、子育て、学業などやることをやっている中で副業をするのは辛いと感じないでしょうか？
ブログで副業をするとなるとひたすら記事を書き続けてアクセスを集めるという、いつ結果が出るかも分からない消耗戦に陥りがちです。
SEO対策をして記事を書き続けるのは、ひたすら暗闇を走り続けているようなもので副業で時間がない中では苦しいですよね。


もうそんな非効率で時間を無駄にすることは辞めましょう。
ブログを副業にしている人はどうやったら効率よく結果を出すかの方法、考え方を知っています。
光を照らせば、歩いてても結果は見えてきます。あなたもぜひ効率よく結果を出す方法、考え方を身につけていただきたいです。


そのため、本講座は効率よくブログを使った副業で結果を出したいあなたにとってオススメとなっています。
ぜひ受講して自分のスキルをさらに向上させてみてください！


ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー
本講座では、主に以下の内容を学んでいきます。ブログの始め方、wordpressの設定方法、アフィリエイト・アドセンス・SEOの基礎知識の説明は省いており、少アクセスで高い成約率を出すためのブログの考え方、キーワードの選定方法、結果を出すための留意点、ブログ運営の次なるステップを要点に絞って解説しています。


ブログマーケティングの言葉の定義と売上の要素
少アクセスで高い成約率を生むブログの考え方
少アクセス高い成約率を狙うキーワードの考え方
キーワードが見つからないときのコツ
結果を出すためのブログ構成
結果が出ないときの対処法
ブログ運営の次なるステップ


ブログ初級者が学ぶべき内容についてムダな情報は削ぎ落とされています。そのため、大事なポイントは頭に入りやすいと思います。
しかし、「知っている」状態と「できている」状態は別モノであるため、受講するだけで少アクセスで高い成約率のブログを作ることはできません。


考え方を知り自分の作業に落とし込むことでやっと少アクセスで高成約のブログは作れます。「できている」の状態にするのは自分次第なので、本講座の情報を活用してぜひ「できている」まで到達して欲しいと願っています！！！

courses.description:
はじめまして、Ｋ（ケイ）こと佐藤和哉と申します。
この度は、本コースにご興味を持って頂きありがとうございます。


突然ですが、


もしあなたが、自由自在に収益化ブログを構築できるとしたら、いかがでしょうか？


どんな理想の未来がまっていますか？


■ 実績紹介
私は20年間の会社員人生に幕を閉じ、脱サラしてブログアフィリエイトで、最高月収270万円、累計2,000万円以上の売上を達成することができました。


そして起業した後はブログアフィリエイトだけでなく、アドセンスやPPCアフィリエイト、メルマガや電子書籍出版、コンテンツ販売からコンサルティングまで5つの事業で収益化に成功しております。


■ 勝ちパターンとの出会い
そんな私ですが、最初からブログアフィリエイトで稼げたわけではありません。


お恥ずかしながら、10年以上も稼げない期間を過ごしながら独学で試行錯誤を繰り返してきました。


少ないアクセスでも稼ぐことすらできず、どうやったらブログで成約するかさえもわからずに悩んでいました。


しかし、10年以上の試行錯誤の末、稼ぐための勝ちパターンを発見できたのです。


勝ちパターンを発見したときは、うれしくてうれしくてたまりませんでした。深い霧の中から光がパーッと差し込んだ、すがすがしい気持ちになりました。


自信に満ち溢れ、ブログ記事を書きたくて書きたくてたまらない衝動を感じたことを今でも覚えています。


そして「売る」技術である勝ちパターンを理解してから、ブログを構築して記事を書いていくことで、少ないアクセスでも売上を叩き出すことができたのです。


ブログで「売る」ためには、原理原則があります。キーワード選定も記事の訴求もブログ構築も、全て正しいやり方が存在するのです。


まだ収益化できていない人や思うように売上が伸ばせていない人は、本コースでお伝えする5つの手法「売上、集客、成約、量産、継続」のいずれかができていないだけなのです。


■ 本コースでお伝えすること
本コースでは、私が10年の試行錯誤の末に発見した勝ちパターンである、少ないアクセスでもブログで稼ぐためのノウハウやテクニックをお伝えしていきます。


1.各セクションをみることで、少ないアクセスで稼ぐための行動ステップがわかり、
2.各レクチャーを視聴していくことで、具体的なノウハウやテクニックが理解できて、

Introduction to Pay Per Call: Why Pay Per Call is a Massive Opportunity

requirements: Basic understanding of computers
courses.description:
More than $60 billion is spent on generating inbound sales calls every year and the industry is growing so quickly that companies are practically begging for more calls. In this course you will learn how to immediately take advantage of the huge Pay Per Call market to build a successful business.


You Will Learn Everything About Pay Per Call
Starting at the beginning and assuming you have absolutely no performance marketing or Pay Per Call background, we take you through everything you need to know to speak our language.
Not only will you learn how Pay Per Call works, we're going to walk you step by step through building a lasting business in the space. By the time you're done with this program, you will have a better understanding of performance marketing than college graduates with marketing degrees.
We will give you a complete 360 degree overview of the industry, combined with the tools you need to actually take action.


Learn to Build, Execute And Scale Campaigns
Marketing campaigns are like living breathing organisms, they move and change constantly.
In this program we'll teach you how to create and manage successful campaigns, while also taking the time to review all of the fundamentals behind how to build them from the ground up.
That way you will be able to do your own research, create your own competitive advantage, and adapt to constantly changing markets.


And How To Grow A Giant Pay Per Call Business
We're going to help you put together an action plan so that you can build a sustainable business in the Pay Per Call space.
That means we're going to teach you everything about how to work with Affiliates, Brokers, Pay Per Call Networks, Call Centers, and all of the other players in the industry.
Then we're going to teach you the skills you need to develop new relationships, negotiate with all your partners, build a team, and scale your business as far as you want to take it.


Why The Pay Per Call Masterclass is Free
Ringba’s Pay Per Call Masterclass was originally designed to train our new team members on everything related to Pay Per Call. During the process of creating this training program we realized that it could have a massive positive impact on the entire Pay Per Call community by bringing in thousands of people who want to build and grow businesses of their own. When we realized how impactful it could be we decided to give it away entirely for free.
Our goal for the Pay Per Call Masterclass was to make it comprehensive enough that Affiliates, Agencies, Brokers, Call Centers, Pay Per Call Networks, and anyone else in the space all use it to train their new staff members. We welcome everyone to participate and will use all of your feedback to improve the class and add continuing education modules whenever we see major changes in the Pay Per Call landscape.
The Pay Per Call Masterclass assumes that anyone watching has a basic understanding of computers and the internet, but has no background in digital marketing or calls. If you’re a more advanced user, we invite you to skip around to lessons that interest you, however, there is a lot of great information and suggest everyone go through the entire program from start to finish.

Upon completion of this course, you’ll have a simple strategy that you can implement right away to get more traffic to your affiliate links and boost your success, without having to spend money or time on developing a website.

MAKE YOUR FIRST COMMISSION ONLINE IN 30 DAYS - This is a course that guarantees you a commission in a month. If you do everything that I've explained in this course, you'll be able to make some good commissions in a short time.
First affiliate marketing and make money online course on Udemy with weekly updates and coaching. No beating around the bush and wasting time over things that don't matter in your business, pure SUPER affiliate marketing in action, on-screen, explained click by click.
Do you want to make money online from affiliate marketing without a website?
Do you want to make money online without any online experience?
Do you want to become a super affiliate and make commissions instantly after finding a product to promote?
Do you want to learn the secret system that many super affiliates including me are using to make up to $9,000 per sale?
Do you want to learn affiliate marketing from an expert who's earning over 30k a month online by promoting other people's products?

If you're looking for a course that can help you to make a breakthrough by learning affiliate marketing from a real person, you're in the right place.
ONE-TIME ENROLLMENT FOR LIFETIME LEARNING - COURSE UPDATES EVERY WEEK
This course is my proven step-by-step affiliate marketing course. A system that is working for me and making me thousands of dollars online and can make you money online too. This course will take you to step by step, show you everything in amazing detail, click by click to make you an expert in affiliate marketing.
- FREE COACHING!
Got questions? Let me know your affiliate marketing question and I'll answer it directly, or I answer it by making a video about it and post it inside the members' area of this affiliate marketing course. With this affiliate marketing course, you won't be left alone to "make it on your own".  I'm here to help you to achieve success.
- STEP BY STEP DETAILS:
Top Level Affiliate course is all about details. This course will take you step by step and click by click to teach you how to start a reliable and sustainable online business in no time and make thousands of dollars from it.
- THIS IS FOR YOU IF YOU WANT TO BE A SUPER AFFILIATE MARKETER
Do you know what's a super affiliate marketer? A super affiliate is an affiliate marketer with a secret weapon at his/her disposal: Instant traffic and a great sales funnel. So when he finds a new product, he'll be able to make sales instantly. In Top level affiliate course, I'll teach you to build your empire in a way where you can have instant traffic like a super affiliate in no time.
- FIRST AFFILIATE MARKETING COURSE ON UDEMY WITH WEEKLY UPDATES:
I will regularly update this course with fresh content to bring you the most up-to-date knowledge and information. Once you are enrolled as my student, you will receive all future updates and new content additions automatically at no extra cost.

courses.title: اخلاقيات التسويق
courses.bio: اخلاقيات التسويق
objectives: اخلاقيات التسويق
requirements: لا
courses.description:
تعريف التسويق


التسويق (بالإنجليزية: Marketing) :هو مجموعة من العمليات أو الأنشطة التي تعمل على اكتشاف رغبات العملاء وتطوير مجموعة من المنتجات أو الخدمات التي تشبع رغباتهم وتحقق أهداف المؤسسة مثل الأرباح أوغير ذلك خلال فترة زمنية مناسبة. ويمكن تعريف التسويق بأنه فن البيع، مع أن البيع هو جزء من العملية.من الناحية المجتمعية، التسويق هو الرابط بين الاحتياجات المادية للمجتمع وبين الاستجابة لأنماط الاقتصاد من خلال توصيل قيمة منتج أو خدمة إلى العملاء. ويمكن اعتبار التسويق وظيفة عمل لمؤسسة ومجموعة من الأليات التي تخلق وتوصل القيمة إلى العملاء والتعامل مع العملاء بطريقة تفيد المؤسسة والمساهمين في رأس مالها. أما التسويق كعلم، فهي عملية تحديد السوق المستهدف من خلال القيام بتحليل وتجزئة السوق وفهم توجهات العملاء وبتقديم قيمة عالية لهم.
ادبيات التسويق
هيرم ماسلو و ترتيب الاحتيجات ومدى تاثرها على التسويق
التطور التاريخي للتسويق
مرحلة التسويق:
هي المرحلة التي انتشر فيها مفهوم التسويق ليصبح بَديلاً عن الفلسات المُستخدمة في المراحل التالية؛ إذ لم يظلل استبدال كافياً للعامل مع المُستهلكين، فأصبحت المُؤسّسات تبحث عن تحقيق احتياجات الأفراد هدفِ دعم تكييف مُنتجاتها معهم، وساهمت هذه المرحلة في وضع المُستهلكين بأعلى سلّم أولويات، واعتمدت على فكرة فكرة تنوّع العرض يُسهم في إشباعٍ أفضل للرَّغبات والحاجات؛ حيث يقتصر على استهلاكهم بمنح قيمة للخدامات والعروض المقدّمة أمامهم.
التسويق الالكترونى والتقليدى
كيفية ايتمالت العميل وجعله يشتري المنتج وهو راضي
التسويق بالترميز
target_audience: المدراء والتسويق

المسوقون
مندوبي المبيعات
رواد الاعمال

Warrior Plus (Beginners & Advanced): Fast Track Training

Learn how to create an affiliate contest and what are the right settings to choose.
