Advanced tips to use Warrior Plus to squeeze the maximum benefits for your business.


Dear Friend,
Whenever you launch a product, you want to make sure it gets the maximum exposure.
But not only that…
You’re also looking for a platform that is dynamic and flexible that you can rely on.
There are so many of them available online and it seems like everyday a new one pop-outs from nowhere and everybody is just talking about it.
Then after a period of time, it’s no more ‘shiny’ and people lose interest.
What To Look For? & Who To Trust?
This is not an easy guess. The answer isn’t always that obvious.
We’ve seen many companies come and go overnight. They made big promises to people, you trust them - you move your business on their platform, and then one day comes some bad news.
Your business falls apart.
What do you do? Who will you trust?
The Ultimate Selling Platform For Internet Marketers.
I’ve tried so many platforms over the years.
I’ve been disappointed by many of them and lost a lot of money.
But out of the so many platform I’ve used, there’s one which has always stand out of the crowd, and that’s Warrior Plus.
The first of its kind instant-split payment platform that was created way back a decade ago.
The first approved and endorsed by the previous owner of Warrior Forum himself - Allen Says.
Even with the influx of competitors in the market, Warrior Plus is still standing and stronger than before - still processing millions of dollars every year flawlessly.
Why You Need To Get Started Now:
Robust and Reliable. It’s been there for over a decade.
User Friendly. The interface is well thought and easy to use.
Feature Rich Interface. The sky is the limit. There are so many things you can do with it when launching a product.
Security. Years of programming and improvements.
FREE. You can get started today without paying an upfront fee.
And the list goes on and on...
Launching with Warrior Plus will also help you grow your business because it has a huge affiliate network helping you succeed.
So taking all these awesome benefits into consideration, I decided to come up with this unique over the shoulder video series to get you started very quickly with it.
How To Unleash The Full Power of Warrior Plus Affiliate Network.
There’s nothing like this video series.
Watch as I show you how launch your product with Warrior Plus and get your offer up and launch faster than you expected.
I reveal my best tips for using this amazing platform. You get to see everything. I explain everything to you.
There will be no guesswork.
All you need is just a short hour of your time to learn everything and you’d be ready to get started with it instantly.
Here’s What You’ll Discover Inside This Video Training:
Learn how to quickly and easily get use to the Warrior Plus interface and find your landmark.
Learn how to configure your main settings in your account properly.
How to connect your PayPal to warrior Plus to enable to adaptive payment.
Learn the simple and fast way of creating a product inside Warrior Plus.
Learn what’s the difference between an offer and a product.
Discover how to configure properly your product settings for launch.
How to prepare a sales funnel and link them with Warrior Plus.
Learn how to properly configure an offer and what you should fill in.

You're excited about this new opportunity. It has the potential to really change things for you. So what's next? You need a plan, now that you know how affiliate marketing works and what it takes to be successful with it.


That's why I built this Affiliate Marketing 101 course: with my 5 years of experience in the industry, I want to help you avoid all the pitfalls and get up and running as quickly as possible.


In this course, there are 10 videos, a supplemental PDF and a checklist to make sure that you don't miss any steps.

- Lesson One: Getting started - What is affiliate marketing?
- Lesson Two: Mindset - Lesson Three: Necessary tools for your business success
- Lesson Four: What is a niche - How to find affiliate products in your niche
- Lesson Five: How to choose the best products with recurring income

- Lesson Seven: What is traffic and the three different kinds

- Lesson Ten: Get one on one coaching to fast track your succes

ブログを使ってアフィリエイト。自宅で出来る気軽な副業としても有効なブログ運営。Wordpressを使ってアフィリエイトに効果的なブログデザインを学び、実際にどうやってアフィリエイトで収益を上げるかを学ぶことが出来ます。今まで思ったほど収益につながらなかった人でも大丈夫、正しいやり方と続け方を学びましょう。
広告はなぜ儲かるか、ブログの続け方は？　どうやって記事を書くのか、記事のネタはどうすればいいのか。アフィリエイトだけでなくブログを書き続けるコツなどをスライドを中心に紹介します。実際に1記事を書く作業を、24分ノーカット収録。実際に記事を書く様子を見ることができます。
本講座では実際に「収益化されているブログ」を元に講座を進めていきます。また、すぐに使える収益化に特化したWordpressブログのテーマをダウンロード配布。収益化への最短距離を走ることができるでしょう。


本講座で手に入るWordpressテーマでアフィリエイトをはじめましょう！

Skyrocket Sales With The Help Of JVZoo

courses.description:
Descripción del curso
¿Quieres aumentar tus ingresos como afiliado y convertir más clientes potenciales en ventas? El curso "Embudos de Marketing para Afiliados Novatos" está diseñado específicamente para ayudarte a crear y optimizar embudos de conversión efectivos que impulsen tu negocio de afiliación. A lo largo de este curso, aprenderás a construir embudos de marketing paso a paso, desde la creación de una lista de suscriptores hasta la implementación de campañas de email marketing que conviertan.
Comenzaremos con los fundamentos de los embudos de marketing para afiliados, para que comprendas cómo funciona cada etapa y cómo conectar todas las piezas para lograr un flujo de conversión efectivo. Luego, exploraremos los diferentes tipos de embudos de email marketing y cómo seleccionar el más adecuado para tu nicho y audiencia. Aprenderás a crear imanes de clientes potenciales atractivos que capten la atención de tus visitantes y los conviertan en suscriptores comprometidos.
Además, descubrirás estrategias avanzadas de nutrición de clientes potenciales y lead scoring para segmentar tu lista y priorizar las oportunidades de venta más prometedoras. También te enseñaré cómo calificar y segmentar clientes potenciales para optimizar tus campañas y mejorar la tasa de conversión.
Este curso te dará las herramientas y conocimientos necesarios para construir un embudo de conversión rentable y escalable, para que puedas generar ingresos constantes como afiliado. Si estás listo para llevar tu negocio al siguiente nivel, ¡este curso es para ti!

Contenido principal que se enseña en el curso:
Embudos de marketing para afiliados – Aprenderás qué son los embudos de marketing, cómo funcionan y por qué son fundamentales para el éxito en el marketing de afiliación. Se explicará cómo conectar todas las partes de un embudo para guiar a los clientes potenciales a través del proceso de conversión.
Email marketing – Descubrirás cómo crear campañas de email marketing efectivas para nutrir y convertir clientes potenciales. Aprenderás a diseñar secuencias de correos, automatizar respuestas y medir el rendimiento de tus campañas para mejorar las tasas de conversión.
Generación de leads – Te enseñaré cómo atraer clientes potenciales mediante ofertas de suscripción relevantes, formularios efectivos y estrategias de captación de tráfico. También descubrirás cómo diseñar imanes de clientes potenciales atractivos para aumentar tu lista de suscriptores.
Segmentación y calificación de clientes potenciales – Aprenderás a calificar y segmentar tus leads para dirigir tus campañas hacia las oportunidades más prometedoras. Dominarás el uso de técnicas de lead scoring para identificar y priorizar clientes potenciales según su nivel de interés y disposición para comprar.
Optimización de embudos de conversión – Comprenderás cómo analizar el rendimiento de tus embudos y hacer mejoras para aumentar las tasas de conversión. También aprenderás a desarrollar embudos específicos para adquisición, nutrición y ventas para maximizar tus resultados.
target_audience: Este curso aborda tanto a principiantes como a profesionales con experiencia buscando perfeccionar sus conocimientos en el campo específico y creciente de los embudos de marketing para afiliados.
Profesionales Libres: SEOs, Copywriters, Diseñadores Web freelance.
Emprendedores Digitales: Quienes inician o gestionan un negocio online desde cero (blogs, webs).
Propietarios de Sitios Web: Dueños de blogs, landing pages, webs de nicho, etc., sin experiencia previa en marketing por afiliados.
Social Media Managers: Encargados/as de las redes sociales que buscan monetizar o promocionar con afiliación.
Email Marketers: Profesionales enfocados específicamente en el email marketing y sus afiliaciones.
Marketing Automation Experts: Quienes trabajan con herramientas como HubSpot, ActiveCampaign, etc., pero no necesariamente con suelo sólido en embudos de conversión para afiliados.
Personas que Quieren Construir un Negocio Online: Incluyendo micro-empresarios y autónomos digitales sin experiencia previa en marketing por afiliados.
Dueños de Negocios con Presencia Digital: Empresarios tradicionales (locales/regionales) expandiendo a online, buscando optimizar ventas afiliadas.
Freelancers o Asesores Digitales: Quienes ofrecen servicios y desean incorporar estrategias de embudos para sus clientes.
Inversores en Negocios Online: Personas que compran acciones o inversiones en modelos online, interesadas en entender la base del funnel antes de invertir.

"Autopilot Affiliate Marketing By a Clickbank Super Affiliate" is a detailed course dedicated to this strategy. You will learn from Sean Bagheri, a Clickbank super affiliate to build a high converting affiliate funnel like this and promote the way super affiliates do.

This step-by-step Affiliate Marketing Masterclass is designed to help you build, grow, and automate your online business using proven strategies.

Inside this masterclass, you’ll discover how to choose the right niche, build a high-converting affiliate website, generate targeted traffic using SEO and content marketing, and set up automation systems to grow your business without constant effort.

You’re not getting a quick overview—you’re getting a comprehensive system designed to help you build an affiliate business that lasts. We’ll cover organic traffic strategies, automation tools, monetization tactics, and branding techniques that work in 2025 and beyond.

courses.description:
Descripción del Curso
¿Quieres empezar a ganar dinero con el marketing de afiliados pero no sabes por dónde comenzar? ¡Este curso de marketing de afiliados para principiantes es justo lo que necesitas! Aprenderás desde cero cómo funciona el marketing de afiliación y cómo construir un sistema rentable paso a paso. A lo largo de este curso, descubrirás los 4 pasos fundamentales para tener éxito: generar tráfico, prospectar clientes potenciales, hacer seguimiento efectivo y finalmente, presentar una oferta irresistible para convertir tus prospectos en ventas.
Te enseñaré cómo identificar y entender a tu público objetivo, para que puedas conectar mejor con tus potenciales clientes y aumentar tus tasas de conversión. También aprenderás sobre los diferentes modelos de afiliación, como Pago por Venta (PPS), Pago por Acción (PPA), Pago por Lead (PPL) y CPM (Coste por Mil), para que elijas el que mejor se adapte a tu estrategia.


Además, analizaremos ejemplos de éxito, te mostraremos cómo trabajar con plataformas como Amazon y ClickBank, y te daré estrategias avanzadas para escalar tu negocio mediante la subcontratación y la creación de redes de afiliación.
¡Inscríbete ahora y empieza a construir tu camino hacia la independencia financiera con el marketing de afiliados!
Si estás listo para dar tus primeros pasos en el mundo digital y destacar en un mercado competitivo, este curso es para ti.
¡Empieza hoy a construir tu presencia digital!
target_audience: Emprendedores digitales principiantes: Personas que están dando sus primeros pasos en el mundo del marketing digital y desean monetizar sus habilidades a través del marketing de afiliados.
Blogueros y creadores de contenido: Aquellos que ya tienen un blog o canal en redes sociales y buscan diversificar sus fuentes de ingresos incorporando productos de afiliados a su contenido.
Marketing de afiliados con experiencia: Afiliados experimentados que buscan optimizar sus estrategias y descubrir nuevos nichos y productos para aumentar sus ganancias.
Personas interesadas en generar ingresos pasivos: Individuos que desean crear una fuente de ingresos adicional y sostenible a largo plazo.

Cualquier persona con interés en el comercio electrónico: Aquellos que sienten curiosidad por el mundo del comercio electrónico y desean aprender cómo pueden participar en este mercado en crecimiento.

courses.description:
Welcome to Affiliate Marketing Course!
Have a blog and wondering how to make it profitable? Enter affiliate marketing – a smart way to earn by promoting products you love!
In this course, you’ll start with the basics: understanding what affiliate marketing really means and how it can be a goldmine for bloggers like you. Next, we’ll guide you on finding the right products or services that resonate with your audience. It’s not just about promoting; it’s about sharing genuine recommendations!
You’ll then learn how to weave these product mentions into your blog posts naturally and engagingly. And don’t worry, we won’t leave out the magic of social media.
We’ll show you how to amplify your affiliate marketing efforts using platforms you’re probably already on. With hands-on guidance and actionable steps, by the end of this course, you’ll be on your way to turning your blog into a rewarding revenue stream.
In this course, you’ll learn:
Introduction to Affiliate Marketing
Setting Up Your WordPress Blog
Getting Started with Affiliate Programs
Building Quality Content
Implementing Affiliate Links
Analyzing and Optimizing Performance
Advanced Affiliate Marketing Techniques
Troubleshooting and Common Challenges
Tracking and Analytics
Legal and Ethical Considerations
WHO IS THE COURSE FOR?
This course is designed for bloggers, content creators, and website owners who are eager to monetize their platforms. If you have a passion for sharing valuable content and want to learn how to earn from it without compromising your authenticity, then the “Affiliate Marketing Success Blueprint” is the perfect fit for you! Whether you’re a blogging novice or a seasoned writer, this course will offer insights to elevate your earning potential.
YOUR INSTRUCTOR
Meet Arsalan, a pro in digital blogging and online business. He’s been into WordPress since 2006 and loved blogging, online marketing, and SEO from the start. By age 21, he had started his first business because he was really excited about it.
He’s not just a regular blogger. Arsalan is a top seller on Flippa and knows a lot about buying and selling blogs. He’s made a lot of money for online platforms and even gives advice to brands and startups on how to grow.
A bit about his mindset: Arsalan didn’t like the usual 9-to-5 job routine. He wanted more excitement and to follow his dreams, even if others didn’t get it. He once said, “I wanted to go after my dreams, no matter what others thought.” Now, he’s proof that chasing your passion works and he encourages you to take control of your own future, like he did.

courses.title: Email Marketing For Beginners - Common Terms
courses.bio: Understating email marketing in a few easy steps
requirements: No Experience needed you will learn everything you need to know how to do email marketing
courses.description:
What kinds of email marketing strategies should you implement in 2021?
As trends and techniques come and go and technology becomes even more all-encompassing, the ways we reach out and connect with leads and customers change. Even the basic email isn’t what it once was. Now it’s all about using emojis and attention-grabbing headline copy. The email itself has to be well-designed with snappy verbiage and great linkage. you will learn the basics of sending emails. how to capture their emails with landing pages and option pages.
If you’re only sending static emails to your leads and customers, your company is missing out on conversions. It can be a bummer to send an email to a large group of leads to only hear back from maybe half of them. It happens every day to marketers, and it’s not always their fault. Emails get accidentally sent to the spam filter, people change their email addresses, and hey, us marketers sometimes misspell someone’s email address. And yes, sometimes people did see your email and are flat-out not interested.
The only way to sort matters out is with a follow-up email. It can be scary to send an email after not hearing back, but it’s important to do so. To prepare for the likelihood of getting no response, write several email scripts. These should include the initial email, a follow-up, and even a second follow-up.
target_audience: Beginners in email marketing

courses.description:
Every single day, there are thousands of affiliate marketers who sell the most mundane products and make a full-time living doing so. Things like water filters for your fridge, random car parts, & vacuum cleaners. They're able to do this because they put up small, but very targeted websites that get found in search multiple times a day.


Because these searches are so targeted, they often result in a high conversion rate, meaning a lot of website visitors end up buying something. However, these visitors don't purchase items directly from the website, they purchase them through stores like Amazon, Target & Best Buy.


These websites simply grab the customers from search, answer their questions about a specific product, and then forward them over to Amazon to buy. It's a simple process called building a niche website and this course will teach you how to build one from scratch, click-by-click. I'll go over the basic strategies behind picking a niche, getting found in search, and even recommend some of the best tools to use so that you have a website that's fast & high performing.


After taking this course you will have a fully configured website that is ready for you to start writing articles and getting found. You'll be past all of the back-end tech headaches that come with setting up a website from scratch and you'll be able to focus on what you really want to do...writing and creating content.


You should be able to complete this course in about a day, maybe two.
target_audience: beginning digital marketers looking to build a website

Let’s face it – the biggest problem with making money online today is that there are too many “gurus” promising you things that they can never deliver (nor did they ever intend to deliver on their promises). If you’re like most people who are trying to make money online, you’ve most likely bought your fair share of online marketing training courses.
And my guess is, those courses haven’t really worked out for you.
You’re lured in by these ‘gurus’ into buy their courses thinking everything is going to be very easy. But what they actually teach makes most people sick to their stomach.The usual advice you find in these courses is to sell, sell and sell. And do it all while being pushy.
During my years as a salesman, well, let’s just say I learned a thing or two about sales. And even though I was interested in learning from the  Internet marketing “gurus”, I always had my guard up, especially when they teach how to sell online. Because of that, I decided to ignore some of the information outlined in their course and follow my instincts.
That’s when my problems online started slowly disappearing. The more I pivoted from the high-pressure sales techniques these courses were teaching, the more money I started making.
My step-by-step video course reveals the exact same methods I discovered thanks to my years of experience outside the virtual world.
The course is laid out in an easy-to-follow manner and reveals everything you need to know about making money online by “selling” affiliate products without being pushy, aggressive or sleazy.
target_audience: This course is meant for anyone who wants to take advantage of today's hottest trend and become a successful affiliate marketer

requirements: インターネットビジネスの基礎知識
courses.description:
＜2017年8月10日追記＞
「なぜ95%のアフィリエイターは、リアル貧乏脱出計画に失敗するのか？」コースのレクチャーを追加しました。
＜コース公開時の講座内容＞
ネット副業の中でも人気のアフィリエイト。たくさんの人が参入する割には、それだけで生計を立てている人をなかなか見かけないのも事実。アフィリエイトってやっぱり難しいのでしょうか？うーん、なかなか答えに窮する質問ですね。
商才のある人には「楽勝」だけど、ネットに疎い人や、コミュニケーション能力の低い人にとっては「ムッチャ難しい」のがアフィリエイトです。要は才能が全てです。才能さえあれば、努力することなしにアフィリエイトを生業とすることができます。
しかしどれだけテニスの才能があっても、一通り体系的にテニスを学ばない限り、中学校の部活でテニスをやっている子供にすら勝てないでしょう。おそらく1ゲームも取れないはずです。アフィリエイトも同じです。
いくら才能があっても、マネタイズまで一通りの流れを体系的に学ばないことには、キャリアとして機能しないことは言わずもがな。
本コースでは「メルマガ」を使ったアフィリエイトの方法を丁寧に説明しています。ジャンル選定の方法から、サーバー&ドメインの選び方、さらにはライティングまでを、詳しく解説しました。まだアフィリエイトを体系的に学んだことのない人にオススメです。
具体例が豊富で、講師の赤裸々なストーリーが盛りだくさんなので、エンターテイメントとしても楽しめる内容となっているはずです。
自分で言うのもなんですが、良いコースです。かなり。
target_audience: アフィリエイトを始めれば南の島でバカンス生活を送れるという浮かれた考え方を持つ人は受講しないほうがいいと思います
どうせアフィリエイトなんか...と少々うがった考え方を持つ人にとっては驚きの内容があるかもしれません
現状よりも少しだけフリーな人生を欲する人は検討する価値アリかもしれません

courses.description:
Are you looking to tap into the world of affiliate marketing, but feel overwhelmed by the complexities of building funnels, finding the right software, and making it all affordable?
Whether you’re a beginner ready to dive into the affiliate world or a seasoned marketer aiming to optimize your existing strategies, this course will give you the knowledge and tools you need to start generating affiliate commissions efficiently.
What You’ll Learn in This Course
In this comprehensive, step-by-step training, you’ll gain hands-on skills in affiliate marketing, focusing on two core elements: affiliate funnels and email marketing. With these skills, you’ll be able to generate traffic, capture leads, nurture relationships, and convert clicks into commissions. Here’s how we’ll guide you to success:


Building High-Converting Affiliate Funnels


Fundamentals of Funnel Building: Learn what makes an affiliate funnel effective, from understanding user intent to creating engaging content that converts.
Creating Funnels with ClickFunnels: We’ll walk you through building professional funnels on ClickFunnels and show you how to maximize your investment.
Exploring Free and Budget-Friendly Alternatives: Don’t want to spend on expensive software yet? No problem. We’ll introduce free or low-cost platforms that allow you to create highly effective funnels without breaking the bank.
Choosing the Right Funnel for Your Audience: Not all funnels are created equal. Understand which funnel type will work best for your target audience and maximize your success rate with proven strategies.


Mastering Email Marketing for Affiliate Success


Building and Growing an Email List: An email list is essential for affiliate marketing. Learn methods for gathering high-quality leads that are likely to convert.
Crafting Effective Email Campaigns: Discover how to create email sequences that engage, inform, and convert subscribers into loyal customers.
Using ClickFunnels Email Integrations and Alternatives: Learn how to integrate email marketing tools with ClickFunnels or leverage affordable alternatives to maintain your campaign effectiveness without compromising on results.
Automating for Success: Set up autoresponders and automation sequences to build relationships and increase conversions around the clock.


Optimizing Your Affiliate Strategy


Tracking and Analyzing Results: Understand key metrics to assess your funnel and email campaign performance, allowing you to continually improve and maximize your earnings.
Scaling Your Campaigns: Ready to take your success to the next level? We’ll cover strategies to scale your affiliate marketing efforts and increase your commission potential.
Why Take This Course?


Affiliate marketing can be incredibly profitable, but without the right strategy, you risk spending time and money with little return. In this course, you’ll learn from experts who will teach you practical techniques to avoid common mistakes and build a reliable affiliate income stream. The content is designed for all experience levels, with clear, actionable steps that anyone can follow.


Who Should Enroll?


Aspiring Affiliate Marketers: Get your foot in the door and launch your first successful affiliate campaign.
Current Marketers Looking to Improve: Optimize your existing efforts with advanced funnel and email marketing techniques.
Budget-Conscious Entrepreneurs: Discover free and affordable tools that deliver results without excessive costs.
This course will give you everything you need to establish and grow a successful affiliate marketing business. You’ll come away with a full toolkit of methods to create profitable funnels and engaging email campaigns using both premium tools like ClickFunnels and affordable alternatives.


RESPONSIVE AND CARING INSTRUCTOR: WORLD-CLASS STUDENT SUPPORT


If you have questions, know that I am here to help! I answer 99% of student questions within 24 hours. Many students tell me that other instructors don't respond. Well, I do because
1) I care about my students.
2) I feel a responsibility to make sure that students get their money's worth from the course.


MONEY BACK GUARANTEE


This  course comes with an unconditional, Udemy backed, 30 day money-back guarantee. It is also my personal promise to you that you will get great value from the course and succeed.


Enroll Today and Start Building Your Affiliate Empire!

People who want to learn affiliate marketing

courses.description:
「WordPressブログを収益化するならアドセンス！」と言われるくらい、Googleアドセンスでの収益化はブログ運営者さんに好まれます。クリック報酬型なのでクリックされるだけで収益が上がる。単価は低いけれどアクセスを集めれば一定割合のクリックと収益を見込むことができ、他の物販ASP系とは違った安定収益を得られます。講師は外注化も取り入れながら月6桁の報酬を得ていました。数年放置しても月5桁！そんなブログがいくつかあれば、あなたの暮らしがちょっとハッピーになりませんか？
このコースではアドセンス広告を自分のブログに貼る資格を得るための「アドセンス審査」に一発で合格するためのノウハウをお伝えします。一般的なブログ記事やYouTube動画では解説されていない「どうしても合格しない事例とその理由」についても解説しています。
「取れば一生モノ！」と言われるアドセンス審査に合格してアドセンスアカウントを取り、あなたのブログを収益化しましょう。

courses.title: De Suscriptores a Ventas: Email Marketing para Afiliados
courses.bio: Convierte prospectos en clientes con estrategias de email marketing, automatización, segmentación y promoción de ofertas
objectives: Crearás un proceso de ventas efectivo por email, guiando a los suscriptores desde el interés hasta la compra con mensajes estratégicos y secuenciales.
Construirás relaciones sólidas por email, generando confianza y fidelidad para convertir suscriptores en clientes leales y recurrentes.
Dominarás el email marketing como estrategia de afiliación, comprendiendo cómo funciona y aplicando mejores prácticas para lograr más ventas.
Crearás, optimizarás y harás crecer tu lista de correo electrónico, captando suscriptores de calidad con técnicas efectivas y estrategias avanzadas.
Automatizarás el email marketing con autorespondedores y segmentación inteligente, enviando mensajes precisos que aumenten conversiones y ventas.
Maximizarás ingresos con estrategias de email marketing, aprovechando clientes recurrentes, recomendaciones y mensajes secuenciales bien estructurados.
Evitarás que tus emails sean marcados como spam, mejorar su reputación como remitente y cumplir con regulaciones legales para asegurar su entregabilidad.
Definirás objetivos efectivos de email marketing, alineados con su negocio, para aumentar conversiones, ahorrar tiempo y mejorar la rentabilidad.
Escribirás líneas de asunto irresistibles y persuasivas, aumentando las tasas de apertura y despertando el interés de los suscriptores desde el primer contacto.
Redactarás emails valiosos y convincentes, combinando contenido de calidad, llamadas a la acción impactantes y estrategias para generar confianza y ventas.
Optimizarás la entregabilidad de tus emails, gestionando rebotes, evitando bloqueos y superando filtros para asegurar que lleguen a la bandeja de entrada.
Medirás y analizarás el rendimiento de tus campañas, interpretando métricas clave para ajustar estrategias y mejorar la efectividad de cada email enviado.
Construirás una lista de correo de calidad y alto valor, recopilando contactos éticos, usando incentivos y aplicando técnicas para aumentar suscriptores.

Como crear relaciones por email: Se trata de como te comunicas

Define tus objetivos para ganar más dinero
Define tus objetivos para ahorrar tiempo

Cómo crear líneas de asunto que llamen l: Elegir la identidad de tus mails
Cómo hacer valiosos tus emails: Define el valor del contenido de tus correos
Una llamada a la acción contundente
Haz que tus mails sean intrínsecamente valiosos
Como aumentar la entregabilidad de tus c: Gestión de los rebotes y bloqueos
Supera los firewalls del email marketing

requirements: No necesitas experiencia previa en email marketing. Aprenderás desde cero con explicaciones claras y ejemplos prácticos.
No requieres conocimientos técnicos avanzados. Todo el proceso será guiado paso a paso, con herramientas fáciles de usar y configuraciones simples.
Un dispositivo con acceso a internet (PC, laptop, tablet o incluso un smartphone) para seguir las lecciones y aplicar lo aprendido.
Ganas de aprender y mejorar tus ingresos. Si tienes motivación y estás listo para aplicar estrategias efectivas, este curso es para ti.
Una cuenta de correo electrónico (Gmail, Outlook u otra). Empezarás con lo básico y luego explorarás plataformas más avanzadas si lo deseas.
Curiosidad por el marketing digital y las ventas online. Si alguna vez te ha interesado ganar dinero en internet, este curso te enseñará una estrategia clave.
Tiempo para practicar lo aprendido. No necesitas muchas horas al día, pero sí dedicar un poco de tiempo a implementar lo que vas descubriendo.
Ningún software de pago es obligatorio. Aprenderás a usar herramientas gratuitas y, si decides invertir más adelante, sabrás cuáles elegir.
No es necesario tener un negocio propio. Puedes aplicar lo aprendido para promocionar productos de afiliados y generar ingresos sin inventario ni inversión inicial.
No necesitas conocimientos en ventas o copywriting. Te enseñaremos técnicas sencillas pero efectivas para escribir emails persuasivos.
No requieres una lista de correos previa. Aprenderás cómo construir una desde cero, con estrategias probadas para atraer suscriptores de calidad.
No es necesario ser un experto en redes sociales o publicidad. Aunque pueden ayudar, este curso te enseñará a generar resultados sin depender de ellas.
No necesitas habilidades de diseño. Las estrategias del curso se enfocan en contenido efectivo, sin necesidad de imágenes o formatos complicados.
No es necesario saber programar o configurar servidores. Usaremos herramientas intuitivas con interfaces amigables para que puedas implementarlas sin problemas.
No hace falta invertir dinero al inicio. Podrás aplicar muchas de las estrategias de email marketing con herramientas gratuitas y crecer progresivamente.
courses.description:
Descripción del curso:
¿Te gustaría transformar tus suscriptores en ventas constantes? El curso "De Suscriptores a Ventas: Email Marketing para Afiliados" te enseñará paso a paso cómo construir una estrategia de email marketing efectiva para monetizar tu lista de contactos. Si eres un afiliado novato, este curso está diseñado específicamente para ti: aprenderás a crear relaciones sólidas con tus suscriptores, aumentar las tasas de apertura y conversión, y generar ingresos recurrentes mediante campañas de correo electrónico bien estructuradas.
A lo largo de 12 módulos detallados, descubrirás cómo construir una lista de correo electrónico de calidad desde cero, establecer objetivos claros, redactar líneas de asunto que capturen la atención y crear contenido valioso que motive a tus suscriptores a actuar. Además, aprenderás técnicas avanzadas de segmentación, cómo evitar que tus correos terminen en spam y cómo medir el éxito de tus campañas mediante el análisis de datos.
El email marketing es una de las herramientas más poderosas para los afiliados, y este curso te brindará las mejores prácticas y estrategias probadas para maximizar tus resultados. Si deseas aumentar tus ingresos, automatizar procesos y convertirte en un remitente de confianza, este curso es para ti. ¡Empieza hoy mismo y lleva tu negocio de afiliación al siguiente nivel!
target_audience: Aspirantes a afiliados digitales que desean generar ingresos promocionando productos sin necesidad de crear sus propios productos o servicios.
Principiantes en marketing de afiliados que buscan una estrategia efectiva y probada para aumentar sus conversiones sin depender de anuncios pagos.
Emprendedores digitales y freelancers que quieren construir una fuente de ingresos estable a través del email marketing.
Creadores de contenido (bloggers, YouTubers, influencers) que desean monetizar su audiencia mediante campañas de email marketing bien estructuradas.
Dueños de pequeños negocios y tiendas online que buscan una forma rentable de mantener contacto con sus clientes y aumentar la repetición de compras.
Personas interesadas en ganar dinero online sin grandes inversiones, aprendiendo a utilizar el email marketing como una herramienta poderosa de conversión.
Vendedores de infoproductos (ebooks, cursos, membresías) que desean optimizar su comunicación y mejorar sus tasas de conversión con estrategias de email.
Personas que desean independencia financiera y buscan construir un sistema automatizado que genere ingresos pasivos a largo plazo.
Afiliados que han probado redes sociales o anuncios pagados pero quieren una estrategia más sostenible y predecible para generar ventas.
Principiantes en marketing digital que desean aprender email marketing desde la base y aplicarlo en cualquier nicho de negocio.
Personas sin conocimientos técnicos que buscan una forma sencilla y guiada para implementar estrategias de email marketing sin complicaciones.
Personas con poco tiempo disponible que quieren aprender estrategias prácticas y automatizadas para hacer crecer sus ingresos sin esfuerzo constante.
Aquellos que han intentado email marketing antes pero no han visto resultados y necesitan una guía clara sobre cómo hacerlo correctamente.
Freelancers y consultores de marketing que desean agregar email marketing a su conjunto de habilidades y ofrecerlo como un servicio adicional.
Personas que no quieren depender de redes sociales y buscan una forma más directa, estable y controlada de comunicarse con su audiencia.
Dueños de páginas nicho o sitios web afiliados que desean convertir más visitantes en suscriptores y más suscriptores en clientes.
Personas que quieren aprender una habilidad valiosa y demandada que les permita destacarse en el mundo digital y mejorar sus oportunidades de negocio.

courses.description:
Welcome! In this course, you'll learn how to use ChatGPT and Ai to make money with affiliate marketing. I'll guide you step by step, from finding good ideas to getting people to visit your content.
First, we'll look at how to do easy research to find the best topics. This will help you create content that your audience will love.
Next, we'll go over how to write helpful review articles using AI. You'll see how to make your content interesting and useful.
Then, I'll show you how to organize your articles so they're easy to read and more likely to earn you money.
We'll also talk about adding special bonuses to your articles to make them more valuable. This will help you stand out and earn even more.
Finally, we'll cover how to bring visitors to your articles using social media traffic. You'll learn simple ways to get more people to see your content.
By the end of this course, you'll have the skills and tools you need to create a successful online business and start making steady income.
This course is meant to help guide you through the process of creating your content, follow along and take action on each step before moving to the next step for the best results.
Let's get started!

courses.description:
Con questo corso avanzato di ClickFunnels avrai la possibilità di imparare a creare correttamente un Funnel Di Vendita grazie al miglior tool per la costruzione di Funnels.


All'interno di questo corso troverai materiale da scaricare che ti aiuterà a rendere ancor di più performante la grafica dei tuoi funnels.


Ecco un esempio di cosa trovi all'interno del corso:


Descrizione Video


ClickFunnels Acount:


Come creare correttamente il tuo account Clickfunnels scegliendo il piano da 97$ al mese.


Collegamento Dominio a CF (da namecheap):


come collegare correttamento il tuo dominio acquistato su Namecheap a clickfunnels e rendirizzarlo a qualsiasi pagina del funnel da te scelta.


ONE FUNNEL AWAY CHALLENGE:


Come acquistare correttamente il cofanetto “One Funnel Away Challenge” per avere una guida in più da parte di Russel e del suo team. Scopo principale, imparare il più possibile terminologia dei Funnel in Inglese.


Differenza Tra Abbonamento Platinum ($297) e Piano Base ($97):


In questa lezione vedremo la differenza sostanziale dei due piani offerti da ClickFunnels. Nel Piano base, quello che per il momento andremo ad utilizzare, saraà possibile usufruire di quasi tutti i servizi della piattaforma ma con delle limitazioni, come ad esempio il numero di funnels e di pagine che possiamo andare a creare.
Nel piano Platinum, avremo invece la possibilità di utilizzare tutte le risorse della piattaforma, come anche la funzione di autorisponditore (costruita molto bene con innumerevoli possibilità di selezionare e smistare il nostro pubblico tramite l’utilizzo dei tag), avremo anche la possibilità di creare infiniti funnels e infinite pagine, la possibilità di guardare la sezione “FUNNEL FLIX” con tutti i suoi contenuti esclusivi come ad esempio delle live Con TONY ROBBINS e molto altro ancora.


Account Settings - IMPOSTAZIONI - :


in questa lezione vediamo nello specifico e in modo approfondito tutto il BackEnd della piattaforma come,
impostazioni generali;
digital assets:
metodi di pagamenti;
collegamento dominio;
notifiche;
account history;
integrazioni;
leads disiscritti;
… e tutte le funzioni/opzioni.




Digital assets:


In questa lezione vediamo come caricare un file formato pdf (o anche altri formati, IMPORTANTE essere inferiore ai 3mega di dimensione, Requisito obbligatorio richiesto dalla Piattaforma) e poi inserirlo all’interno di una nostra qualsiasi pagina del funnel pronto ad essere scaricato dal nostro cliente.


AFFILIAZIONE CLICKFUNNELS:


In questo video andiamo ad approfondire il servizio affiliazione che la piattaforma ci offre.
Vedremo come poter promuovere tutti i servizi/prodotti messi a disposizione da Clickfunnels!
Vedremo tutto il backende della piattaforma affiliati e come, nello specifico icavare i link di affiliazione dei singoli prodotti e come promuovere gli stessi.
All’interno della piattaforma troveremo a disposizione anche email e banner di promozione da utilizzare a nostro favore.
..... E molto altro ancora

¿Quieres aprender a aprovechar el poder de Internet y las redes sociales para vender tus productos digitales de manera efectiva? Este curso te proporcionará las habilidades y estrategias necesarias para dominar la venta de productos digitales utilizando dos de las plataformas más poderosas del mercado: Hotmart y Facebook.
Desde la creación de productos digitales hasta la implementación de estrategias de marketing en Facebook, este curso te guiará paso a paso a través de todo el proceso de venta en línea. Aprenderás a identificar nichos rentables, crear productos digitales de calidad, configurar tu cuenta en Hotmart, desarrollar campañas publicitarias efectivas en Facebook y mucho más.

requirements: Even if you don’t know the first thing about Bitcoin or creating a successful online business all you need is a working computer, an internet connection and this course to get started.
courses.description:
I've been looking for ways to make money from Bitcoin since 2013. Just like everyone else I tried different methods to make a consistent and steady income from the currency. I tried trading bitcoins, mining bitcoins, and bitcoin faucet websites.

Then it hit me...
I'm trying to make money out of Bitcoin the “old" way. Basically I'm doing exactly what everybody else is and that's why I'm not getting any results.
I'm happy to say that I found a method that works...
Since I truly believe that Bitcoin is going to change money as we know it I decided to start educating people about Bitcoin. Whenever someone searched for ways to buy Bitcoins for example, I would point them to the most relevant exchange and get a commission.
It took me a couple of months but suddenly I was making around $1,500 every month from my website and I wasn't dependent on the price of Bitcoin.
But nothing could prepare me to what happened next...
When Bitcoin boomed on November 2013 to $1200 my profits grew by more than 500%. On November-December alone I made $34,623. I remember waking up on Saturday and doing a routine check on my profits when I saw I already made $1000 (it was only 10am).
Ever since that infamous Saturday I put all of my time and effort to explore this new method of making money with Bitcoin. I managed to end 2014 with $120,264 in revenues.
I can finally say that I have found a stable, profitable way to monetize off the Bitcoin industry. And better yet, I've devised a simple yet highly effective blueprint.
target_audience: Anyone who want to launch an online business in the Bitcoin field, as well as other niche areas … and earn a good income.

courses.description:
Make money with affiliate marketing today! Create a great passive income revenue stream, and gain financial freedom - no website needed.


Course updates for 2025:


List of 20+ high ticket affiliate marketing programs
Top-six affiliate aggregator sites: Detailed pros and cons of ClickBank, Amazon Associates affiliate program, ShareASale, JVZoo, CJ Affiliate, and MaxBounty to help you find the perfect products
Added insights on Travelpayouts which is the top travel affiliate network
You'll love these eight CPA (Cost-Per-Action) affiliate networks. Cost-Per-Action deals have the highest conversion rates. They are profitable affiliate programs that are easy to sell ASAP
New powerful section on choosing offers that will make the most money
25 top affiliate WordPress plugins (they’ll make your life so much easier)
Affiliate marketing programs without prerequisites that anyone can join and begin promoting on day 1
Dominate globally: Weglot translation plugin lets you automatically translate your site to 100+ languages and get traffic in those languages, and do your affiliate marketing to extra audiences
Find the most profitable affiliate marketing programs
Top affiliate marketing strategies like CPA marketing, CPC marketing, and more


* OVER 19,000 DELIGHTED STUDENTS HAVE TAKEN THIS AFFILIATE MARKETING COURSE


WHY TAKE THIS AFFILIATE COURSE AND NOT ANOTHER ONE


Other courses teach you the same strategy that doesn't work: set up a landing page, drive traffic with Facebook ads, sit back and make money. Today, this won't work, and you'll lose money.
Why? Ads are too expensive and can't be run profitably, and Instagram and other social channels simply don't drive enough traffic that converts.
So people usually get an affiliate link, promote it on Facebook and other social media sites, but make no money. Then they lose hope.
If this sounds like you, you are not alone. Many of my clients had the same experience before they came to me.
Don’t lose hope!
Instead of faulty shortcuts that don't work, I'll teach you solid fundamentals that WILL work. I care about the success of my students, and my course has an honest and step-by-step approach that you can follow and succeed.


NEW TO AFFILIATE MARKETING?


If you are new to affiliate marketing, I understand that it can be a confusing space. There are many strategies, and different experts suggest something a different and unique path. As a new affiliate marketer, it's hard to know whom to trust, which strategies to pursue, and how to ultimately succeed.


I’ve tested a lot myself and seen what works for my students, so I know what gets results and what doesn’t. I want you to stop wasting time, resources, and energy on stuff that is ineffective and start generating income as fast as possible (because there are proven ways to do that).


In this course, I'll logically break every part of the affiliate process so you can understand this industry from the ground up, and be informed and empowered to make your own accurate decisions!


ADD A REVENUE STREAM TO AN EXISTING BUSINESS


If you have an existing business, I'll show you strategies I use to add a passive income revenue stream to my own existing business without much extra work.


If you already have traffic, I'll show you how to add a new revenue stream by offering affiliate products or services that your business does not offer, but your traffic might still find useful.


HOW THIS AFFILIATE MARKETING COURSE IS STRUCTURED - FOUR MAIN PARTS


PART 1: Affiliate marketing basics and fundamentals.
PART 2: Choosing a profitable affiliate niche, how to set up your website, and get started with promoting affiliate products.
PART 3: Choosing the best affiliate products to sell, navigating sites that list tens of thousands of affiliate offers like ClickBank, Amazon affiliate (Amazon associates), Shareasale, JVzoo, and MaxBounty.
PART 4: Actually doing the affiliate marketing. How to drive a high volume of traffic to your affiliate products, and turn that traffic into sales.
Part 4 is essential (and what most other courses lack) but you have to build a foundation first, so go through each part diligently.


FIND THOUSANDS OF AFFILIATE PRODUCTS TO SELL


You’ll never run out of in-demand products to sell!


I'll walk you through many affiliate sites like ClickBank, Amazon affiliate marketing program called Amazon Associates program, Shareasale, JVzoo, and a number of other affiliate sites. In addition to ClickBank, Amazon Associates, Shareasale, JVzoo, MaxBounty I'll show you how to get better affiliate deals by going to the vendors directly.


There’s an art to choosing the right products and you’re about to learn it! And yes, most people choose bad products not knowing the key criteria of a product that will actually sell and that’s why they don’t make money. Armed with this new knowledge you’ll develop a natural sense of identifying great products that will make you money.


The Amazon affiliate marketing program is the most popular one, but the affiliate commissions tend to be much lower there. So I'll also walk you through the Clickbank affiliate marketing program as well as others that also accept people from anywhere in the world, so you can be sure that you'll be approved.


AFFILIATE MARKETING MADE SIMPLE—NO EXPERIENCE NEEDED


This course is perfect for anyone with little to no experience in affiliate marketing or those who’ve just started and feel confused. You don’t need technical skills or a big budget to get started.
Affiliate marketing isn’t oversaturated, and it likely never will be. But success comes to those who know what they’re doing.
You’ve probably wasted time before, trying strategies that didn’t work. You don’t have to anymore. This course will show you exactly what works, saving you money by avoiding failing strategies and helping you focus on what will actually make you money.
Yes, there’s too much information online, and most of it isn’t helpful. What you need is specific, actionable steps, and that’s exactly what you’ll get here.
I’ll cut through the noise, teach you a simple, effective system, and get you started on making money right away.


LEARN, EARN, AND WORK FROM ANYWHERE


You don’t have to struggle through months of trial and error—I’ve done that for you. I’ll show you real examples of affiliate campaigns that actually work, so you can start seeing results fast. You won’t need a big budget, just the right strategies.
You’ll also join a community of people on the same path, sharing their wins and lessons so you can grow even faster. And these skills give you the freedom to work from anywhere.


INSTRUCTOR BACKGROUND


I've been an online entrepreneur for 20 years, with 10+ of those years in affiliate marketing.
Every week, I mentor several new affiliate marketing clients, and I know the common struggles: Trouble selling products, wasting money running Facebook ads, and no sales after a lot of effort. I'll help you get started and overcome these challenges.
I have coached 1,000+ entrepreneurs in person, taught 1,000,000+ students online, and positively impacted millions of entrepreneurs worldwide creating 6 and 7-figure businesses in the process. I would love to help you get similar results.


DISCLAIMER


You will have to create accounts in different affiliate programs to enroll in them. They are free. But they do ask for an email address.


RESPONSIVE AND CARING INSTRUCTOR: WORLD-CLASS STUDENT SUPPORT


If you have questions, know that I am here to help! I answer 99% of student questions within 24 hours. Many students tell me that other instructors don't respond. Well, I do because:
1) I care about my students.
2) I feel a responsibility to make sure that students get their money's worth from the course.


OFFICE HOURS: TALK TO ME DIRECTLY


I offer monthly group calls with students during which you can ask me anything, and get direct and personal attention from me. I hope to meet you on one of the calls, and provide extra help.


MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE


This affiliate marketing course comes with an unconditional, Udemy-backed, 30-day money-back guarantee.
After many years of experience and thousands of tests, I know what works and what doesn’t in affiliate marketing. That’s why this guarantee isn’t just a formality—it’s my personal promise to go above and beyond to help you succeed, just like I’ve done for thousands of my students.


Invest in your future. Enroll now.

英検準2級・TOEIC400以上の英語力があると理解しやすいです
courses.description:
今回の例題では「デジタルコンテンツの販売者」を対象にしています。Udemyの講師や、情報商材を販売する人、コーチング・コンサルビジネスをしている人だと、理解しやすいかもしれません。
Webコンサルティングの現場で起きていること！というと大げさかもしれませんね。他のコンサルタントの方がどんな仕事をしているか僕はわかりませんので。ここで説明する手法は、うちの会社に依頼があった場合どういう手順で収益状況を改善してゆくのか、というひどく個別具体的なものです。うちの会社は次のような順番でWebサイトをチェックしてゆきます。これはそのままマーケティングオートメーションの導入プロセスでもあります。
1. セールスファネルがあるか？
BtoBかBtoCかで異なるのですが、BtoCの（お客さんに直接商品を販売する）場合はセールスファネルがあるだけで顧客一人当たりの単価は大きく変化します。セールスファネルには、第一層：無料プレゼント、第二層：フロントエンド商品、第三層：バックエンド商品を用意していただきます。
2. フロントエンド商品に送客できているか？
正確にはフロントエンド商品のLPにアクセスを集められているか？です。フロントエンド商品は別名「集客商品」ですから、そもそもフロントエンド商品にアクセスを集められなきゃバックエンド商品に顧客を送り込むことはできません。バックエンド商品は比較的、高額な商品なのでたくさん売れる必要はありませんけど、とはいえ一定数のフロントエンド商品の購入者がいなきゃいけないのも事実です。もしフロントエンド商品に十分なアクセスが集まっていない場合は、デジタルコンテンツの販売者であれば次のような施策が考えられます。
3. マーケットプレイスやアフィリエイターを活用しているか？
フロントエンド商品を自分で販売しようとするかいつまでたっても余裕が生まれないのです。UdemyやSkillShare、Amazonのようなマーケットプレイスにコミッション（手数料）を払って集客をしてもらいましょう。このコースでも扱っていますが、infotopのようなASPを使うのも一つの手です。価格を10,000円に、アフィリエイター報酬を88%に設定してそれなりのセールスレターを用意すれば1年に100本ほどフロントエンド商品を売ることができます。そのうちの2割ほどは価格の多寡に関わらずバックエンド商品を購入してくれます。もちろん商品クオリティが高いことは当然の要件です。ちなみに本コースではTeachableを使ってセールスレターを素早く書き上げています。
4. リードの育成を自動化しているか？
MA（マーケティングオートメーション）の世界では、リードナーチャリングと呼ばれるプロセスです。ダイレクトレスポンスマーケティングに詳しい人であればDRM三原則の2番目：リストを教育する、といえばわかるかもしれません。見込み客と信頼関係を構築するプロセスがどれだけ自動化されているか確認します。MailChimpとZapierを導入すれば、見込み客の属性の更新を自動化できますし、ナーチャリングの過程も自動化できます。つまり、一旦仕組みを作ってしまえばあなたのやることはコンテンツをひたすら作ることだけ。なぜならリードジェネレーション（見込み客の獲得）はマーケットプレイスやアフィリエイターがあなたの代わりにやってくれるのですから。
5. WordPressのナビゲーションは最適化されているか？
あなたの会社や事業をわかりやすく伝えましょう。あくまでも感覚値ですが、クライアントの9割ほどは「何をやっているのかよくわかりません」。非常に残念なことですが、販売者自身が自分で何を売っているのか理解していないケースも多々あります。まずはメッセージを明確化して、そのメッセージをサイトの隅々に行き渡らせる必要があります。グローバルナビゲーションに書く内容や、カテゴリーの決め方、SEOを意識したライティングなど、それぞれの効果は小さなものですが、集積した時にはそれなりに大きなものになります。
では、Webコンサルティングの現場で起きていることをあなたのサイトに活かして、今以上に経済的にハッピーになってください。本コースの中でお待ちしております。

courses.description:
Suppose you have always wanted to build booming affiliate websites but could not find a handbook that described the entire process to you. In that case, this course has all the answers that you will ever need to master Wordpress.


This online course covers everything you need to know about building amazon affiliate websites that generate monthly commissions like clockwork.


Creating these websites is the easiest way to start a profitable online business.


Niche research, keyword research, website structure for siloed and niche sites, basic SEO, advanced on-page SEO, and backlink building (External links are important to rank and get Free Traffic).


You will not encounter a method on the market that explains as many details as this course - even most online courses that cost $1000 do not even have half the information covered in this course.


The multiple examples will help you comprehend precisely how to pick profitable niches, what to look for while choosing keywords, and how to create content and build the website.


You will definitely be surprised by the material covered in the advanced SEO (Search engine optimization) section. There is no other online course that covers what works now in as much detail as this course.


The strategy adopted in this courses is entirely ethical and white hat. Build your amazon affiliate websites like it is described here. You will not need to worry about future Google updates targeting spammy sites and deceptive link-building methods.


Here you will discover how to create 100% white hat wordpress websites that can conquer the SERPs for 10s if not 100s of keywords with a few backlinks.


While this may sound difficult to start, the multiple step-by-step examples will show you all you need to know to develop these websites yourself. And you will see how simple this is once you know the fundamental notions and have seen all the steps.


You will learn how to make your website's revenue every month of the year. Making money with the amazon associates program and creating successful websites is very easy- once you learn the process. And you will discover every step of the function inside the course.


This course has been created for newbies - people who have never performed any online advertisement, SEO, or even set up Wordpress websites. It will hold your hand and guide you through every step you require to take to develop an income online with these simple wordpress websites.


This course would be suitable even for affiliates with revenue-generating websites seeking verified tips to boost their profits.


These websites comply with amazon's official guidelines - these are not black hat websites.


This course is not about creating a store on amazon but about building 100% white hat amazon associates' websites. And the two approaches are entirely distinct from each other.


Introduction


What do you mean by affiliate marketing?
Affiliate marketing is about sending traffic to a merchant's website. The vendor will reward you with a commission if the individuals you send to their website buy anything they may sell.


Amazon is one such vendor with a top-rated profitable affiliate program.


Amazon - and its associates in different countries - will pay you commissions for sales you cause through your website's content.


For this to occur, you will require a site ranking high in Google and other search engines. These good rankings will mean people searching for products will visit your website from Google's search results, read your blog post or article- and hopefully click on your amazon affiliate link, go to Amazon and purchase one or many products.


Since people clicked on your affiliate link and landed on amazon, your website acted as a bridge funnel between Google and amazon.


And since you directed them to amazon, you will gain a commission for products they might purchase while on the website.




You make websites, rank those websites on Google and other search engines, get traffic to your website - and send your site visitors to the merchants' site. In this case, the merchant is amazon. And you get a commission for every purchase.


But before you can create these websites that rank high on Google, you will need to learn SEO - otherwise known best as search engine optimization.


SEO is the process of obtaining organic - or what marketers like to call free - traffic from Google and other search engines such as Bing, Duckduckgo, Yahoo, etc...


Without proper knowledge of the different SEO methods and principles, you will not be capable of ranking your websites in search engines and getting organic traffic to your websites.


A large part of this course will explain details about SEO.


All elements of SEO are debated in this course - from the basics of SEO to advanced SEO concepts like silos architecture that can help your pages rank with barely any backlinks.


Here's a detailed summary of what is covered in this course ...


Niche Research and decision making
Before you create a website, you must understand which segment of people your website will target.


Usually, your affiliate website should target a distinctly defined niche. It just cannot be everything to everyone.


Since Amazon sells physical products, your niche has to have several products sold on the platform.


In this course, several niche research ideas are discussed. By applying these ideas, you will efficiently and quickly be able to find lucrative niches that have hot products on amazon.


Keyword Research
Once you have chosen plenty of niches that you find attractive, you will need to specify keywords within the place that you would like to target.


This is perhaps the most essential part of the fundamental SEO process. You will need to choose relatively easy keywords to rank - and can generate revenues if your site earns monthly payments.


Selecting significant keywords is an SEO practitioner's most critical task. It's essential that you target the proper keywords - or else no amount of SEO might be able to support you rank your site.


This course covers keyword research in significant depth.




Keyword research techniques to generate keyword ideas in just about any niche are debated in detail.


And then, you get to see how to assess keywords for the comfort of ranking and revenue-generating possibilities.




Once you have scanned these keyword research lectures, finding relevant keywords in just about any niche will be easy.


Siloed Websites Architecture
This is rarely examined in SEO and online courses, but this is a fundamental SEO notion.


With this architecture, you will have an easier time ranking your website on google.


Numerous SEO courses gloss over this concept or do not present it in an easy-to-grasp way.


This course explains silo architecture in boring depth - in a manner that is very straightforward to comprehend.


Complete Worked Example - Supplements website blueprint
You will discover a complete work example in this part of the course.
You will learn how the keyword research and choice process works and how silos are created.


The niche site example
While silos work very nicely, not everyone might like to create a siloed site. Most affiliate marketing sites are, indeed, niche websites.


This section examines niche websites and how to create niche sites that rank better on google using Ahrefs.


Choosing a domain name for your website
This is a crucial step in the website-building process. Specific domain names may either support or impede your SEO efforts. All of these are discussed in this section.


Building the Wordpress website from scratch
We use WordPress - the most popularly used CMS - to develop websites.
Almost everything you desire to learn about creating affiliate marketing WordPress websites is explained here. Everything from
choosing a Wordpress theme
customizing themes
how to create a child theme
how to customize the Wordpress settings
Neccesary plugins to install, and how to set these
picking and setting up widgets
creating a logo, favicon
adding and editing pages, posts, images, media, etc...
Adding social media sharing buttons, etc...


How to Backup and restore your website in case of a Crash
It's essential that learn how to back up your WordPress websites. You would need to back up your sites - and you would want to know how to restore your site in case something goes wrong to preserve the DATA.


Wordpress website speed optimization using Free Plugins
The faster your website loads, the more valuable it will be for conversions.
Your website needs to load as fast as feasible. Slow websites upset visitors and can damage your conversion rate.


This section will show you precisely how to make your WordPress website load fast.


SEO 101 section
SEO is not complicated, but it's a learning game. You either know what works or you don't. If you learn the basics, your affiliate website will not rank on google.


SEO basics are highly covered in this section.


Advanced on-page SEO


While learning the fundamentals of SEO is essential, you will be incapable of ranking your associate's website in competitive niches with merely the basics. And most affiliate marketing websites are primarily in high-competition niches.


You will need to master advanced SEO concepts that can turn the tables in your favor.


And many of these notions will require to be learned before your website goes live and does well in google's search engines.




Link building
The right type of backlinks is paramount if you are to thrive with your SEO efforts.


This section examines the type of links you want to create, where to get them, and much more.


You have nothing to lose and so much to gain!


ADD TO CART now and get closer to a freer, happier life than ever.

Entrepreneurs wanting to create a succesful online business for passive income
Students seeking to master wordpress and SEO (Search engine optimization)
People looking to take SEO and keywords research skills to the next level
Individuals seeking to rank high on the SERP's (Google Search results)

requirements: Podstawowa znajomość obsługi komputera

courses.description:
Jak zarobić nawet 3120 złotych w tydzień przez Internet?
Tematem afiliacji i marketingu zajmuję się od 2017 roku. Moje początki z programami partnerskimi nie były zbyt kolorowe. Miałem ja zarobić, a zamiast tego zarobił mój "lider" (czyli osoba wprowadzająca mnie do biznesu).
Z perspektywy czasu się z tego śmieję, ale na tamten moment byłem w plecy ok. 1500 zł, które mogłem zarobić. Trochę zabolało. Wiedziałem, że w taki sam sposób działają inni, co mi się nie podobało i zdecydowałem, aby dać ludziom możliwości, których ja nie miałem.
Od momentu, kiedy nagrałem na YT poradnik jak zarabiać (w sposób uczciwy i etyczny oczywiście), odzywa się do mnie cały czas bardzo dużo osób z pytaniami i prośbą o pomoc. Niestety moje zasoby czasowe są bardzo mocno ograniczone.
Postanowiłem nagrać kurs, w którym od A do Z omawiam:
Jak dołączyć do programu?
Jakie są produkty i na których najwięcej zarabiamy?
Jak skorzystać z produktów i na nich zarobić bez sprzedaży i polecania?
Jak zarabiać regularnie z miesiąca na miesiąc?
Jak rozliczyć się z Urzędem Skarbowym? (legalny zarobek)
I wiele, wiele więcej!
W skrócie - materiał jest obszerny :)


Tutaj nie ma półśrodków - dzięki temu kursowi dowiesz się jak zarabiać. Daję Ci na to gwarancję*
*gwarancja obowiązuje pod warunkiem wykonywania wszystkiego zgodnie z informacjami zawartymi w kursie ;)
Kurs podzieliłem na 11 lekcji, abyś mógł wrócić do konkretnego tematu w razie potrzeby.
Moduły bez *gwiazdki* są obowiązkowe, czyli wszystkie ;)
Cena kursu na pewno będzie ruchoma. Ile aktualnie kosztuje - widzisz. Czy jutro będzie kosztować tyle samo? Nie wiem. Najpewniej z czasem cena będzie wyższa. (wiesz - prawo popytu, podaży i te tematy)


Tak czy inaczej mam do Ciebie pytanie:
Ile zapłaciłbyś komuś za wiedzę jak zarobić min. 1553 zł angażując tylko swój czas?
Dzięki temu kursowi osiągniesz kilkudziesięciokrotny zwrot z niskiej inwestycji przy zerowym ryzyku,
W biznesie inni niechętnie dzielą się wiedzą jak zarabiać. Tutaj mamy relację win-win. Ty zarabiasz dzięki kursowi, a ja zarabiam sprzedając kurs.
Pewnie rodzi Ci się pytanie:
"Skoro to taki złoty biznes, to czemu sam na tym nie zarabiasz?"
Haczyk jest taki, że z produktów można skorzystać samemu TYLKO RAZ! Ja już z nich skorzystałem jakiś czas temu i z racji wielu zapytań przygotowałem ten kurs. Warto dzielić się wiedzą, skoro ją posiadasz, prawda? :)
Wcześniej udzielałem konsultacji 100 zł netto za każdą godzinę (osoby, które się zgłaszały potrzebowały średnio 2-4h, aby wszystko załapać). A tak masz uporządkowaną wiedzę za raptem ułamek tego, co musiałbyś wydać + możesz do niej wracać, kiedy chcesz!
Gratuluję dotrwania do końca tego tekstu!
Kluczowe w osiągnięciu czegokolwiek jest działanie, więc odbierz dostęp do kursu i zacznij zarabiać ;)
target_audience: Każda pełnoletnia osoba, która chce dorobić do wypłaty

courses.description:
“Affiliate Monster” Course mein aapka swagat hai. Yeh ek-matra Affiliate Marketing Course hai puri tarah Hindi mein, jo aapko Step-by-Step sikhati hai Beginner level se ki aap apni journey Affiliate Marketing ki duniya mein properly kaise karni chahiye.
Beginners ki sabse badi problem hai ki, Affiliate Marketing exactly waisa nahi hota jaise inn stupid YouTube videos mein log dekhte hain. Aapko pata hogi hi, mai kis baare mein baat kar raha huin.
Iss course mein, mai in-depth me sikhaunga aapko apna Affiliate Marketing empire banana, taki aap Affiliate Marketing ko Auto-pilot per set kar sako. Haan, aisa possible hai, per yeh achieve karne ke liye aapko suru mein bahut saari mehnat karke chizon ke set karna padta hai.
Yeh ek beginner level course hai Affiliate Marketing ki duniya ko samajhne ke liye.
Affiliate Marketing simplest term mein, dusre ke product ko bechna hota hai. Aur majedar baat, aap nahi product own karte hain, na hi customer support, na shipping ka headache. Yeh saari chiz product owner handle karta hai, aur aap bas traffic laane ke commission lete hain.
Aadhiktar case mein toh aapko, customer ko convience bhi nahi karta padta product lene ke liye. Kyunki aap unn customers ko bhi target kar sakte ho jo already aapke Affiliated Product ko khoj rahe ho search engines per.
Ji haan, aap sirf customer ko sahi jagah guide karne ke bhi commission lete ho.


Aise toh Amazon bhi affiliate marketing karta hai, aur majedar baat aap Amazon per apne hi store ki khud affiliate marketing kar sakte ho. Matlab sale se fayda alag, aur Commission alag se.
Per amazon ki affiliate marketing ki commission bakwas hai 2% se 8%, jabki digital world mein commission 40% se start ho kar 85% tak bhi jaati hai.

courses.description:
Es gibt viele E-Mail Markting im Internet, welche erklären wie E-Mails auszusehen haben. Viele vergessen aber, dass es Spam Filter gibt, welche diese "Tricks" garnicht mögen und mit Filterung oder Eintragung in Blacklists "belohnen". In diesem Videokurs erfahren sie wie Spam Filter funktionieren und wie man eine nahezu 100% Zustellrate erreichen kann. Zudem hilft es den Ruf zu schützen und garnicht erst auf Blacklists zu landen. Wenn doch, dann lernt man wie man dies überprüfen kann und auch aus der Blacklist austragen kann.
Wer das Wissen aus dem Videokurs anwendet, wird deutlich mehr Erfolg haben als jemals zuvor.
